3582 for (i = len; y; dst[i--] = src[y--]) {
3583 pgno_t yp = src[y].mid;
3584 while (yp < dst[x].mid)
3585 dst[i--] = dst[x--];
3586 if (yp == dst[x].mid)
3587 free(dst[x--].mptr);
3588 }
3589 mdb_tassert(txn, i == x);
3590 dst[0].mid = len;
3591 free(txn->mt_u.dirty_list);
3592 parent->mt_dirty_room = txn->mt_dirty_room;
3593 if (txn->mt_spill_pgs) {
3594 if (parent->mt_spill_pgs) {
3595 /* TODO: Prevent failure here, so parent does not fail */
3596 rc = mdb_midl_append_list(&parent->mt_spill_pgs, txn->mt_spill_pgs);
3597 if (rc)
3598 parent->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
3599 mdb_midl_free(txn->mt_spill_pgs);
3600 mdb_midl_sort(parent->mt_spill_pgs);
3601 } else {
3602 parent->mt_spill_pgs = txn->mt_spill_pgs;
3603 }
3604 }
3605
3606 /* Append our loose page list to parent's */
3607 for (lp = &parent->mt_loose_pgs; *lp; lp = &NEXT_LOOSE_PAGE(*lp))
3608 ;
3609 *lp = txn->mt_loose_pgs;
3610 parent->mt_loose_count += txn->mt_loose_count;
3611
3612 parent->mt_child = NULL;
3613 mdb_midl_free(((MDB_ntxn *)txn)->mnt_pgstate.mf_pghead);
3614 free(txn);
3615 return rc;
3616 }
3617
3618 if (txn != env->me_txn) {
3619 DPUTS("attempt to commit unknown transaction");
3620 rc = EINVAL;
3621 goto fail;
3622 }
3623
3624 mdb_cursors_close(txn, 0);
3625
3626 if (!txn->mt_u.dirty_list[0].mid &&
3627 !(txn->mt_flags & (MDB_TXN_DIRTY|MDB_TXN_SPILLS)))
3628 goto done;
3629
3630 DPRINTF(("committing txn %"Z"u %p on mdbenv %p, root page %"Z"u",
3631 txn->mt_txnid, (void*)txn, (void*)env, txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_root));
3632
3633 /* Update DB root pointers */
3634 if (txn->mt_numdbs > CORE_DBS) {
3635 MDB_cursor mc;
3636 MDB_dbi i;
3637 MDB_val data;
3638 data.mv_size = sizeof(MDB_db);
3639
3640 mdb_cursor_init(&mc, txn, MAIN_DBI, NULL);
3641 for (i = CORE_DBS; i < txn->mt_numdbs; i++) {
3642 if (txn->mt_dbflags[i] & DB_DIRTY) {
3643 if (TXN_DBI_CHANGED(txn, i)) {
3644 rc = MDB_BAD_DBI;
3645 goto fail;
3646 }
3647 data.mv_data = &txn->mt_dbs[i];
3648 rc = mdb_cursor_put(&mc, &txn->mt_dbxs[i].md_name, &data,
3649 F_SUBDATA);
3650 if (rc)
3651 goto fail;
3652 }
3653 }
3654 }
3655
3656 rc = mdb_freelist_save(txn);
3657 if (rc)
3658 goto fail;
3659
3660 mdb_midl_free(env->me_pghead);
3661 env->me_pghead = NULL;
3662 mdb_midl_shrink(&txn->mt_free_pgs);
3663
3664#if (MDB_DEBUG) > 2
3665 mdb_audit(txn);
3666#endif
3667
3668 if ((rc = mdb_page_flush(txn, 0)) ||
3669 (rc = mdb_env_sync(env, 0)) ||
3670 (rc = mdb_env_write_meta(txn)))
3671 goto fail;
3672 end_mode = MDB_END_COMMITTED|MDB_END_UPDATE;
3673
3674done:
3675 mdb_txn_end(txn, end_mode);
3676 return MDB_SUCCESS;
3677
3678fail:
3679 mdb_txn_abort(txn);
3680 return rc;
3681}
3682
3689static int ESECT
3690mdb_env_read_header(MDB_env *env, MDB_meta *meta)
3691{
3692 MDB_metabuf pbuf;
3693 MDB_page *p;
3694 MDB_meta *m;
3695 int i, rc, off;
3696 enum { Size = sizeof(pbuf) };
3697
3698 /* We don't know the page size yet, so use a minimum value.
3699 * Read both meta pages so we can use the latest one.
3700 */
3701
3702 for (i=off=0; i<NUM_METAS; i++, off += meta->mm_psize) {
3703#ifdef _WIN32
3704 DWORD len;
3705 OVERLAPPED ov;
3706 memset(&ov, 0, sizeof(ov));
3707 ov.Offset = off;
3708 rc = ReadFile(env->me_fd, &pbuf, Size, &len, &ov) ? (int)len : -1;
3709 if (rc == -1 && ErrCode() == ERROR_HANDLE_EOF)
3710 rc = 0;
3711#else
3712 rc = pread(env->me_fd, &pbuf, Size, off);
3713#endif
3714 if (rc != Size) {
3715 if (rc == 0 && off == 0)
3716 return ENOENT;
3717 rc = rc < 0 ? (int) ErrCode() : MDB_INVALID;
3718 DPRINTF(("read: %s", mdb_strerror(rc)));
3719 return rc;
3720 }
3721
3722 p = (MDB_page *)&pbuf;
3723
3724 if (!F_ISSET(p->mp_flags, P_META)) {
3725 DPRINTF(("page %"Z"u not a meta page", p->mp_pgno));
3726 return MDB_INVALID;
3727 }
3728
3729 m = METADATA(p);
3730 if (m->mm_magic != MDB_MAGIC) {
3731 DPUTS("meta has invalid magic");
3732 return MDB_INVALID;
3733 }
3734
3735 if (m->mm_version != MDB_DATA_VERSION) {
3736 DPRINTF(("database is version %u, expected version %u",
3737 m->mm_version, MDB_DATA_VERSION));
3738 return MDB_VERSION_MISMATCH;
3739 }
3740
3741 if (off == 0 || m->mm_txnid > meta->mm_txnid)
3742 *meta = *m;
3743 }
3744 return 0;
3745}
3746
3748static void ESECT
3749mdb_env_init_meta0(MDB_env *env, MDB_meta *meta)
3750{
3751 meta->mm_magic = MDB_MAGIC;
3752 meta->mm_version = MDB_DATA_VERSION;
3753 meta->mm_mapsize = env->me_mapsize;
3754 meta->mm_psize = env->me_psize;
3755 meta->mm_last_pg = NUM_METAS-1;
3756 meta->mm_flags = env->me_flags & 0xffff;
3757 meta->mm_flags |= MDB_INTEGERKEY; /* this is mm_dbs[FREE_DBI].md_flags */
3758 meta->mm_dbs[FREE_DBI].md_root = P_INVALID;
3759 meta->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_root = P_INVALID;
3760}
3761
3767static int ESECT
3768mdb_env_init_meta(MDB_env *env, MDB_meta *meta)
3769{
3770 MDB_page *p, *q;
3771 int rc;
3772 unsigned int psize;
3773#ifdef _WIN32
3774 DWORD len;
3775 OVERLAPPED ov;
3776 memset(&ov, 0, sizeof(ov));
3777#define DO_PWRITE(rc, fd, ptr, size, len, pos) do { \
3778 ov.Offset = pos; \
3779 rc = WriteFile(fd, ptr, size, &len, &ov); } while(0)
3780#else
3781 int len;
3782#define DO_PWRITE(rc, fd, ptr, size, len, pos) do { \
3783 len = pwrite(fd, ptr, size, pos); \
3784 if (len == -1 && ErrCode() == EINTR) continue; \
3785 rc = (len >= 0); break; } while(1)
3786#endif
3787
3788 DPUTS("writing new meta page");
3789
3790 psize = env->me_psize;
3791
3792 p = calloc(NUM_METAS, psize);
3793 if (!p)
3794 return ENOMEM;
3795
3796 p->mp_pgno = 0;
3797 p->mp_flags = P_META;
3798 *(MDB_meta *)METADATA(p) = *meta;
3799
3800 q = (MDB_page *)((char *)p + psize);
3801 q->mp_pgno = 1;
3802 q->mp_flags = P_META;
3803 *(MDB_meta *)METADATA(q) = *meta;
3804
3805 DO_PWRITE(rc, env->me_fd, p, psize * NUM_METAS, len, 0);
3806 if (!rc)
3807 rc = ErrCode();
3808 else if ((unsigned) len == psize * NUM_METAS)
3809 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
3810 else
3811 rc = ENOSPC;
3812 free(p);
3813 return rc;
3814}
3815
3820static int
3821mdb_env_write_meta(MDB_txn *txn)
3822{
3823 MDB_env *env;
3824 MDB_meta meta, metab, *mp;
3825 unsigned flags;
3826 size_t mapsize;
3827 off_t off;
3828 int rc, len, toggle;
3829 char *ptr;
3830 HANDLE mfd;
3831#ifdef _WIN32
3832 OVERLAPPED ov;
3833#else
3834 int r2;
3835#endif
3836
3837 toggle = txn->mt_txnid & 1;
3838 DPRINTF(("writing meta page %d for root page %"Z"u",
3839 toggle, txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_root));
3840
3841 env = txn->mt_env;
3842 flags = env->me_flags;
3843 mp = env->me_metas[toggle];
3844 mapsize = env->me_metas[toggle ^ 1]->mm_mapsize;
3845 /* Persist any increases of mapsize config */
3846 if (mapsize < env->me_mapsize)
3847 mapsize = env->me_mapsize;
3848
3849 if (flags & MDB_WRITEMAP) {
3850 mp->mm_mapsize = mapsize;
3851 mp->mm_dbs[FREE_DBI] = txn->mt_dbs[FREE_DBI];
3852 mp->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI] = txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI];
3853 mp->mm_last_pg = txn->mt_next_pgno - 1;
3854#if (__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 404) && /* TODO: portability */ \
3855 !(defined(__i386__) || defined(__x86_64__))
3856 /* LY: issue a memory barrier, if not x86. ITS#7969 */
3857 __sync_synchronize();
3858#endif
3859 mp->mm_txnid = txn->mt_txnid;
3860 if (!(flags & (MDB_NOMETASYNC|MDB_NOSYNC))) {
3861 unsigned meta_size = env->me_psize;
3862 rc = (env->me_flags & MDB_MAPASYNC) ? MS_ASYNC : MS_SYNC;
3863 ptr = (char *)mp - PAGEHDRSZ;
3864#ifndef _WIN32 /* POSIX msync() requires ptr = start of OS page */
3865 r2 = (ptr - env->me_map) & (env->me_os_psize - 1);
3866 ptr -= r2;
3867 meta_size += r2;
3868#endif
3869 if (MDB_MSYNC(ptr, meta_size, rc)) {
3870 rc = ErrCode();
3871 goto fail;
3872 }
3873 }
3874 goto done;
3875 }
3876 metab.mm_txnid = mp->mm_txnid;
3877 metab.mm_last_pg = mp->mm_last_pg;
3878
3879 meta.mm_mapsize = mapsize;
3880 meta.mm_dbs[FREE_DBI] = txn->mt_dbs[FREE_DBI];
3881 meta.mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI] = txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI];
3882 meta.mm_last_pg = txn->mt_next_pgno - 1;
3883 meta.mm_txnid = txn->mt_txnid;
3884
3885 off = offsetof(MDB_meta, mm_mapsize);
3886 ptr = (char *)&meta + off;
3887 len = sizeof(MDB_meta) - off;
3888 off += (char *)mp - env->me_map;
3889
3890 /* Write to the SYNC fd unless MDB_NOSYNC/MDB_NOMETASYNC.
3891 * (me_mfd goes to the same file as me_fd, but writing to it
3892 * also syncs to disk. Avoids a separate fdatasync() call.)
3893 */
3894 mfd = (flags & (MDB_NOSYNC|MDB_NOMETASYNC)) ? env->me_fd : env->me_mfd;
3895#ifdef _WIN32
3896 {
3897 memset(&ov, 0, sizeof(ov));
3898 ov.Offset = off;
3899 if (!WriteFile(mfd, ptr, len, (DWORD *)&rc, &ov))
3900 rc = -1;
3901 }
3902#else
3903retry_write:
3904 rc = pwrite(mfd, ptr, len, off);
3905#endif
3906 if (rc != len) {
3907 rc = rc < 0 ? ErrCode() : EIO;
3908#ifndef _WIN32
3909 if (rc == EINTR)
3910 goto retry_write;
3911#endif
3912 DPUTS("write failed, disk error?");
3913 /* On a failure, the pagecache still contains the new data.
3914 * Write some old data back, to prevent it from being used.
3915 * Use the non-SYNC fd; we know it will fail anyway.
3916 */
3917 meta.mm_last_pg = metab.mm_last_pg;
3918 meta.mm_txnid = metab.mm_txnid;
3919#ifdef _WIN32
3920 memset(&ov, 0, sizeof(ov));
3921 ov.Offset = off;
3922 WriteFile(env->me_fd, ptr, len, NULL, &ov);
3923#else
3924 r2 = pwrite(env->me_fd, ptr, len, off);
3925 (void)r2; /* Silence warnings. We don't care about pwrite's return value */
3926#endif
3927fail:
3928 env->me_flags |= MDB_FATAL_ERROR;
3929 return rc;
3930 }
3931 /* MIPS has cache coherency issues, this is a no-op everywhere else */
3932 CACHEFLUSH(env->me_map + off, len, DCACHE);
3933done:
3934 /* Memory ordering issues are irrelevant; since the entire writer
3935 * is wrapped by wmutex, all of these changes will become visible
3936 * after the wmutex is unlocked. Since the DB is multi-version,
3937 * readers will get consistent data regardless of how fresh or
3938 * how stale their view of these values is.
3939 */
3940 if (env->me_txns)
3941 env->me_txns->mti_txnid = txn->mt_txnid;
3942
3943 return MDB_SUCCESS;
3944}
3945
3950static MDB_meta *
3951mdb_env_pick_meta(const MDB_env *env)
3952{
3953 MDB_meta *const *metas = env->me_metas;
3954 return metas[ metas[0]->mm_txnid < metas[1]->mm_txnid ];
3955}
3956
3957int ESECT
3958mdb_env_create(MDB_env **env)
3959{
3960 MDB_env *e;
3961
3962 e = calloc(1, sizeof(MDB_env));
3963 if (!e)
3964 return ENOMEM;
3965
3966 e->me_maxreaders = DEFAULT_READERS;
3967 e->me_maxdbs = e->me_numdbs = CORE_DBS;
3968 e->me_fd = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
3969 e->me_lfd = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
3970 e->me_mfd = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
3971#ifdef MDB_USE_POSIX_SEM
3972 e->me_rmutex = SEM_FAILED;
3973 e->me_wmutex = SEM_FAILED;
3974#endif
3975 e->me_pid = getpid();
3976 GET_PAGESIZE(e->me_os_psize);
3977 VGMEMP_CREATE(e,0,0);
3978 *env = e;
3979 return MDB_SUCCESS;
3980}
3981
3982static int ESECT
3983mdb_env_map(MDB_env *env, void *addr)
3984{
3985 MDB_page *p;
3986 unsigned int flags = env->me_flags;
3987#ifdef _WIN32
3988 int rc;
3989 HANDLE mh;
3990 LONG sizelo, sizehi;
3991 size_t msize;
3992
3993 if (flags & MDB_RDONLY) {
3994 /* Don't set explicit map size, use whatever exists */
3995 msize = 0;
3996 sizelo = 0;
3997 sizehi = 0;
3998 } else {
3999 msize = env->me_mapsize;
4000 sizelo = msize & 0xffffffff;
4001 sizehi = msize >> 16 >> 16; /* only needed on Win64 */
4002
4003 /* Windows won't create mappings for zero length files.
4004 * and won't map more than the file size.
4005 * Just set the maxsize right now.
4006 */
4007 if (!(flags & MDB_WRITEMAP) && (SetFilePointer(env->me_fd, sizelo, &sizehi, 0) != (DWORD)sizelo
4008 || !SetEndOfFile(env->me_fd)
4009 || SetFilePointer(env->me_fd, 0, NULL, 0) != 0))
4010 return ErrCode();
4011 }
4012
4013 mh = CreateFileMapping(env->me_fd, NULL, flags & MDB_WRITEMAP ?
4014 PAGE_READWRITE : PAGE_READONLY,
4015 sizehi, sizelo, NULL);
4016 if (!mh)
4017 return ErrCode();
4018 env->me_map = MapViewOfFileEx(mh, flags & MDB_WRITEMAP ?
4019 FILE_MAP_WRITE : FILE_MAP_READ,
4020 0, 0, msize, addr);
4021 rc = env->me_map ? 0 : ErrCode();
4022 CloseHandle(mh);
4023 if (rc)
4024 return rc;
4025#else
4026 int mmap_flags = MAP_SHARED;
4027 int prot = PROT_READ;
4028#ifdef MAP_NOSYNC /* Used on FreeBSD */
4029 if (flags & MDB_NOSYNC)
4030 mmap_flags |= MAP_NOSYNC;
4031#endif
4032 if (flags & MDB_WRITEMAP) {
4033 prot |= PROT_WRITE;
4034 if (ftruncate(env->me_fd, env->me_mapsize) < 0)
4035 return ErrCode();
4036 }
4037 env->me_map = mmap(addr, env->me_mapsize, prot, mmap_flags,
4038 env->me_fd, 0);
4039 if (env->me_map == MAP_FAILED) {
4040 env->me_map = NULL;
4041 return ErrCode();
4042 }
4043
4044 if (flags & MDB_NORDAHEAD) {
4045 /* Turn off readahead. It's harmful when the DB is larger than RAM. */
4046#ifdef MADV_RANDOM
4047 madvise(env->me_map, env->me_mapsize, MADV_RANDOM);
4048#else
4049#ifdef POSIX_MADV_RANDOM
4050 posix_madvise(env->me_map, env->me_mapsize, POSIX_MADV_RANDOM);
4051#endif /* POSIX_MADV_RANDOM */
4052#endif /* MADV_RANDOM */
4053 }
4054#endif /* _WIN32 */
4055
4056 /* Can happen because the address argument to mmap() is just a
4057 * hint. mmap() can pick another, e.g. if the range is in use.
4058 * The MAP_FIXED flag would prevent that, but then mmap could
4059 * instead unmap existing pages to make room for the new map.
4060 */
4061 if (addr && env->me_map != addr)
4062 return EBUSY; /* TODO: Make a new MDB_* error code? */
4063
4064 p = (MDB_page *)env->me_map;
4065 env->me_metas[0] = METADATA(p);
4066 env->me_metas[1] = (MDB_meta *)((char *)env->me_metas[0] + env->me_psize);
4067
4068 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4069}
4070
4071int ESECT
4072mdb_env_set_mapsize(MDB_env *env, size_t size)
4073{
4074 /* If env is already open, caller is responsible for making
4075 * sure there are no active txns.
4076 */
4077 if (env->me_map) {
4078 int rc;
4079 MDB_meta *meta;
4080 void *old;
4081 if (env->me_txn)
4082 return EINVAL;
4083 meta = mdb_env_pick_meta(env);
4084 if (!size)
4085 size = meta->mm_mapsize;
4086 {
4087 /* Silently round up to minimum if the size is too small */
4088 size_t minsize = (meta->mm_last_pg + 1) * env->me_psize;
4089 if (size < minsize)
4090 size = minsize;
4091 }
4092 munmap(env->me_map, env->me_mapsize);
4093 env->me_mapsize = size;
4094 old = (env->me_flags & MDB_FIXEDMAP) ? env->me_map : NULL;
4095 rc = mdb_env_map(env, old);
4096 if (rc)
4097 return rc;
4098 }
4099 env->me_mapsize = size;
4100 if (env->me_psize)
4101 env->me_maxpg = env->me_mapsize / env->me_psize;
4102 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4103}
4104
4105int ESECT
4106mdb_env_set_maxdbs(MDB_env *env, MDB_dbi dbs)
4107{
4108 if (env->me_map)
4109 return EINVAL;
4110 env->me_maxdbs = dbs + CORE_DBS;
4111 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4112}
4113
4114int ESECT
4115mdb_env_set_maxreaders(MDB_env *env, unsigned int readers)
4116{
4117 if (env->me_map || readers < 1)
4118 return EINVAL;
4119 env->me_maxreaders = readers;
4120 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4121}
4122
4123int ESECT
4124mdb_env_get_maxreaders(MDB_env *env, unsigned int *readers)
4125{
4126 if (!env || !readers)
4127 return EINVAL;
4128 *readers = env->me_maxreaders;
4129 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4130}
4131
4132static int ESECT
4133mdb_fsize(HANDLE fd, size_t *size)
4134{
4135#ifdef _WIN32
4136 LARGE_INTEGER fsize;
4137
4138 if (!GetFileSizeEx(fd, &fsize))
4139 return ErrCode();
4140
4141 *size = fsize.QuadPart;
4142#else
4143 struct stat st;
4144
4145 if (fstat(fd, &st))
4146 return ErrCode();
4147
4148 *size = st.st_size;
4149#endif
4150 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4151}
4152
4153
4154#ifdef _WIN32
4155typedef wchar_t mdb_nchar_t;
4156# define MDB_NAME(str) L##str
4157# define mdb_name_cpy wcscpy
4158#else
4160typedef char mdb_nchar_t;
4161# define MDB_NAME(str) str
4162# define mdb_name_cpy strcpy
4163#endif
4164
4166typedef struct MDB_name {
4167 int mn_len;
4168 int mn_alloced;
4169 mdb_nchar_t *mn_val;
4170} MDB_name;
4171
4173static const mdb_nchar_t *const mdb_suffixes[2][2] = {
4174 { MDB_NAME("/data.mdb"), MDB_NAME("") },
4175 { MDB_NAME("/lock.mdb"), MDB_NAME("-lock") }
4176};
4177
4178#define MDB_SUFFLEN 9
4188static int ESECT
4189mdb_fname_init(const char *path, unsigned envflags, MDB_name *fname)
4190{
4191 int no_suffix = F_ISSET(envflags, MDB_NOSUBDIR|MDB_NOLOCK);
4192 fname->mn_alloced = 0;
4193#ifdef _WIN32
4194 return utf8_to_utf16(path, fname, no_suffix ? 0 : MDB_SUFFLEN);
4195#else
4196 fname->mn_len = strlen(path);
4197 if (no_suffix)
4198 fname->mn_val = (char *) path;
4199 else if ((fname->mn_val = malloc(fname->mn_len + MDB_SUFFLEN+1)) != NULL) {
4200 fname->mn_alloced = 1;
4201 strcpy(fname->mn_val, path);
4202 }
4203 else
4204 return ENOMEM;
4205 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4206#endif
4207}
4208
4210#define mdb_fname_destroy(fname) \
4211 do { if ((fname).mn_alloced) free((fname).mn_val); } while (0)
4212
4213#ifdef O_CLOEXEC /* POSIX.1-2008: Set FD_CLOEXEC atomically at open() */
4214# define MDB_CLOEXEC O_CLOEXEC
4215#else
4216# define MDB_CLOEXEC 0
4217#endif
4218
4220enum mdb_fopen_type {
4221#ifdef _WIN32
4222 MDB_O_RDONLY, MDB_O_RDWR, MDB_O_META, MDB_O_COPY, MDB_O_LOCKS
4223#else
4224 /* A comment in mdb_fopen() explains some O_* flag choices. */
4225 MDB_O_RDONLY= O_RDONLY,
4226 MDB_O_RDWR = O_RDWR |O_CREAT,
4227 MDB_O_META = O_WRONLY|MDB_DSYNC |MDB_CLOEXEC,
4228 MDB_O_COPY = O_WRONLY|O_CREAT|O_EXCL|MDB_CLOEXEC,
4232 MDB_O_MASK = MDB_O_RDWR|MDB_CLOEXEC | MDB_O_RDONLY|MDB_O_META|MDB_O_COPY,
4233 MDB_O_LOCKS = MDB_O_RDWR|MDB_CLOEXEC | ((MDB_O_MASK+1) & ~MDB_O_MASK)
4234#endif
4235};
4236
4246static int ESECT
4247mdb_fopen(const MDB_env *env, MDB_name *fname,
4248 enum mdb_fopen_type which, mdb_mode_t mode,
4249 HANDLE *res)
4250{
4251 int rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
4252 HANDLE fd;
4253#ifdef _WIN32
4254 DWORD acc, share, disp, attrs;
4255#else
4256 int flags;
4257#endif
4258
4259 if (fname->mn_alloced) /* modifiable copy */
4260 mdb_name_cpy(fname->mn_val + fname->mn_len,
4261 mdb_suffixes[which==MDB_O_LOCKS][F_ISSET(env->me_flags, MDB_NOSUBDIR)]);
4262
4263 /* The directory must already exist. Usually the file need not.
4264 * MDB_O_META requires the file because we already created it using
4265 * MDB_O_RDWR. MDB_O_COPY must not overwrite an existing file.
4266 *
4267 * With MDB_O_COPY we do not want the OS to cache the writes, since
4268 * the source data is already in the OS cache.
4269 *
4270 * The lockfile needs FD_CLOEXEC (close file descriptor on exec*())
4271 * to avoid the flock() issues noted under Caveats in lmdb.h.
4272 * Also set it for other filehandles which the user cannot get at
4273 * and close himself, which he may need after fork(). I.e. all but
4274 * me_fd, which programs do use via mdb_env_get_fd().
4275 */
4276
4277#ifdef _WIN32
4278 acc = GENERIC_READ|GENERIC_WRITE;
4279 share = FILE_SHARE_READ|FILE_SHARE_WRITE;
4280 disp = OPEN_ALWAYS;
4281 attrs = FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL;
4282 switch (which) {
4283 case MDB_O_RDONLY: /* read-only datafile */
4284 acc = GENERIC_READ;
4285 disp = OPEN_EXISTING;
4286 break;
4287 case MDB_O_META: /* for writing metapages */
4288 acc = GENERIC_WRITE;
4289 disp = OPEN_EXISTING;
4290 attrs = FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL|FILE_FLAG_WRITE_THROUGH;
4291 break;
4292 case MDB_O_COPY: /* mdb_env_copy() & co */
4293 acc = GENERIC_WRITE;
4294 share = 0;
4295 disp = CREATE_NEW;
4296 attrs = FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING|FILE_FLAG_WRITE_THROUGH;
4297 break;
4298 default: break; /* silence gcc -Wswitch (not all enum values handled) */
4299 }
4300 fd = CreateFileW(fname->mn_val, acc, share, NULL, disp, attrs, NULL);
4301#else
4302 fd = open(fname->mn_val, which & MDB_O_MASK, mode);
4303#endif
4304
4305 if (fd == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
4306 rc = ErrCode();
4307#ifndef _WIN32
4308 else {
4309 if (which != MDB_O_RDONLY && which != MDB_O_RDWR) {
4310 /* Set CLOEXEC if we could not pass it to open() */
4311 if (!MDB_CLOEXEC && (flags = fcntl(fd, F_GETFD)) != -1)
4312 (void) fcntl(fd, F_SETFD, flags | FD_CLOEXEC);
4313 }
4314 if (which == MDB_O_COPY && env->me_psize >= env->me_os_psize) {
4315 /* This may require buffer alignment. There is no portable
4316 * way to ask how much, so we require OS pagesize alignment.
4317 */
4318# ifdef F_NOCACHE /* __APPLE__ */
4319 (void) fcntl(fd, F_NOCACHE, 1);
4320# elif defined O_DIRECT
4321 /* open(...O_DIRECT...) would break on filesystems without
4322 * O_DIRECT support (ITS#7682). Try to set it here instead.
4323 */
4324 if ((flags = fcntl(fd, F_GETFL)) != -1)
4325 (void) fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, flags | O_DIRECT);
4326# endif
4327 }
4328 }
4329#endif /* !_WIN32 */
4330
4331 *res = fd;
4332 return rc;
4333}
4334
4335
4336#ifdef BROKEN_FDATASYNC
4337#include <sys/utsname.h>
4338#include <sys/vfs.h>
4339#endif
4340
4343static int ESECT
4344mdb_env_open2(MDB_env *env)
4345{
4346 unsigned int flags = env->me_flags;
4347 int i, newenv = 0, rc;
4348 MDB_meta meta;
4349
4350#ifdef _WIN32
4351 /* See if we should use QueryLimited */
4352 rc = GetVersion();
4353 if ((rc & 0xff) > 5)
4354 env->me_pidquery = MDB_PROCESS_QUERY_LIMITED_INFORMATION;
4355 else
4356 env->me_pidquery = PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION;
4357#endif /* _WIN32 */
4358
4359#ifdef BROKEN_FDATASYNC
4360 /* ext3/ext4 fdatasync is broken on some older Linux kernels.
4361 * https://lkml.org/lkml/2012/9/3/83
4362 * Kernels after 3.6-rc6 are known good.
4363 * https://lkml.org/lkml/2012/9/10/556
4364 * See if the DB is on ext3/ext4, then check for new enough kernel
4365 * Kernels 2.6.32.60, 2.6.34.15, 3.2.30, and 3.5.4 are also known
4366 * to be patched.
4367 */
4368 {
4369 struct statfs st;
4370 fstatfs(env->me_fd, &st);
4371 while (st.f_type == 0xEF53) {
4372 struct utsname uts;
4373 int i;
4374 uname(&uts);
4375 if (uts.release[0] < '3') {
4376 if (!strncmp(uts.release, "2.6.32.", 7)) {
4377 i = atoi(uts.release+7);
4378 if (i >= 60)
4379 break; /* 2.6.32.60 and newer is OK */
4380 } else if (!strncmp(uts.release, "2.6.34.", 7)) {
4381 i = atoi(uts.release+7);
4382 if (i >= 15)
4383 break; /* 2.6.34.15 and newer is OK */
4384 }
4385 } else if (uts.release[0] == '3') {
4386 i = atoi(uts.release+2);
4387 if (i > 5)
4388 break; /* 3.6 and newer is OK */
4389 if (i == 5) {
4390 i = atoi(uts.release+4);
4391 if (i >= 4)
4392 break; /* 3.5.4 and newer is OK */
4393 } else if (i == 2) {
4394 i = atoi(uts.release+4);
4395 if (i >= 30)
4396 break; /* 3.2.30 and newer is OK */
4397 }
4398 } else { /* 4.x and newer is OK */
4399 break;
4400 }
4401 env->me_flags |= MDB_FSYNCONLY;
4402 break;
4403 }
4404 }
4405#endif
4406
4407 if ((i = mdb_env_read_header(env, &meta)) != 0) {
4408 if (i != ENOENT)
4409 return i;
4410 DPUTS("new mdbenv");
4411 newenv = 1;
4412 env->me_psize = env->me_os_psize;
4413 if (env->me_psize > MAX_PAGESIZE)
4414 env->me_psize = MAX_PAGESIZE;
4415 memset(&meta, 0, sizeof(meta));
4416 mdb_env_init_meta0(env, &meta);
4417 meta.mm_mapsize = DEFAULT_MAPSIZE;
4418 } else {
4419 env->me_psize = meta.mm_psize;
4420 }
4421
4422 /* Was a mapsize configured? */
4423 if (!env->me_mapsize) {
4424 env->me_mapsize = meta.mm_mapsize;
4425 }
4426 {
4427 /* Make sure mapsize >= committed data size. Even when using
4428 * mm_mapsize, which could be broken in old files (ITS#7789).
4429 */
4430 size_t minsize = (meta.mm_last_pg + 1) * meta.mm_psize;
4431 if (env->me_mapsize < minsize)
4432 env->me_mapsize = minsize;
4433 }
4434 meta.mm_mapsize = env->me_mapsize;
4435
4436 if (newenv && !(flags & MDB_FIXEDMAP)) {
4437 /* mdb_env_map() may grow the datafile. Write the metapages
4438 * first, so the file will be valid if initialization fails.
4439 * Except with FIXEDMAP, since we do not yet know mm_address.
4440 * We could fill in mm_address later, but then a different
4441 * program might end up doing that - one with a memory layout
4442 * and map address which does not suit the main program.
4443 */
4444 rc = mdb_env_init_meta(env, &meta);
4445 if (rc)
4446 return rc;
4447 newenv = 0;
4448 }
4449
4450 rc = mdb_env_map(env, (flags & MDB_FIXEDMAP) ? meta.mm_address : NULL);
4451 if (rc)
4452 return rc;
4453
4454 if (newenv) {
4455 if (flags & MDB_FIXEDMAP)
4456 meta.mm_address = env->me_map;
4457 i = mdb_env_init_meta(env, &meta);
4458 if (i != MDB_SUCCESS) {
4459 return i;
4460 }
4461 }
4462
4463 env->me_maxfree_1pg = (env->me_psize - PAGEHDRSZ) / sizeof(pgno_t) - 1;
4464 env->me_nodemax = (((env->me_psize - PAGEHDRSZ) / MDB_MINKEYS) & -2)
4465 - sizeof(indx_t);
4466#if !(MDB_MAXKEYSIZE)
4467 env->me_maxkey = env->me_nodemax - (NODESIZE + sizeof(MDB_db));
4468#endif
4469 env->me_maxpg = env->me_mapsize / env->me_psize;
4470
4471#if MDB_DEBUG
4472 {
4473 MDB_meta *meta = mdb_env_pick_meta(env);
4474 MDB_db *db = &meta->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI];
4475
4476 DPRINTF(("opened database version %u, pagesize %u",
4477 meta->mm_version, env->me_psize));
4478 DPRINTF(("using meta page %d", (int) (meta->mm_txnid & 1)));
4479 DPRINTF(("depth: %u", db->md_depth));
4480 DPRINTF(("entries: %"Z"u", db->md_entries));
4481 DPRINTF(("branch pages: %"Z"u", db->md_branch_pages));
4482 DPRINTF(("leaf pages: %"Z"u", db->md_leaf_pages));
4483 DPRINTF(("overflow pages: %"Z"u", db->md_overflow_pages));
4484 DPRINTF(("root: %"Z"u", db->md_root));
4485 }
4486#endif
4487
4488 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4489}
4490
4491
4496static void
4497mdb_env_reader_dest(void *ptr)
4498{
4499 MDB_reader *reader = ptr;
4500
4501#ifndef _WIN32
4502 if (reader->mr_pid == getpid()) /* catch pthread_exit() in child process */
4503#endif
4504 /* We omit the mutex, so do this atomically (i.e. skip mr_txnid) */
4505 reader->mr_pid = 0;
4506}
4507
4508#ifdef _WIN32
4514#ifndef MAX_TLS_KEYS
4515#define MAX_TLS_KEYS 64
4516#endif
4517static pthread_key_t mdb_tls_keys[MAX_TLS_KEYS];
4518static int mdb_tls_nkeys;
4519
4520static void NTAPI mdb_tls_callback(PVOID module, DWORD reason, PVOID ptr)
4521{
4522 int i;
4523 switch(reason) {
4524 case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH: break;
4525 case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH: break;
4526 case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
4527 for (i=0; i<mdb_tls_nkeys; i++) {
4528 MDB_reader *r = pthread_getspecific(mdb_tls_keys[i]);
4529 if (r) {
4530 mdb_env_reader_dest(r);
4531 }
4532 }
4533 break;
4534 case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH: break;
4535 }
4536}
4537#ifdef __GNUC__
4538#ifdef _WIN64
4539const PIMAGE_TLS_CALLBACK mdb_tls_cbp __attribute__((section (".CRT$XLB"))) = mdb_tls_callback;
4540#else
4541PIMAGE_TLS_CALLBACK mdb_tls_cbp __attribute__((section (".CRT$XLB"))) = mdb_tls_callback;
4542#endif
4543#else
4544#ifdef _WIN64
4545/* Force some symbol references.
4546 * _tls_used forces the linker to create the TLS directory if not already done
4547 * mdb_tls_cbp prevents whole-program-optimizer from dropping the symbol.
4548 */
4549#pragma comment(linker, "/INCLUDE:_tls_used")
4550#pragma comment(linker, "/INCLUDE:mdb_tls_cbp")
4551#pragma const_seg(".CRT$XLB")
4552extern const PIMAGE_TLS_CALLBACK mdb_tls_cbp;
4553const PIMAGE_TLS_CALLBACK mdb_tls_cbp = mdb_tls_callback;
4554#pragma const_seg()
4555#else /* _WIN32 */
4556#pragma comment(linker, "/INCLUDE:__tls_used")
4557#pragma comment(linker, "/INCLUDE:_mdb_tls_cbp")
4558#pragma data_seg(".CRT$XLB")
4559PIMAGE_TLS_CALLBACK mdb_tls_cbp = mdb_tls_callback;
4560#pragma data_seg()
4561#endif /* WIN 32/64 */
4562#endif /* !__GNUC__ */
4563#endif
4564
4566static int ESECT
4567mdb_env_share_locks(MDB_env *env, int *excl)
4568{
4569 int rc = 0;
4570 MDB_meta *meta = mdb_env_pick_meta(env);
4571
4572 env->me_txns->mti_txnid = meta->mm_txnid;
4573
4574#ifdef _WIN32
4575 {
4576 OVERLAPPED ov;
4577 /* First acquire a shared lock. The Unlock will
4578 * then release the existing exclusive lock.
4579 */
4580 memset(&ov, 0, sizeof(ov));
4581 if (!LockFileEx(env->me_lfd, 0, 0, 1, 0, &ov)) {
4582 rc = ErrCode();
4583 } else {
4584 UnlockFile(env->me_lfd, 0, 0, 1, 0);
4585 *excl = 0;
4586 }
4587 }
4588#else
4589 {
4590 struct flock lock_info;
4591 /* The shared lock replaces the existing lock */
4592 memset((void *)&lock_info, 0, sizeof(lock_info));
4593 lock_info.l_type = F_RDLCK;
4594 lock_info.l_whence = SEEK_SET;
4595 lock_info.l_start = 0;
4596 lock_info.l_len = 1;
4597 while ((rc = fcntl(env->me_lfd, F_SETLK, &lock_info)) &&
4598 (rc = ErrCode()) == EINTR) ;
4599 *excl = rc ? -1 : 0; /* error may mean we lost the lock */
4600 }
4601#endif
4602
4603 return rc;
4604}
4605
4609static int ESECT
4610mdb_env_excl_lock(MDB_env *env, int *excl)
4611{
4612 int rc = 0;
4613#ifdef _WIN32
4614 if (LockFile(env->me_lfd, 0, 0, 1, 0)) {
4615 *excl = 1;
4616 } else {
4617 OVERLAPPED ov;
4618 memset(&ov, 0, sizeof(ov));
4619 if (LockFileEx(env->me_lfd, 0, 0, 1, 0, &ov)) {
4620 *excl = 0;
4621 } else {
4622 rc = ErrCode();
4623 }
4624 }
4625#else
4626 struct flock lock_info;
4627 memset((void *)&lock_info, 0, sizeof(lock_info));
4628 lock_info.l_type = F_WRLCK;
4629 lock_info.l_whence = SEEK_SET;
4630 lock_info.l_start = 0;
4631 lock_info.l_len = 1;
4632 while ((rc = fcntl(env->me_lfd, F_SETLK, &lock_info)) &&
4633 (rc = ErrCode()) == EINTR) ;
4634 if (!rc) {
4635 *excl = 1;
4636 } else
4637# ifndef MDB_USE_POSIX_MUTEX
4638 if (*excl < 0) /* always true when MDB_USE_POSIX_MUTEX */
4639# endif
4640 {
4641 lock_info.l_type = F_RDLCK;
4642 while ((rc = fcntl(env->me_lfd, F_SETLKW, &lock_info)) &&
4643 (rc = ErrCode()) == EINTR) ;
4644 if (rc == 0)
4645 *excl = 0;
4646 }
4647#endif
4648 return rc;
4649}
4650
4651#ifdef MDB_USE_HASH
4652/*
4653 * hash_64 - 64 bit Fowler/Noll/Vo-0 FNV-1a hash code
4654 *
4655 * @(#) $Revision: 5.1 $
4656 * @(#) $Id: hash_64a.c,v 5.1 2009/06/30 09:01:38 chongo Exp $
4657 * @(#) $Source: /usr/local/src/cmd/fnv/RCS/hash_64a.c,v $
4658 *
4659 * http://www.isthe.com/chongo/tech/comp/fnv/index.html
4660 *
4661 ***
4662 *
4663 * Please do not copyright this code. This code is in the public domain.
4664 *
4665 * LANDON CURT NOLL DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS SOFTWARE,
4666 * INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS. IN NO
4667 * EVENT SHALL LANDON CURT NOLL BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR
4668 * CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM LOSS OF
4669 * USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE OR
4670 * OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR
4671 * PERFORMANCE OF THIS SOFTWARE.
4672 *
4673 * By:
4674 * chongo <Landon Curt Noll> /\oo/\
4675 * http://www.isthe.com/chongo/
4676 *
4677 * Share and Enjoy! :-)
4678 */
4679
4680typedef unsigned long long mdb_hash_t;
4681#define MDB_HASH_INIT ((mdb_hash_t)0xcbf29ce484222325ULL)
4682
4691static mdb_hash_t
4692mdb_hash_val(MDB_val *val, mdb_hash_t hval)
4693{
4694 unsigned char *s = (unsigned char *)val->mv_data; /* unsigned string */
4695 unsigned char *end = s + val->mv_size;
4696 /*
4697 * FNV-1a hash each octet of the string
4698 */
4699 while (s < end) {
4700 /* xor the bottom with the current octet */
4701 hval ^= (mdb_hash_t)*s++;
4702
4703 /* multiply by the 64 bit FNV magic prime mod 2^64 */
4704 hval += (hval << 1) + (hval << 4) + (hval << 5) +
4705 (hval << 7) + (hval << 8) + (hval << 40);
4706 }
4707 /* return our new hash value */
4708 return hval;
4709}
4710
4719static const char mdb_a85[]= "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz!#$%&()*+-;<=>?@^_`{|}~";
4720
4721static void ESECT
4722mdb_pack85(unsigned long l, char *out)
4723{
4724 int i;
4725
4726 for (i=0; i<5; i++) {
4727 *out++ = mdb_a85[l % 85];
4728 l /= 85;
4729 }
4730}
4731
4732static void ESECT
4733mdb_hash_enc(MDB_val *val, char *encbuf)
4734{
4735 mdb_hash_t h = mdb_hash_val(val, MDB_HASH_INIT);
4736
4737 mdb_pack85(h, encbuf);
4738 mdb_pack85(h>>32, encbuf+5);
4739 encbuf[10] = '\0';
4740}
4741#endif
4742
4750static int ESECT
4751mdb_env_setup_locks(MDB_env *env, MDB_name *fname, int mode, int *excl)
4752{
4753#ifdef _WIN32
4754# define MDB_ERRCODE_ROFS ERROR_WRITE_PROTECT
4755#else
4756# define MDB_ERRCODE_ROFS EROFS
4757#endif
4758 int rc;
4759 off_t size, rsize;
4760
4761 rc = mdb_fopen(env, fname, MDB_O_LOCKS, mode, &env->me_lfd);
4762 if (rc) {
4763 /* Omit lockfile if read-only env on read-only filesystem */
4764 if (rc == MDB_ERRCODE_ROFS && (env->me_flags & MDB_RDONLY)) {
4765 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4766 }
4767 goto fail;
4768 }
4769
4770 if (!(env->me_flags & MDB_NOTLS)) {
4771 rc = pthread_key_create(&env->me_txkey, mdb_env_reader_dest);
4772 if (rc)
4773 goto fail;
4774 env->me_flags |= MDB_ENV_TXKEY;
4775#ifdef _WIN32
4776 /* Windows TLS callbacks need help finding their TLS info. */
4777 if (mdb_tls_nkeys >= MAX_TLS_KEYS) {
4778 rc = MDB_TLS_FULL;
4779 goto fail;
4780 }
4781 mdb_tls_keys[mdb_tls_nkeys++] = env->me_txkey;
4782#endif
4783 }
4784
4785 /* Try to get exclusive lock. If we succeed, then
4786 * nobody is using the lock region and we should initialize it.
4787 */
4788 if ((rc = mdb_env_excl_lock(env, excl))) goto fail;
4789
4790#ifdef _WIN32
4791 size = GetFileSize(env->me_lfd, NULL);
4792#else
4793 size = lseek(env->me_lfd, 0, SEEK_END);
4794 if (size == -1) goto fail_errno;
4795#endif
4796 rsize = (env->me_maxreaders-1) * sizeof(MDB_reader) + sizeof(MDB_txninfo);
4797 if (size < rsize && *excl > 0) {
4798#ifdef _WIN32
4799 if (SetFilePointer(env->me_lfd, rsize, NULL, FILE_BEGIN) != (DWORD)rsize
4800 || !SetEndOfFile(env->me_lfd))
4801 goto fail_errno;
4802#else
4803 if (ftruncate(env->me_lfd, rsize) != 0) goto fail_errno;
4804#endif
4805 } else {
4806 rsize = size;
4807 size = rsize - sizeof(MDB_txninfo);
4808 env->me_maxreaders = size/sizeof(MDB_reader) + 1;
4809 }
4810 {
4811#ifdef _WIN32
4812 HANDLE mh;
4813 mh = CreateFileMapping(env->me_lfd, NULL, PAGE_READWRITE,
4814 0, 0, NULL);
4815 if (!mh) goto fail_errno;
4816 env->me_txns = MapViewOfFileEx(mh, FILE_MAP_WRITE, 0, 0, rsize, NULL);
4817 CloseHandle(mh);
4818 if (!env->me_txns) goto fail_errno;
4819#else
4820 void *m = mmap(NULL, rsize, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED,
4821 env->me_lfd, 0);
4822 if (m == MAP_FAILED) goto fail_errno;
4823 env->me_txns = m;
4824#endif
4825 }
4826 if (*excl > 0) {
4827#ifdef _WIN32
4828 BY_HANDLE_FILE_INFORMATION stbuf;
4829 struct {
4830 DWORD volume;
4831 DWORD nhigh;
4832 DWORD nlow;
4833 } idbuf;
4834 MDB_val val;
4835 char encbuf[11];
4836
4837 if (!mdb_sec_inited) {
4838 InitializeSecurityDescriptor(&mdb_null_sd,
4839 SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR_REVISION);
4840 SetSecurityDescriptorDacl(&mdb_null_sd, TRUE, 0, FALSE);
4841 mdb_all_sa.nLength = sizeof(SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES);
4842 mdb_all_sa.bInheritHandle = FALSE;
4843 mdb_all_sa.lpSecurityDescriptor = &mdb_null_sd;
4844 mdb_sec_inited = 1;
4845 }
4846 if (!GetFileInformationByHandle(env->me_lfd, &stbuf)) goto fail_errno;
4847 idbuf.volume = stbuf.dwVolumeSerialNumber;
4848 idbuf.nhigh = stbuf.nFileIndexHigh;
4849 idbuf.nlow = stbuf.nFileIndexLow;
4850 val.mv_data = &idbuf;
4851 val.mv_size = sizeof(idbuf);
4852 mdb_hash_enc(&val, encbuf);
4853 sprintf(env->me_txns->mti_rmname, "Global\\MDBr%s", encbuf);
4854 sprintf(env->me_txns->mti_wmname, "Global\\MDBw%s", encbuf);
4855 env->me_rmutex = CreateMutexA(&mdb_all_sa, FALSE, env->me_txns->mti_rmname);
4856 if (!env->me_rmutex) goto fail_errno;
4857 env->me_wmutex = CreateMutexA(&mdb_all_sa, FALSE, env->me_txns->mti_wmname);
4858 if (!env->me_wmutex) goto fail_errno;
4859#elif defined(MDB_USE_POSIX_SEM)
4860 struct stat stbuf;
4861 struct {
4862 dev_t dev;
4863 ino_t ino;
4864 } idbuf;
4865 MDB_val val;
4866 char encbuf[11];
4867
4868#if defined(__NetBSD__)
4869#define MDB_SHORT_SEMNAMES 1 /* limited to 14 chars */
4870#endif
4871 if (fstat(env->me_lfd, &stbuf)) goto fail_errno;
4872 idbuf.dev = stbuf.st_dev;
4873 idbuf.ino = stbuf.st_ino;
4874 val.mv_data = &idbuf;
4875 val.mv_size = sizeof(idbuf);
4876 mdb_hash_enc(&val, encbuf);
4877#ifdef MDB_SHORT_SEMNAMES
4878 encbuf[9] = '\0'; /* drop name from 15 chars to 14 chars */
4879#endif
4880 sprintf(env->me_txns->mti_rmname, "/MDBr%s", encbuf);
4881 sprintf(env->me_txns->mti_wmname, "/MDBw%s", encbuf);
4882 /* Clean up after a previous run, if needed: Try to
4883 * remove both semaphores before doing anything else.
4884 */
4885 sem_unlink(env->me_txns->mti_rmname);
4886 sem_unlink(env->me_txns->mti_wmname);
4887 env->me_rmutex = sem_open(env->me_txns->mti_rmname,
4888 O_CREAT|O_EXCL, mode, 1);
4889 if (env->me_rmutex == SEM_FAILED) goto fail_errno;
4890 env->me_wmutex = sem_open(env->me_txns->mti_wmname,
4891 O_CREAT|O_EXCL, mode, 1);
4892 if (env->me_wmutex == SEM_FAILED) goto fail_errno;
4893#else /* MDB_USE_POSIX_MUTEX: */
4894 pthread_mutexattr_t mattr;
4895
4896 /* Solaris needs this before initing a robust mutex. Otherwise
4897 * it may skip the init and return EBUSY "seems someone already
4898 * inited" or EINVAL "it was inited differently".
4899 */
4900 memset(env->me_txns->mti_rmutex, 0, sizeof(*env->me_txns->mti_rmutex));
4901 memset(env->me_txns->mti_wmutex, 0, sizeof(*env->me_txns->mti_wmutex));
4902
4903 if ((rc = pthread_mutexattr_init(&mattr)))
4904 goto fail;
4905
4906 rc = pthread_mutexattr_setpshared(&mattr, PTHREAD_PROCESS_SHARED);
4907#ifdef MDB_ROBUST_SUPPORTED
4908 if (!rc) rc = pthread_mutexattr_setrobust(&mattr, PTHREAD_MUTEX_ROBUST);
4909#endif
4910 if (!rc) rc = pthread_mutex_init(env->me_txns->mti_rmutex, &mattr);
4911 if (!rc) rc = pthread_mutex_init(env->me_txns->mti_wmutex, &mattr);
4912 pthread_mutexattr_destroy(&mattr);
4913 if (rc)
4914 goto fail;
4915#endif /* _WIN32 || MDB_USE_POSIX_SEM */
4916
4917 env->me_txns->mti_magic = MDB_MAGIC;
4918 env->me_txns->mti_format = MDB_LOCK_FORMAT;
4919 env->me_txns->mti_txnid = 0;
4920 env->me_txns->mti_numreaders = 0;
4921
4922 } else {
4923 if (env->me_txns->mti_magic != MDB_MAGIC) {
4924 DPUTS("lock region has invalid magic");
4925 rc = MDB_INVALID;
4926 goto fail;
4927 }
4928 if (env->me_txns->mti_format != MDB_LOCK_FORMAT) {
4929 DPRINTF(("lock region has format+version 0x%x, expected 0x%x",
4930 env->me_txns->mti_format, MDB_LOCK_FORMAT));
4931 rc = MDB_VERSION_MISMATCH;
4932 goto fail;
4933 }
4934 rc = ErrCode();
4935 if (rc && rc != EACCES && rc != EAGAIN) {
4936 goto fail;
4937 }
4938#ifdef _WIN32
4939 env->me_rmutex = OpenMutexA(SYNCHRONIZE, FALSE, env->me_txns->mti_rmname);
4940 if (!env->me_rmutex) goto fail_errno;
4941 env->me_wmutex = OpenMutexA(SYNCHRONIZE, FALSE, env->me_txns->mti_wmname);
4942 if (!env->me_wmutex) goto fail_errno;
4943#elif defined(MDB_USE_POSIX_SEM)
4944 env->me_rmutex = sem_open(env->me_txns->mti_rmname, 0);
4945 if (env->me_rmutex == SEM_FAILED) goto fail_errno;
4946 env->me_wmutex = sem_open(env->me_txns->mti_wmname, 0);
4947 if (env->me_wmutex == SEM_FAILED) goto fail_errno;
4948#endif
4949 }
4950 return MDB_SUCCESS;
4951
4952fail_errno:
4953 rc = ErrCode();
4954fail:
4955 return rc;
4956}
4957
4962#define CHANGEABLE (MDB_NOSYNC|MDB_NOMETASYNC|MDB_MAPASYNC|MDB_NOMEMINIT)
4963#define CHANGELESS (MDB_FIXEDMAP|MDB_NOSUBDIR|MDB_RDONLY| \
4964 MDB_WRITEMAP|MDB_NOTLS|MDB_NOLOCK|MDB_NORDAHEAD)
4965
4966#if VALID_FLAGS & PERSISTENT_FLAGS & (CHANGEABLE|CHANGELESS)
4967# error "Persistent DB flags & env flags overlap, but both go in mm_flags"
4968#endif
4969
4970int ESECT
4971mdb_env_open(MDB_env *env, const char *path, unsigned int flags, mdb_mode_t mode)
4972{
4973 int rc, excl = -1;
4974 MDB_name fname;
4975
4976 if (env->me_fd!=INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE || (flags & ~(CHANGEABLE|CHANGELESS)))
4977 return EINVAL;
4978
4979 flags |= env->me_flags;
4980
4981 rc = mdb_fname_init(path, flags, &fname);
4982 if (rc)
4983 return rc;
4984
4985 if (flags & MDB_RDONLY) {
4986 /* silently ignore WRITEMAP when we're only getting read access */
4987 flags &= ~MDB_WRITEMAP;
4988 } else {
4989 if (!((env->me_free_pgs = mdb_midl_alloc(MDB_IDL_UM_MAX)) &&
4990 (env->me_dirty_list = calloc(MDB_IDL_UM_SIZE, sizeof(MDB_ID2)))))
4991 rc = ENOMEM;
4992 }
4993 env->me_flags = flags |= MDB_ENV_ACTIVE;
4994 if (rc)
4995 goto leave;
4996
4997#ifdef _MSC_VER
4998 env->me_path = _strdup(path);
4999#else
5000 env->me_path = strdup(path);
5001#endif
5002 env->me_dbxs = calloc(env->me_maxdbs, sizeof(MDB_dbx));
5003 env->me_dbflags = calloc(env->me_maxdbs, sizeof(uint16_t));
5004 env->me_dbiseqs = calloc(env->me_maxdbs, sizeof(unsigned int));
5005 if (!(env->me_dbxs && env->me_path && env->me_dbflags && env->me_dbiseqs)) {
5006 rc = ENOMEM;
5007 goto leave;
5008 }
5009 env->me_dbxs[FREE_DBI].md_cmp = mdb_cmp_long; /* aligned MDB_INTEGERKEY */
5010
5011 /* For RDONLY, get lockfile after we know datafile exists */
5012 if (!(flags & (MDB_RDONLY|MDB_NOLOCK))) {
5013 rc = mdb_env_setup_locks(env, &fname, mode, &excl);
5014 if (rc)
5015 goto leave;
5016 }
5017
5018 rc = mdb_fopen(env, &fname,
5019 (flags & MDB_RDONLY) ? MDB_O_RDONLY : MDB_O_RDWR,
5020 mode, &env->me_fd);
5021 if (rc)
5022 goto leave;
5023
5024 if ((flags & (MDB_RDONLY|MDB_NOLOCK)) == MDB_RDONLY) {
5025 rc = mdb_env_setup_locks(env, &fname, mode, &excl);
5026 if (rc)
5027 goto leave;
5028 }
5029
5030 if ((rc = mdb_env_open2(env)) == MDB_SUCCESS) {
5031 if (!(flags & (MDB_RDONLY|MDB_WRITEMAP))) {
5032 /* Synchronous fd for meta writes. Needed even with
5033 * MDB_NOSYNC/MDB_NOMETASYNC, in case these get reset.
5034 */
5035 rc = mdb_fopen(env, &fname, MDB_O_META, mode, &env->me_mfd);
5036 if (rc)
5037 goto leave;
5038 }
5039 DPRINTF(("opened dbenv %p", (void *) env));
5040 if (excl > 0) {
5041 rc = mdb_env_share_locks(env, &excl);
5042 if (rc)
5043 goto leave;
5044 }
5045 if (!(flags & MDB_RDONLY)) {
5046 MDB_txn *txn;
5047 int tsize = sizeof(MDB_txn), size = tsize + env->me_maxdbs *
5048 (sizeof(MDB_db)+sizeof(MDB_cursor *)+sizeof(unsigned int)+1);
5049 if ((env->me_pbuf = calloc(1, env->me_psize)) &&
5050 (txn = calloc(1, size)))
5051 {
5052 txn->mt_dbs = (MDB_db *)((char *)txn + tsize);
5053 txn->mt_cursors = (MDB_cursor **)(txn->mt_dbs + env->me_maxdbs);
5054 txn->mt_dbiseqs = (unsigned int *)(txn->mt_cursors + env->me_maxdbs);
5055 txn->mt_dbflags = (unsigned char *)(txn->mt_dbiseqs + env->me_maxdbs);
5056 txn->mt_env = env;
5057 txn->mt_dbxs = env->me_dbxs;
5058 txn->mt_flags = MDB_TXN_FINISHED;
5059 env->me_txn0 = txn;
5060 } else {
5061 rc = ENOMEM;
5062 }
5063 }
5064 }
5065
5066leave:
5067 if (rc) {
5068 mdb_env_close0(env, excl);
5069 }
5070 mdb_fname_destroy(fname);
5071 return rc;
5072}
5073
5075static void ESECT
5076mdb_env_close0(MDB_env *env, int excl)
5077{
5078 int i;
5079
5080 if (!(env->me_flags & MDB_ENV_ACTIVE))
5081 return;
5082
5083 /* Doing this here since me_dbxs may not exist during mdb_env_close */
5084 if (env->me_dbxs) {
5085 for (i = env->me_maxdbs; --i >= CORE_DBS; )
5086 free(env->me_dbxs[i].md_name.mv_data);
5087 free(env->me_dbxs);
5088 }
5089
5090 free(env->me_pbuf);
5091 free(env->me_dbiseqs);
5092 free(env->me_dbflags);
5093 free(env->me_path);
5094 free(env->me_dirty_list);
5095 free(env->me_txn0);
5096 mdb_midl_free(env->me_free_pgs);
5097
5098 if (env->me_flags & MDB_ENV_TXKEY) {
5099 pthread_key_delete(env->me_txkey);
5100#ifdef _WIN32
5101 /* Delete our key from the global list */
5102 for (i=0; i<mdb_tls_nkeys; i++)
5103 if (mdb_tls_keys[i] == env->me_txkey) {
5104 mdb_tls_keys[i] = mdb_tls_keys[mdb_tls_nkeys-1];
5105 mdb_tls_nkeys--;
5106 break;
5107 }
5108#endif
5109 }
5110
5111 if (env->me_map) {
5112 munmap(env->me_map, env->me_mapsize);
5113 }
5114 if (env->me_mfd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
5115 (void) close(env->me_mfd);
5116 if (env->me_fd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
5117 (void) close(env->me_fd);
5118 if (env->me_txns) {
5119 MDB_PID_T pid = getpid();
5120 /* Clearing readers is done in this function because
5121 * me_txkey with its destructor must be disabled first.
5122 *
5123 * We skip the the reader mutex, so we touch only
5124 * data owned by this process (me_close_readers and
5125 * our readers), and clear each reader atomically.
5126 */
5127 for (i = env->me_close_readers; --i >= 0; )
5128 if (env->me_txns->mti_readers[i].mr_pid == pid)
5129 env->me_txns->mti_readers[i].mr_pid = 0;
5130#ifdef _WIN32
5131 if (env->me_rmutex) {
5132 CloseHandle(env->me_rmutex);
5133 if (env->me_wmutex) CloseHandle(env->me_wmutex);
5134 }
5135 /* Windows automatically destroys the mutexes when
5136 * the last handle closes.
5137 */
5138#elif defined(MDB_USE_POSIX_SEM)
5139 if (env->me_rmutex != SEM_FAILED) {
5140 sem_close(env->me_rmutex);
5141 if (env->me_wmutex != SEM_FAILED)
5142 sem_close(env->me_wmutex);
5143 /* If we have the filelock: If we are the
5144 * only remaining user, clean up semaphores.
5145 */
5146 if (excl == 0)
5147 mdb_env_excl_lock(env, &excl);
5148 if (excl > 0) {
5149 sem_unlink(env->me_txns->mti_rmname);
5150 sem_unlink(env->me_txns->mti_wmname);
5151 }
5152 }
5153#elif defined(MDB_ROBUST_SUPPORTED)
5154 /* If we have the filelock: If we are the
5155 * only remaining user, clean up robust
5156 * mutexes.
5157 */
5158 if (excl == 0)
5159 mdb_env_excl_lock(env, &excl);
5160 if (excl > 0) {
5161 pthread_mutex_destroy(env->me_txns->mti_rmutex);
5162 pthread_mutex_destroy(env->me_txns->mti_wmutex);
5163 }
5164#endif
5165 munmap((void *)env->me_txns, (env->me_maxreaders-1)*sizeof(MDB_reader)+sizeof(MDB_txninfo));
5166 }
5167 if (env->me_lfd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
5168#ifdef _WIN32
5169 if (excl >= 0) {
5170 /* Unlock the lockfile. Windows would have unlocked it
5171 * after closing anyway, but not necessarily at once.
5172 */
5173 UnlockFile(env->me_lfd, 0, 0, 1, 0);
5174 }
5175#endif
5176 (void) close(env->me_lfd);
5177 }
5178
5179 env->me_flags &= ~(MDB_ENV_ACTIVE|MDB_ENV_TXKEY);
5180}
5181
5182void ESECT
5183mdb_env_close(MDB_env *env)
5184{
5185 MDB_page *dp;
5186
5187 if (env == NULL)
5188 return;
5189
5190 VGMEMP_DESTROY(env);
5191 while ((dp = env->me_dpages) != NULL) {
5192 VGMEMP_DEFINED(&dp->mp_next, sizeof(dp->mp_next));
5193 env->me_dpages = dp->mp_next;
5194 free(dp);
5195 }
5196
5197 mdb_env_close0(env, 0);
5198 free(env);
5199}
5200
5202static int
5203mdb_cmp_long(const MDB_val *a, const MDB_val *b)
5204{
5205 return (*(size_t *)a->mv_data < *(size_t *)b->mv_data) ? -1 :
5206 *(size_t *)a->mv_data > *(size_t *)b->mv_data;
5207}
5208
5214static int
5215mdb_cmp_int(const MDB_val *a, const MDB_val *b)
5216{
5217 return (*(unsigned int *)a->mv_data < *(unsigned int *)b->mv_data) ? -1 :
5218 *(unsigned int *)a->mv_data > *(unsigned int *)b->mv_data;
5219}
5220
5224static int
5225mdb_cmp_cint(const MDB_val *a, const MDB_val *b)
5226{
5227#if BYTE_ORDER == LITTLE_ENDIAN
5228 unsigned short *u, *c;
5229 int x;
5230
5231 u = (unsigned short *) ((char *) a->mv_data + a->mv_size);
5232 c = (unsigned short *) ((char *) b->mv_data + a->mv_size);
5233 do {
5234 x = *--u - *--c;
5235 } while(!x && u > (unsigned short *)a->mv_data);
5236 return x;
5237#else
5238 unsigned short *u, *c, *end;
5239 int x;
5240
5241 end = (unsigned short *) ((char *) a->mv_data + a->mv_size);
5242 u = (unsigned short *)a->mv_data;
5243 c = (unsigned short *)b->mv_data;
5244 do {
5245 x = *u++ - *c++;
5246 } while(!x && u < end);
5247 return x;
5248#endif
5249}
5250
5252static int
5253mdb_cmp_memn(const MDB_val *a, const MDB_val *b)
5254{
5255 int diff;
5256 ssize_t len_diff;
5257 unsigned int len;
5258
5259 len = a->mv_size;
5260 len_diff = (ssize_t) a->mv_size - (ssize_t) b->mv_size;
5261 if (len_diff > 0) {
5262 len = b->mv_size;
5263 len_diff = 1;
5264 }
5265
5266 diff = memcmp(a->mv_data, b->mv_data, len);
5267 return diff ? diff : len_diff<0 ? -1 : len_diff;
5268}
5269
5271static int
5272mdb_cmp_memnr(const MDB_val *a, const MDB_val *b)
5273{
5274 const unsigned char *p1, *p2, *p1_lim;
5275 ssize_t len_diff;
5276 int diff;
5277
5278 p1_lim = (const unsigned char *)a->mv_data;
5279 p1 = (const unsigned char *)a->mv_data + a->mv_size;
5280 p2 = (const unsigned char *)b->mv_data + b->mv_size;
5281
5282 len_diff = (ssize_t) a->mv_size - (ssize_t) b->mv_size;
5283 if (len_diff > 0) {
5284 p1_lim += len_diff;
5285 len_diff = 1;
5286 }
5287
5288 while (p1 > p1_lim) {
5289 diff = *--p1 - *--p2;
5290 if (diff)
5291 return diff;
5292 }
5293 return len_diff<0 ? -1 : len_diff;
5294}
5295
5303static MDB_node *
5304mdb_node_search(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, int *exactp)
5305{
5306 unsigned int i = 0, nkeys;
5307 int low, high;
5308 int rc = 0;
5309 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5310 MDB_node *node = NULL;
5311 MDB_val nodekey;
5312 MDB_cmp_func *cmp;
5313 DKBUF;
5314
5315 nkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
5316
5317 DPRINTF(("searching %u keys in %s %spage %"Z"u",
5318 nkeys, IS_LEAF(mp) ? "leaf" : "branch", IS_SUBP(mp) ? "sub-" : "",
5319 mdb_dbg_pgno(mp)));
5320
5321 low = IS_LEAF(mp) ? 0 : 1;
5322 high = nkeys - 1;
5323 cmp = mc->mc_dbx->md_cmp;
5324
5325 /* Branch pages have no data, so if using integer keys,
5326 * alignment is guaranteed. Use faster mdb_cmp_int.
5327 */
5328 if (cmp == mdb_cmp_cint && IS_BRANCH(mp)) {
5329 if (NODEPTR(mp, 1)->mn_ksize == sizeof(size_t))
5330 cmp = mdb_cmp_long;
5331 else
5332 cmp = mdb_cmp_int;
5333 }
5334
5335 if (IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
5336 nodekey.mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
5337 node = NODEPTR(mp, 0); /* fake */
5338 while (low <= high) {
5339 i = (low + high) >> 1;
5340 nodekey.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp, i, nodekey.mv_size);
5341 rc = cmp(key, &nodekey);
5342 DPRINTF(("found leaf index %u [%s], rc = %i",
5343 i, DKEY(&nodekey), rc));
5344 if (rc == 0)
5345 break;
5346 if (rc > 0)
5347 low = i + 1;
5348 else
5349 high = i - 1;
5350 }
5351 } else {
5352 while (low <= high) {
5353 i = (low + high) >> 1;
5354
5355 node = NODEPTR(mp, i);
5356 nodekey.mv_size = NODEKSZ(node);
5357 nodekey.mv_data = NODEKEY(node);
5358
5359 rc = cmp(key, &nodekey);
5360#if MDB_DEBUG
5361 if (IS_LEAF(mp))
5362 DPRINTF(("found leaf index %u [%s], rc = %i",
5363 i, DKEY(&nodekey), rc));
5364 else
5365 DPRINTF(("found branch index %u [%s -> %"Z"u], rc = %i",
5366 i, DKEY(&nodekey), NODEPGNO(node), rc));
5367#endif
5368 if (rc == 0)
5369 break;
5370 if (rc > 0)
5371 low = i + 1;
5372 else
5373 high = i - 1;
5374 }
5375 }
5376
5377 if (rc > 0) { /* Found entry is less than the key. */
5378 i++; /* Skip to get the smallest entry larger than key. */
5379 if (!IS_LEAF2(mp))
5380 node = NODEPTR(mp, i);
5381 }
5382 if (exactp)
5383 *exactp = (rc == 0 && nkeys > 0);
5384 /* store the key index */
5385 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = i;
5386 if (i >= nkeys)
5387 /* There is no entry larger or equal to the key. */
5388 return NULL;
5389
5390 /* nodeptr is fake for LEAF2 */
5391 return node;
5392}
5393
5394#if 0
5395static void
5396mdb_cursor_adjust(MDB_cursor *mc, func)
5397{
5398 MDB_cursor *m2;
5399
5400 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[mc->mc_dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
5401 if (m2->mc_pg[m2->mc_top] == mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) {
5402 func(mc, m2);
5403 }
5404 }
5405}
5406#endif
5407
5409static void
5410mdb_cursor_pop(MDB_cursor *mc)
5411{
5412 if (mc->mc_snum) {
5413 DPRINTF(("popping page %"Z"u off db %d cursor %p",
5414 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]->mp_pgno, DDBI(mc), (void *) mc));
5415
5416 mc->mc_snum--;
5417 if (mc->mc_snum) {
5418 mc->mc_top--;
5419 } else {
5420 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_INITIALIZED;
5421 }
5422 }
5423}
5424
5428static int
5429mdb_cursor_push(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_page *mp)
5430{
5431 DPRINTF(("pushing page %"Z"u on db %d cursor %p", mp->mp_pgno,
5432 DDBI(mc), (void *) mc));
5433
5434 if (mc->mc_snum >= CURSOR_STACK) {
5435 mc->mc_txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
5436 return MDB_CURSOR_FULL;
5437 }
5438
5439 mc->mc_top = mc->mc_snum++;
5440 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = mp;
5441 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
5442
5443 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5444}
5445
5454static int
5455mdb_page_get(MDB_cursor *mc, pgno_t pgno, MDB_page **ret, int *lvl)
5456{
5457 MDB_txn *txn = mc->mc_txn;
5458 MDB_env *env = txn->mt_env;
5459 MDB_page *p = NULL;
5460 int level;
5461
5462 if (! (txn->mt_flags & (MDB_TXN_RDONLY|MDB_TXN_WRITEMAP))) {
5463 MDB_txn *tx2 = txn;
5464 level = 1;
5465 do {
5466 MDB_ID2L dl = tx2->mt_u.dirty_list;
5467 unsigned x;
5468 /* Spilled pages were dirtied in this txn and flushed
5469 * because the dirty list got full. Bring this page
5470 * back in from the map (but don't unspill it here,
5471 * leave that unless page_touch happens again).
5472 */
5473 if (tx2->mt_spill_pgs) {
5474 MDB_ID pn = pgno << 1;
5475 x = mdb_midl_search(tx2->mt_spill_pgs, pn);
5476 if (x <= tx2->mt_spill_pgs[0] && tx2->mt_spill_pgs[x] == pn) {
5477 p = (MDB_page *)(env->me_map + env->me_psize * pgno);
5478 goto done;
5479 }
5480 }
5481 if (dl[0].mid) {
5482 unsigned x = mdb_mid2l_search(dl, pgno);
5483 if (x <= dl[0].mid && dl[x].mid == pgno) {
5484 p = dl[x].mptr;
5485 goto done;
5486 }
5487 }
5488 level++;
5489 } while ((tx2 = tx2->mt_parent) != NULL);
5490 }
5491
5492 if (pgno < txn->mt_next_pgno) {
5493 level = 0;
5494 p = (MDB_page *)(env->me_map + env->me_psize * pgno);
5495 } else {
5496 DPRINTF(("page %"Z"u not found", pgno));
5497 txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
5498 return MDB_PAGE_NOTFOUND;
5499 }
5500
5501done:
5502 *ret = p;
5503 if (lvl)
5504 *lvl = level;
5505 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5506}
5507
5511static int
5512mdb_page_search_root(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, int flags)
5513{
5514 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5515 int rc;
5516 DKBUF;
5517
5518 while (IS_BRANCH(mp)) {
5519 MDB_node *node;
5520 indx_t i;
5521
5522 DPRINTF(("branch page %"Z"u has %u keys", mp->mp_pgno, NUMKEYS(mp)));
5523 /* Don't assert on branch pages in the FreeDB. We can get here
5524 * while in the process of rebalancing a FreeDB branch page; we must
5525 * let that proceed. ITS#8336
5526 */
5527 mdb_cassert(mc, !mc->mc_dbi || NUMKEYS(mp) > 1);
5528 DPRINTF(("found index 0 to page %"Z"u", NODEPGNO(NODEPTR(mp, 0))));
5529
5530 if (flags & (MDB_PS_FIRST|MDB_PS_LAST)) {
5531 i = 0;
5532 if (flags & MDB_PS_LAST) {
5533 i = NUMKEYS(mp) - 1;
5534 /* if already init'd, see if we're already in right place */
5535 if (mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) {
5536 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] == i) {
5537 mc->mc_top = mc->mc_snum++;
5538 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5539 goto ready;
5540 }
5541 }
5542 }
5543 } else {
5544 int exact;
5545 node = mdb_node_search(mc, key, &exact);
5546 if (node == NULL)
5547 i = NUMKEYS(mp) - 1;
5548 else {
5549 i = mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top];
5550 if (!exact) {
5551 mdb_cassert(mc, i > 0);
5552 i--;
5553 }
5554 }
5555 DPRINTF(("following index %u for key [%s]", i, DKEY(key)));
5556 }
5557
5558 mdb_cassert(mc, i < NUMKEYS(mp));
5559 node = NODEPTR(mp, i);
5560
5561 if ((rc = mdb_page_get(mc, NODEPGNO(node), &mp, NULL)) != 0)
5562 return rc;
5563
5564 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = i;
5565 if ((rc = mdb_cursor_push(mc, mp)))
5566 return rc;
5567
5568ready:
5569 if (flags & MDB_PS_MODIFY) {
5570 if ((rc = mdb_page_touch(mc)) != 0)
5571 return rc;
5572 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5573 }
5574 }
5575
5576 if (!IS_LEAF(mp)) {
5577 DPRINTF(("internal error, index points to a %02X page!?",
5578 mp->mp_flags));
5579 mc->mc_txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
5580 return MDB_CORRUPTED;
5581 }
5582
5583 DPRINTF(("found leaf page %"Z"u for key [%s]", mp->mp_pgno,
5584 key ? DKEY(key) : "null"));
5585 mc->mc_flags |= C_INITIALIZED;
5586 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_EOF;
5587
5588 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5589}
5590
5597static int
5598mdb_page_search_lowest(MDB_cursor *mc)
5599{
5600 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5601 MDB_node *node = NODEPTR(mp, 0);
5602 int rc;
5603
5604 if ((rc = mdb_page_get(mc, NODEPGNO(node), &mp, NULL)) != 0)
5605 return rc;
5606
5607 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
5608 if ((rc = mdb_cursor_push(mc, mp)))
5609 return rc;
5610 return mdb_page_search_root(mc, NULL, MDB_PS_FIRST);
5611}
5612
5624static int
5625mdb_page_search(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, int flags)
5626{
5627 int rc;
5628 pgno_t root;
5629
5630 /* Make sure the txn is still viable, then find the root from
5631 * the txn's db table and set it as the root of the cursor's stack.
5632 */
5633 if (mc->mc_txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED) {
5634 DPUTS("transaction may not be used now");
5635 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
5636 } else {
5637 /* Make sure we're using an up-to-date root */
5638 if (*mc->mc_dbflag & DB_STALE) {
5639 MDB_cursor mc2;
5640 if (TXN_DBI_CHANGED(mc->mc_txn, mc->mc_dbi))
5641 return MDB_BAD_DBI;
5642 mdb_cursor_init(&mc2, mc->mc_txn, MAIN_DBI, NULL);
5643 rc = mdb_page_search(&mc2, &mc->mc_dbx->md_name, 0);
5644 if (rc)
5645 return rc;
5646 {
5647 MDB_val data;
5648 int exact = 0;
5649 uint16_t flags;
5650 MDB_node *leaf = mdb_node_search(&mc2,
5651 &mc->mc_dbx->md_name, &exact);
5652 if (!exact)
5653 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
5654 if ((leaf->mn_flags & (F_DUPDATA|F_SUBDATA)) != F_SUBDATA)
5655 return MDB_INCOMPATIBLE; /* not a named DB */
5656 rc = mdb_node_read(&mc2, leaf, &data);
5657 if (rc)
5658 return rc;
5659 memcpy(&flags, ((char *) data.mv_data + offsetof(MDB_db, md_flags)),
5660 sizeof(uint16_t));
5661 /* The txn may not know this DBI, or another process may
5662 * have dropped and recreated the DB with other flags.
5663 */
5664 if ((mc->mc_db->md_flags & PERSISTENT_FLAGS) != flags)
5665 return MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
5666 memcpy(mc->mc_db, data.mv_data, sizeof(MDB_db));
5667 }
5668 *mc->mc_dbflag &= ~DB_STALE;
5669 }
5670 root = mc->mc_db->md_root;
5671
5672 if (root == P_INVALID) { /* Tree is empty. */
5673 DPUTS("tree is empty");
5674 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
5675 }
5676 }
5677
5678 mdb_cassert(mc, root > 1);
5679 if (!mc->mc_pg[0] || mc->mc_pg[0]->mp_pgno != root)
5680 if ((rc = mdb_page_get(mc, root, &mc->mc_pg[0], NULL)) != 0)
5681 return rc;
5682
5683 mc->mc_snum = 1;
5684 mc->mc_top = 0;
5685
5686 DPRINTF(("db %d root page %"Z"u has flags 0x%X",
5687 DDBI(mc), root, mc->mc_pg[0]->mp_flags));
5688
5689 if (flags & MDB_PS_MODIFY) {
5690 if ((rc = mdb_page_touch(mc)))
5691 return rc;
5692 }
5693
5694 if (flags & MDB_PS_ROOTONLY)
5695 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5696
5697 return mdb_page_search_root(mc, key, flags);
5698}
5699
5700static int
5701mdb_ovpage_free(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_page *mp)
5702{
5703 MDB_txn *txn = mc->mc_txn;
5704 pgno_t pg = mp->mp_pgno;
5705 unsigned x = 0, ovpages = mp->mp_pages;
5706 MDB_env *env = txn->mt_env;
5707 MDB_IDL sl = txn->mt_spill_pgs;
5708 MDB_ID pn = pg << 1;
5709 int rc;
5710
5711 DPRINTF(("free ov page %"Z"u (%d)", pg, ovpages));
5712 /* If the page is dirty or on the spill list we just acquired it,
5713 * so we should give it back to our current free list, if any.
5714 * Otherwise put it onto the list of pages we freed in this txn.
5715 *
5716 * Won't create me_pghead: me_pglast must be inited along with it.
5717 * Unsupported in nested txns: They would need to hide the page
5718 * range in ancestor txns' dirty and spilled lists.
5719 */
5720 if (env->me_pghead &&
5721 !txn->mt_parent &&
5722 ((mp->mp_flags & P_DIRTY) ||
5723 (sl && (x = mdb_midl_search(sl, pn)) <= sl[0] && sl[x] == pn)))
5724 {
5725 unsigned i, j;
5726 pgno_t *mop;
5727 MDB_ID2 *dl, ix, iy;
5728 rc = mdb_midl_need(&env->me_pghead, ovpages);
5729 if (rc)
5730 return rc;
5731 if (!(mp->mp_flags & P_DIRTY)) {
5732 /* This page is no longer spilled */
5733 if (x == sl[0])
5734 sl[0]--;
5735 else
5736 sl[x] |= 1;
5737 goto release;
5738 }
5739 /* Remove from dirty list */
5740 dl = txn->mt_u.dirty_list;
5741 x = dl[0].mid--;
5742 for (ix = dl[x]; ix.mptr != mp; ix = iy) {
5743 if (x > 1) {
5744 x--;
5745 iy = dl[x];
5746 dl[x] = ix;
5747 } else {
5748 mdb_cassert(mc, x > 1);
5749 j = ++(dl[0].mid);
5750 dl[j] = ix; /* Unsorted. OK when MDB_TXN_ERROR. */
5751 txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
5752 return MDB_CORRUPTED;
5753 }
5754 }
5755 txn->mt_dirty_room++;
5756 if (!(env->me_flags & MDB_WRITEMAP))
5757 mdb_dpage_free(env, mp);
5758release:
5759 /* Insert in me_pghead */
5760 mop = env->me_pghead;
5761 j = mop[0] + ovpages;
5762 for (i = mop[0]; i && mop[i] < pg; i--)
5763 mop[j--] = mop[i];
5764 while (j>i)
5765 mop[j--] = pg++;
5766 mop[0] += ovpages;
5767 } else {
5768 rc = mdb_midl_append_range(&txn->mt_free_pgs, pg, ovpages);
5769 if (rc)
5770 return rc;
5771 }
5772 mc->mc_db->md_overflow_pages -= ovpages;
5773 return 0;
5774}
5775
5782static int
5783mdb_node_read(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_node *leaf, MDB_val *data)
5784{
5785 MDB_page *omp; /* overflow page */
5786 pgno_t pgno;
5787 int rc;
5788
5789 if (!F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_BIGDATA)) {
5790 data->mv_size = NODEDSZ(leaf);
5791 data->mv_data = NODEDATA(leaf);
5792 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5793 }
5794
5795 /* Read overflow data.
5796 */
5797 data->mv_size = NODEDSZ(leaf);
5798 memcpy(&pgno, NODEDATA(leaf), sizeof(pgno));
5799 if ((rc = mdb_page_get(mc, pgno, &omp, NULL)) != 0) {
5800 DPRINTF(("read overflow page %"Z"u failed", pgno));
5801 return rc;
5802 }
5803 data->mv_data = METADATA(omp);
5804
5805 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5806}
5807
5808int
5809mdb_get(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi,
5810 MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data)
5811{
5812 MDB_cursor mc;
5813 MDB_xcursor mx;
5814 int exact = 0;
5815 DKBUF;
5816
5817 DPRINTF(("===> get db %u key [%s]", dbi, DKEY(key)));
5818
5819 if (!key || !data || !TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
5820 return EINVAL;
5821
5822 if (txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED)
5823 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
5824
5825 mdb_cursor_init(&mc, txn, dbi, &mx);
5826 return mdb_cursor_set(&mc, key, data, MDB_SET, &exact);
5827}
5828
5837static int
5838mdb_cursor_sibling(MDB_cursor *mc, int move_right)
5839{
5840 int rc;
5841 MDB_node *indx;
5842 MDB_page *mp;
5843
5844 if (mc->mc_snum < 2) {
5845 return MDB_NOTFOUND; /* root has no siblings */
5846 }
5847
5848 mdb_cursor_pop(mc);
5849 DPRINTF(("parent page is page %"Z"u, index %u",
5850 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]->mp_pgno, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]));
5851
5852 if (move_right ? (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] + 1u >= NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]))
5853 : (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] == 0)) {
5854 DPRINTF(("no more keys left, moving to %s sibling",
5855 move_right ? "right" : "left"));
5856 if ((rc = mdb_cursor_sibling(mc, move_right)) != MDB_SUCCESS) {
5857 /* undo cursor_pop before returning */
5858 mc->mc_top++;
5859 mc->mc_snum++;
5860 return rc;
5861 }
5862 } else {
5863 if (move_right)
5864 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]++;
5865 else
5866 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]--;
5867 DPRINTF(("just moving to %s index key %u",
5868 move_right ? "right" : "left", mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]));
5869 }
5870 mdb_cassert(mc, IS_BRANCH(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]));
5871
5872 indx = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
5873 if ((rc = mdb_page_get(mc, NODEPGNO(indx), &mp, NULL)) != 0) {
5874 /* mc will be inconsistent if caller does mc_snum++ as above */
5875 mc->mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
5876 return rc;
5877 }
5878
5879 mdb_cursor_push(mc, mp);
5880 if (!move_right)
5881 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = NUMKEYS(mp)-1;
5882
5883 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5884}
5885
5887static int
5888mdb_cursor_next(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data, MDB_cursor_op op)
5889{
5890 MDB_page *mp;
5891 MDB_node *leaf;
5892 int rc;
5893
5894 if ((mc->mc_flags & C_DEL && op == MDB_NEXT_DUP))
5895 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
5896
5897 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
5898 return mdb_cursor_first(mc, key, data);
5899
5900 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5901
5902 if (mc->mc_flags & C_EOF) {
5903 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= NUMKEYS(mp)-1)
5904 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
5905 mc->mc_flags ^= C_EOF;
5906 }
5907
5908 if (mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT) {
5909 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
5910 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
5911 if (op == MDB_NEXT || op == MDB_NEXT_DUP) {
5912 rc = mdb_cursor_next(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL, MDB_NEXT);
5913 if (op != MDB_NEXT || rc != MDB_NOTFOUND) {
5914 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS)
5915 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
5916 return rc;
5917 }
5918 }
5919 } else {
5920 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
5921 if (op == MDB_NEXT_DUP)
5922 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
5923 }
5924 }
5925
5926 DPRINTF(("cursor_next: top page is %"Z"u in cursor %p",
5927 mdb_dbg_pgno(mp), (void *) mc));
5928 if (mc->mc_flags & C_DEL) {
5929 mc->mc_flags ^= C_DEL;
5930 goto skip;
5931 }
5932
5933 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] + 1u >= NUMKEYS(mp)) {
5934 DPUTS("=====> move to next sibling page");
5935 if ((rc = mdb_cursor_sibling(mc, 1)) != MDB_SUCCESS) {
5936 mc->mc_flags |= C_EOF;
5937 return rc;
5938 }
5939 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5940 DPRINTF(("next page is %"Z"u, key index %u", mp->mp_pgno, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]));
5941 } else
5942 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]++;
5943
5944skip:
5945 DPRINTF(("==> cursor points to page %"Z"u with %u keys, key index %u",
5946 mdb_dbg_pgno(mp), NUMKEYS(mp), mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]));
5947
5948 if (IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
5949 key->mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
5950 key->mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], key->mv_size);
5951 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5952 }
5953
5954 mdb_cassert(mc, IS_LEAF(mp));
5955 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
5956
5957 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
5958 mdb_xcursor_init1(mc, leaf);
5959 rc = mdb_cursor_first(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL);
5960 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
5961 return rc;
5962 } else if (data) {
5963 if ((rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, data)) != MDB_SUCCESS)
5964 return rc;
5965 }
5966
5967 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
5968 return MDB_SUCCESS;
5969}
5970
5972static int
5973mdb_cursor_prev(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data, MDB_cursor_op op)
5974{
5975 MDB_page *mp;
5976 MDB_node *leaf;
5977 int rc;
5978
5979 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) {
5980 rc = mdb_cursor_last(mc, key, data);
5981 if (rc)
5982 return rc;
5983 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]++;
5984 }
5985
5986 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
5987
5988 if ((mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT) &&
5989 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] < NUMKEYS(mp)) {
5990 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
5991 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
5992 if (op == MDB_PREV || op == MDB_PREV_DUP) {
5993 rc = mdb_cursor_prev(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL, MDB_PREV);
5994 if (op != MDB_PREV || rc != MDB_NOTFOUND) {
5995 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
5996 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
5997 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_EOF;
5998 }
5999 return rc;
6000 }
6001 }
6002 } else {
6003 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
6004 if (op == MDB_PREV_DUP)
6005 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
6006 }
6007 }
6008
6009 DPRINTF(("cursor_prev: top page is %"Z"u in cursor %p",
6010 mdb_dbg_pgno(mp), (void *) mc));
6011
6012 mc->mc_flags &= ~(C_EOF|C_DEL);
6013
6014 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] == 0) {
6015 DPUTS("=====> move to prev sibling page");
6016 if ((rc = mdb_cursor_sibling(mc, 0)) != MDB_SUCCESS) {
6017 return rc;
6018 }
6019 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
6020 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = NUMKEYS(mp) - 1;
6021 DPRINTF(("prev page is %"Z"u, key index %u", mp->mp_pgno, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]));
6022 } else
6023 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]--;
6024
6025 DPRINTF(("==> cursor points to page %"Z"u with %u keys, key index %u",
6026 mdb_dbg_pgno(mp), NUMKEYS(mp), mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]));
6027
6028 if (!IS_LEAF(mp))
6029 return MDB_CORRUPTED;
6030
6031 if (IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
6032 key->mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
6033 key->mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], key->mv_size);
6034 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6035 }
6036
6037 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
6038
6039 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
6040 mdb_xcursor_init1(mc, leaf);
6041 rc = mdb_cursor_last(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL);
6042 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
6043 return rc;
6044 } else if (data) {
6045 if ((rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, data)) != MDB_SUCCESS)
6046 return rc;
6047 }
6048
6049 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
6050 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6051}
6052
6054static int
6055mdb_cursor_set(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data,
6056 MDB_cursor_op op, int *exactp)
6057{
6058 int rc;
6059 MDB_page *mp;
6060 MDB_node *leaf = NULL;
6061 DKBUF;
6062
6063 if (key->mv_size == 0)
6064 return MDB_BAD_VALSIZE;
6065
6066 if (mc->mc_xcursor)
6067 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
6068
6069 /* See if we're already on the right page */
6070 if (mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) {
6071 MDB_val nodekey;
6072
6073 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
6074 if (!NUMKEYS(mp)) {
6075 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
6076 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
6077 }
6078 if (mp->mp_flags & P_LEAF2) {
6079 nodekey.mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
6080 nodekey.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp, 0, nodekey.mv_size);
6081 } else {
6082 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, 0);
6083 MDB_GET_KEY2(leaf, nodekey);
6084 }
6085 rc = mc->mc_dbx->md_cmp(key, &nodekey);
6086 if (rc == 0) {
6087 /* Probably happens rarely, but first node on the page
6088 * was the one we wanted.
6089 */
6090 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
6091 if (exactp)
6092 *exactp = 1;
6093 goto set1;
6094 }
6095 if (rc > 0) {
6096 unsigned int i;
6097 unsigned int nkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
6098 if (nkeys > 1) {
6099 if (mp->mp_flags & P_LEAF2) {
6100 nodekey.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp,
6101 nkeys-1, nodekey.mv_size);
6102 } else {
6103 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, nkeys-1);
6104 MDB_GET_KEY2(leaf, nodekey);
6105 }
6106 rc = mc->mc_dbx->md_cmp(key, &nodekey);
6107 if (rc == 0) {
6108 /* last node was the one we wanted */
6109 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = nkeys-1;
6110 if (exactp)
6111 *exactp = 1;
6112 goto set1;
6113 }
6114 if (rc < 0) {
6115 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] < NUMKEYS(mp)) {
6116 /* This is definitely the right page, skip search_page */
6117 if (mp->mp_flags & P_LEAF2) {
6118 nodekey.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp,
6119 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], nodekey.mv_size);
6120 } else {
6121 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
6122 MDB_GET_KEY2(leaf, nodekey);
6123 }
6124 rc = mc->mc_dbx->md_cmp(key, &nodekey);
6125 if (rc == 0) {
6126 /* current node was the one we wanted */
6127 if (exactp)
6128 *exactp = 1;
6129 goto set1;
6130 }
6131 }
6132 rc = 0;
6133 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_EOF;
6134 goto set2;
6135 }
6136 }
6137 /* If any parents have right-sibs, search.
6138 * Otherwise, there's nothing further.
6139 */
6140 for (i=0; i<mc->mc_top; i++)
6141 if (mc->mc_ki[i] <
6142 NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[i])-1)
6143 break;
6144 if (i == mc->mc_top) {
6145 /* There are no other pages */
6146 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = nkeys;
6147 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
6148 }
6149 }
6150 if (!mc->mc_top) {
6151 /* There are no other pages */
6152 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
6153 if (op == MDB_SET_RANGE && !exactp) {
6154 rc = 0;
6155 goto set1;
6156 } else
6157 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
6158 }
6159 } else {
6160 mc->mc_pg[0] = 0;
6161 }
6162
6163 rc = mdb_page_search(mc, key, 0);
6164 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
6165 return rc;
6166
6167 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
6168 mdb_cassert(mc, IS_LEAF(mp));
6169
6170set2:
6171 leaf = mdb_node_search(mc, key, exactp);
6172 if (exactp != NULL && !*exactp) {
6173 /* MDB_SET specified and not an exact match. */
6174 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
6175 }
6176
6177 if (leaf == NULL) {
6178 DPUTS("===> inexact leaf not found, goto sibling");
6179 if ((rc = mdb_cursor_sibling(mc, 1)) != MDB_SUCCESS) {
6180 mc->mc_flags |= C_EOF;
6181 return rc; /* no entries matched */
6182 }
6183 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
6184 mdb_cassert(mc, IS_LEAF(mp));
6185 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, 0);
6186 }
6187
6188set1:
6189 mc->mc_flags |= C_INITIALIZED;
6190 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_EOF;
6191
6192 if (IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
6193 if (op == MDB_SET_RANGE || op == MDB_SET_KEY) {
6194 key->mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
6195 key->mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], key->mv_size);
6196 }
6197 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6198 }
6199
6200 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
6201 mdb_xcursor_init1(mc, leaf);
6202 if (op == MDB_SET || op == MDB_SET_KEY || op == MDB_SET_RANGE) {
6203 rc = mdb_cursor_first(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL);
6204 } else {
6205 int ex2, *ex2p;
6206 if (op == MDB_GET_BOTH) {
6207 ex2p = &ex2;
6208 ex2 = 0;
6209 } else {
6210 ex2p = NULL;
6211 }
6212 rc = mdb_cursor_set(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL, MDB_SET_RANGE, ex2p);
6213 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
6214 return rc;
6215 }
6216 } else if (data) {
6217 if (op == MDB_GET_BOTH || op == MDB_GET_BOTH_RANGE) {
6218 MDB_val olddata;
6219 MDB_cmp_func *dcmp;
6220 if ((rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, &olddata)) != MDB_SUCCESS)
6221 return rc;
6222 dcmp = mc->mc_dbx->md_dcmp;
6223#if UINT_MAX < SIZE_MAX
6224 if (dcmp == mdb_cmp_int && olddata.mv_size == sizeof(size_t))
6225 dcmp = mdb_cmp_clong;
6226#endif
6227 rc = dcmp(data, &olddata);
6228 if (rc) {
6229 if (op == MDB_GET_BOTH || rc > 0)
6230 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
6231 rc = 0;
6232 }
6233 *data = olddata;
6234
6235 } else {
6236 if (mc->mc_xcursor)
6237 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
6238 if ((rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, data)) != MDB_SUCCESS)
6239 return rc;
6240 }
6241 }
6242
6243 /* The key already matches in all other cases */
6244 if (op == MDB_SET_RANGE || op == MDB_SET_KEY)
6245 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
6246 DPRINTF(("==> cursor placed on key [%s]", DKEY(key)));
6247
6248 return rc;
6249}
6250
6252static int
6253mdb_cursor_first(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data)
6254{
6255 int rc;
6256 MDB_node *leaf;
6257
6258 if (mc->mc_xcursor)
6259 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
6260
6261 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) || mc->mc_top) {
6262 rc = mdb_page_search(mc, NULL, MDB_PS_FIRST);
6263 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
6264 return rc;
6265 }
6266 mdb_cassert(mc, IS_LEAF(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]));
6267
6268 leaf = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], 0);
6269 mc->mc_flags |= C_INITIALIZED;
6270 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_EOF;
6271
6272 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
6273
6274 if (IS_LEAF2(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top])) {
6275 if ( key ) {
6276 key->mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
6277 key->mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], 0, key->mv_size);
6278 }
6279 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6280 }
6281
6282 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
6283 mdb_xcursor_init1(mc, leaf);
6284 rc = mdb_cursor_first(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL);
6285 if (rc)
6286 return rc;
6287 } else if (data) {
6288 if ((rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, data)) != MDB_SUCCESS)
6289 return rc;
6290 }
6291
6292 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
6293 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6294}
6295
6297static int
6298mdb_cursor_last(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data)
6299{
6300 int rc;
6301 MDB_node *leaf;
6302
6303 if (mc->mc_xcursor)
6304 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
6305
6306 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) || mc->mc_top) {
6307 rc = mdb_page_search(mc, NULL, MDB_PS_LAST);
6308 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
6309 return rc;
6310 }
6311 mdb_cassert(mc, IS_LEAF(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]));
6312
6313 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) - 1;
6314 mc->mc_flags |= C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF;
6315 leaf = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
6316
6317 if (IS_LEAF2(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top])) {
6318 if (key) {
6319 key->mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
6320 key->mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], key->mv_size);
6321 }
6322 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6323 }
6324
6325 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
6326 mdb_xcursor_init1(mc, leaf);
6327 rc = mdb_cursor_last(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL);
6328 if (rc)
6329 return rc;
6330 } else if (data) {
6331 if ((rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, data)) != MDB_SUCCESS)
6332 return rc;
6333 }
6334
6335 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
6336 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6337}
6338
6339int
6340mdb_cursor_get(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data,
6341 MDB_cursor_op op)
6342{
6343 int rc;
6344 int exact = 0;
6345 int (*mfunc)(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data);
6346
6347 if (mc == NULL)
6348 return EINVAL;
6349
6350 if (mc->mc_txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED)
6351 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
6352
6353 switch (op) {
6354 case MDB_GET_CURRENT:
6355 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) {
6356 rc = EINVAL;
6357 } else {
6358 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
6359 int nkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
6360 if (!nkeys || mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= nkeys) {
6361 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = nkeys;
6362 rc = MDB_NOTFOUND;
6363 break;
6364 }
6365 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
6366 if (IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
6367 key->mv_size = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
6368 key->mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], key->mv_size);
6369 } else {
6370 MDB_node *leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
6371 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
6372 if (data) {
6373 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
6374 rc = mdb_cursor_get(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL, MDB_GET_CURRENT);
6375 } else {
6376 rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, data);
6377 }
6378 }
6379 }
6380 }
6381 break;
6382 case MDB_GET_BOTH:
6383 case MDB_GET_BOTH_RANGE:
6384 if (data == NULL) {
6385 rc = EINVAL;
6386 break;
6387 }
6388 if (mc->mc_xcursor == NULL) {
6389 rc = MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
6390 break;
6391 }
6392 /* FALLTHRU */
6393 case MDB_SET:
6394 case MDB_SET_KEY:
6395 case MDB_SET_RANGE:
6396 if (key == NULL) {
6397 rc = EINVAL;
6398 } else {
6399 rc = mdb_cursor_set(mc, key, data, op,
6400 op == MDB_SET_RANGE ? NULL : &exact);
6401 }
6402 break;
6403 case MDB_GET_MULTIPLE:
6404 if (data == NULL || !(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) {
6405 rc = EINVAL;
6406 break;
6407 }
6408 if (!(mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPFIXED)) {
6409 rc = MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
6410 break;
6411 }
6412 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
6413 if (!(mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) ||
6414 (mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags & C_EOF))
6415 break;
6416 goto fetchm;
6417 case MDB_NEXT_MULTIPLE:
6418 if (data == NULL) {
6419 rc = EINVAL;
6420 break;
6421 }
6422 if (!(mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPFIXED)) {
6423 rc = MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
6424 break;
6425 }
6426 rc = mdb_cursor_next(mc, key, data, MDB_NEXT_DUP);
6427 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
6428 if (mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) {
6429 MDB_cursor *mx;
6430fetchm:
6431 mx = &mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
6432 data->mv_size = NUMKEYS(mx->mc_pg[mx->mc_top]) *
6433 mx->mc_db->md_pad;
6434 data->mv_data = METADATA(mx->mc_pg[mx->mc_top]);
6435 mx->mc_ki[mx->mc_top] = NUMKEYS(mx->mc_pg[mx->mc_top])-1;
6436 } else {
6437 rc = MDB_NOTFOUND;
6438 }
6439 }
6440 break;
6441 case MDB_PREV_MULTIPLE:
6442 if (data == NULL) {
6443 rc = EINVAL;
6444 break;
6445 }
6446 if (!(mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPFIXED)) {
6447 rc = MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
6448 break;
6449 }
6450 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
6451 rc = mdb_cursor_last(mc, key, data);
6452 else
6453 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
6454 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
6455 MDB_cursor *mx = &mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
6456 if (mx->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) {
6457 rc = mdb_cursor_sibling(mx, 0);
6458 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS)
6459 goto fetchm;
6460 } else {
6461 rc = MDB_NOTFOUND;
6462 }
6463 }
6464 break;
6465 case MDB_NEXT:
6466 case MDB_NEXT_DUP:
6467 case MDB_NEXT_NODUP:
6468 rc = mdb_cursor_next(mc, key, data, op);
6469 break;
6470 case MDB_PREV:
6471 case MDB_PREV_DUP:
6472 case MDB_PREV_NODUP:
6473 rc = mdb_cursor_prev(mc, key, data, op);
6474 break;
6475 case MDB_FIRST:
6476 rc = mdb_cursor_first(mc, key, data);
6477 break;
6478 case MDB_FIRST_DUP:
6479 mfunc = mdb_cursor_first;
6480 mmove:
6481 if (data == NULL || !(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) {
6482 rc = EINVAL;
6483 break;
6484 }
6485 if (mc->mc_xcursor == NULL) {
6486 rc = MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
6487 break;
6488 }
6489 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top])) {
6490 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]);
6491 rc = MDB_NOTFOUND;
6492 break;
6493 }
6494 {
6495 MDB_node *leaf = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
6496 if (!F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
6497 MDB_GET_KEY(leaf, key);
6498 rc = mdb_node_read(mc, leaf, data);
6499 break;
6500 }
6501 }
6502 if (!(mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) {
6503 rc = EINVAL;
6504 break;
6505 }
6506 rc = mfunc(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, NULL);
6507 break;
6508 case MDB_LAST:
6509 rc = mdb_cursor_last(mc, key, data);
6510 break;
6511 case MDB_LAST_DUP:
6512 mfunc = mdb_cursor_last;
6513 goto mmove;
6514 default:
6515 DPRINTF(("unhandled/unimplemented cursor operation %u", op));
6516 rc = EINVAL;
6517 break;
6518 }
6519
6520 if (mc->mc_flags & C_DEL)
6521 mc->mc_flags ^= C_DEL;
6522
6523 return rc;
6524}
6525
6530static int
6531mdb_cursor_touch(MDB_cursor *mc)
6532{
6533 int rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
6534
6535 if (mc->mc_dbi >= CORE_DBS && !(*mc->mc_dbflag & (DB_DIRTY|DB_DUPDATA))) {
6536 /* Touch DB record of named DB */
6537 MDB_cursor mc2;
6538 MDB_xcursor mcx;
6539 if (TXN_DBI_CHANGED(mc->mc_txn, mc->mc_dbi))
6540 return MDB_BAD_DBI;
6541 mdb_cursor_init(&mc2, mc->mc_txn, MAIN_DBI, &mcx);
6542 rc = mdb_page_search(&mc2, &mc->mc_dbx->md_name, MDB_PS_MODIFY);
6543 if (rc)
6544 return rc;
6545 *mc->mc_dbflag |= DB_DIRTY;
6546 }
6547 mc->mc_top = 0;
6548 if (mc->mc_snum) {
6549 do {
6550 rc = mdb_page_touch(mc);
6551 } while (!rc && ++(mc->mc_top) < mc->mc_snum);
6552 mc->mc_top = mc->mc_snum-1;
6553 }
6554 return rc;
6555}
6556
6558#define MDB_NOSPILL 0x8000
6559
6560int
6561mdb_cursor_put(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data,
6562 unsigned int flags)
6563{
6564 MDB_env *env;
6565 MDB_node *leaf = NULL;
6566 MDB_page *fp, *mp, *sub_root = NULL;
6567 uint16_t fp_flags;
6568 MDB_val xdata, *rdata, dkey, olddata;
