6569 MDB_db dummy;
6570 int do_sub = 0, insert_key, insert_data;
6571 unsigned int mcount = 0, dcount = 0, nospill;
6572 size_t nsize;
6573 int rc, rc2;
6574 unsigned int nflags;
6575 DKBUF;
6576
6577 if (mc == NULL || key == NULL)
6578 return EINVAL;
6579
6580 env = mc->mc_txn->mt_env;
6581
6582 /* Check this first so counter will always be zero on any
6583 * early failures.
6584 */
6585 if (flags & MDB_MULTIPLE) {
6586 dcount = data[1].mv_size;
6587 data[1].mv_size = 0;
6588 if (!F_ISSET(mc->mc_db->md_flags, MDB_DUPFIXED))
6589 return MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
6590 }
6591
6592 nospill = flags & MDB_NOSPILL;
6593 flags &= ~MDB_NOSPILL;
6594
6595 if (mc->mc_txn->mt_flags & (MDB_TXN_RDONLY|MDB_TXN_BLOCKED))
6596 return (mc->mc_txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_RDONLY) ? EACCES : MDB_BAD_TXN;
6597
6598 if (key->mv_size-1 >= ENV_MAXKEY(env))
6599 return MDB_BAD_VALSIZE;
6600
6601#if SIZE_MAX > MAXDATASIZE
6602 if (data->mv_size > ((mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT) ? ENV_MAXKEY(env) : MAXDATASIZE))
6603 return MDB_BAD_VALSIZE;
6604#else
6605 if ((mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT) && data->mv_size > ENV_MAXKEY(env))
6606 return MDB_BAD_VALSIZE;
6607#endif
6608
6609 DPRINTF(("==> put db %d key [%s], size %"Z"u, data size %"Z"u",
6610 DDBI(mc), DKEY(key), key ? key->mv_size : 0, data->mv_size));
6611
6612 dkey.mv_size = 0;
6613
6614 if (flags & MDB_CURRENT) {
6615 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
6616 return EINVAL;
6617 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
6618 } else if (mc->mc_db->md_root == P_INVALID) {
6619 /* new database, cursor has nothing to point to */
6620 mc->mc_snum = 0;
6621 mc->mc_top = 0;
6622 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_INITIALIZED;
6623 rc = MDB_NO_ROOT;
6624 } else {
6625 int exact = 0;
6626 MDB_val d2;
6627 if (flags & MDB_APPEND) {
6628 MDB_val k2;
6629 rc = mdb_cursor_last(mc, &k2, &d2);
6630 if (rc == 0) {
6631 rc = mc->mc_dbx->md_cmp(key, &k2);
6632 if (rc > 0) {
6633 rc = MDB_NOTFOUND;
6634 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]++;
6635 } else {
6636 /* new key is <= last key */
6637 rc = MDB_KEYEXIST;
6638 }
6639 }
6640 } else {
6641 rc = mdb_cursor_set(mc, key, &d2, MDB_SET, &exact);
6642 }
6643 if ((flags & MDB_NOOVERWRITE) && rc == 0) {
6644 DPRINTF(("duplicate key [%s]", DKEY(key)));
6645 *data = d2;
6646 return MDB_KEYEXIST;
6647 }
6648 if (rc && rc != MDB_NOTFOUND)
6649 return rc;
6650 }
6651
6652 if (mc->mc_flags & C_DEL)
6653 mc->mc_flags ^= C_DEL;
6654
6655 /* Cursor is positioned, check for room in the dirty list */
6656 if (!nospill) {
6657 if (flags & MDB_MULTIPLE) {
6658 rdata = &xdata;
6659 xdata.mv_size = data->mv_size * dcount;
6660 } else {
6661 rdata = data;
6662 }
6663 if ((rc2 = mdb_page_spill(mc, key, rdata)))
6664 return rc2;
6665 }
6666
6667 if (rc == MDB_NO_ROOT) {
6668 MDB_page *np;
6669 /* new database, write a root leaf page */
6670 DPUTS("allocating new root leaf page");
6671 if ((rc2 = mdb_page_new(mc, P_LEAF, 1, &np))) {
6672 return rc2;
6673 }
6674 mdb_cursor_push(mc, np);
6675 mc->mc_db->md_root = np->mp_pgno;
6676 mc->mc_db->md_depth++;
6677 *mc->mc_dbflag |= DB_DIRTY;
6678 if ((mc->mc_db->md_flags & (MDB_DUPSORT|MDB_DUPFIXED))
6679 == MDB_DUPFIXED)
6680 np->mp_flags |= P_LEAF2;
6681 mc->mc_flags |= C_INITIALIZED;
6682 } else {
6683 /* make sure all cursor pages are writable */
6684 rc2 = mdb_cursor_touch(mc);
6685 if (rc2)
6686 return rc2;
6687 }
6688
6689 insert_key = insert_data = rc;
6690 if (insert_key) {
6691 /* The key does not exist */
6692 DPRINTF(("inserting key at index %i", mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]));
6693 if ((mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT) &&
6694 LEAFSIZE(key, data) > env->me_nodemax)
6695 {
6696 /* Too big for a node, insert in sub-DB. Set up an empty
6697 * "old sub-page" for prep_subDB to expand to a full page.
6698 */
6699 fp_flags = P_LEAF|P_DIRTY;
6700 fp = env->me_pbuf;
6701 fp->mp_pad = data->mv_size; /* used if MDB_DUPFIXED */
6702 fp->mp_lower = fp->mp_upper = (PAGEHDRSZ-PAGEBASE);
6703 olddata.mv_size = PAGEHDRSZ;
6704 goto prep_subDB;
6705 }
6706 } else {
6707 /* there's only a key anyway, so this is a no-op */
6708 if (IS_LEAF2(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top])) {
6709 char *ptr;
6710 unsigned int ksize = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
6711 if (key->mv_size != ksize)
6712 return MDB_BAD_VALSIZE;
6713 ptr = LEAF2KEY(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], ksize);
6714 memcpy(ptr, key->mv_data, ksize);
6715fix_parent:
6716 /* if overwriting slot 0 of leaf, need to
6717 * update branch key if there is a parent page
6718 */
6719 if (mc->mc_top && !mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]) {
6720 unsigned short dtop = 1;
6721 mc->mc_top--;
6722 /* slot 0 is always an empty key, find real slot */
6723 while (mc->mc_top && !mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]) {
6724 mc->mc_top--;
6725 dtop++;
6726 }
6727 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top])
6728 rc2 = mdb_update_key(mc, key);
6729 else
6730 rc2 = MDB_SUCCESS;
6731 mc->mc_top += dtop;
6732 if (rc2)
6733 return rc2;
6734 }
6735 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6736 }
6737
6738more:
6739 leaf = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
6740 olddata.mv_size = NODEDSZ(leaf);
6741 olddata.mv_data = NODEDATA(leaf);
6742
6743 /* DB has dups? */
6744 if (F_ISSET(mc->mc_db->md_flags, MDB_DUPSORT)) {
6745 /* Prepare (sub-)page/sub-DB to accept the new item,
6746 * if needed. fp: old sub-page or a header faking
6747 * it. mp: new (sub-)page. offset: growth in page
6748 * size. xdata: node data with new page or DB.
6749 */
6750 unsigned i, offset = 0;
6751 mp = fp = xdata.mv_data = env->me_pbuf;
6752 mp->mp_pgno = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]->mp_pgno;
6753
6754 /* Was a single item before, must convert now */
6755 if (!F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
6756 MDB_cmp_func *dcmp;
6757 /* Just overwrite the current item */
6758 if (flags == MDB_CURRENT)
6759 goto current;
6760 dcmp = mc->mc_dbx->md_dcmp;
6761#if UINT_MAX < SIZE_MAX
6762 if (dcmp == mdb_cmp_int && olddata.mv_size == sizeof(size_t))
6763 dcmp = mdb_cmp_clong;
6764#endif
6765 /* does data match? */
6766 if (!dcmp(data, &olddata)) {
6767 if (flags & (MDB_NODUPDATA|MDB_APPENDDUP))
6768 return MDB_KEYEXIST;
6769 /* overwrite it */
6770 goto current;
6771 }
6772
6773 /* Back up original data item */
6774 dkey.mv_size = olddata.mv_size;
6775 dkey.mv_data = memcpy(fp+1, olddata.mv_data, olddata.mv_size);
6776
6777 /* Make sub-page header for the dup items, with dummy body */
6778 fp->mp_flags = P_LEAF|P_DIRTY|P_SUBP;
6779 fp->mp_lower = (PAGEHDRSZ-PAGEBASE);
6780 xdata.mv_size = PAGEHDRSZ + dkey.mv_size + data->mv_size;
6781 if (mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPFIXED) {
6782 fp->mp_flags |= P_LEAF2;
6783 fp->mp_pad = data->mv_size;
6784 xdata.mv_size += 2 * data->mv_size; /* leave space for 2 more */
6785 } else {
6786 xdata.mv_size += 2 * (sizeof(indx_t) + NODESIZE) +
6787 (dkey.mv_size & 1) + (data->mv_size & 1);
6788 }
6789 fp->mp_upper = xdata.mv_size - PAGEBASE;
6790 olddata.mv_size = xdata.mv_size; /* pretend olddata is fp */
6791 } else if (leaf->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA) {
6792 /* Data is on sub-DB, just store it */
6793 flags |= F_DUPDATA|F_SUBDATA;
6794 goto put_sub;
6795 } else {
6796 /* Data is on sub-page */
6797 fp = olddata.mv_data;
6798 switch (flags) {
6799 default:
6800 if (!(mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPFIXED)) {
6801 offset = EVEN(NODESIZE + sizeof(indx_t) +
6802 data->mv_size);
6803 break;
6804 }
6805 offset = fp->mp_pad;
6806 if (SIZELEFT(fp) < offset) {
6807 offset *= 4; /* space for 4 more */
6808 break;
6809 }
6810 /* FALLTHRU */ /* Big enough MDB_DUPFIXED sub-page */
6811 case MDB_CURRENT:
6812 fp->mp_flags |= P_DIRTY;
6813 COPY_PGNO(fp->mp_pgno, mp->mp_pgno);
6814 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = fp;
6815 flags |= F_DUPDATA;
6816 goto put_sub;
6817 }
6818 xdata.mv_size = olddata.mv_size + offset;
6819 }
6820
6821 fp_flags = fp->mp_flags;
6822 if (NODESIZE + NODEKSZ(leaf) + xdata.mv_size > env->me_nodemax) {
6823 /* Too big for a sub-page, convert to sub-DB */
6824 fp_flags &= ~P_SUBP;
6825prep_subDB:
6826 if (mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPFIXED) {
6827 fp_flags |= P_LEAF2;
6828 dummy.md_pad = fp->mp_pad;
6829 dummy.md_flags = MDB_DUPFIXED;
6830 if (mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_INTEGERDUP)
6831 dummy.md_flags |= MDB_INTEGERKEY;
6832 } else {
6833 dummy.md_pad = 0;
6834 dummy.md_flags = 0;
6835 }
6836 dummy.md_depth = 1;
6837 dummy.md_branch_pages = 0;
6838 dummy.md_leaf_pages = 1;
6839 dummy.md_overflow_pages = 0;
6840 dummy.md_entries = NUMKEYS(fp);
6841 xdata.mv_size = sizeof(MDB_db);
6842 xdata.mv_data = &dummy;
6843 if ((rc = mdb_page_alloc(mc, 1, &mp)))
6844 return rc;
6845 offset = env->me_psize - olddata.mv_size;
6846 flags |= F_DUPDATA|F_SUBDATA;
6847 dummy.md_root = mp->mp_pgno;
6848 sub_root = mp;
6849 }
6850 if (mp != fp) {
6851 mp->mp_flags = fp_flags | P_DIRTY;
6852 mp->mp_pad = fp->mp_pad;
6853 mp->mp_lower = fp->mp_lower;
6854 mp->mp_upper = fp->mp_upper + offset;
6855 if (fp_flags & P_LEAF2) {
6856 memcpy(METADATA(mp), METADATA(fp), NUMKEYS(fp) * fp->mp_pad);
6857 } else {
6858 memcpy((char *)mp + mp->mp_upper + PAGEBASE, (char *)fp + fp->mp_upper + PAGEBASE,
6859 olddata.mv_size - fp->mp_upper - PAGEBASE);
6860 memcpy((char *)(&mp->mp_ptrs), (char *)(&fp->mp_ptrs), NUMKEYS(fp) * sizeof(mp->mp_ptrs[0]));
6861 for (i=0; i<NUMKEYS(fp); i++)
6862 mp->mp_ptrs[i] += offset;
6863 }
6864 }
6865
6866 rdata = &xdata;
6867 flags |= F_DUPDATA;
6868 do_sub = 1;
6869 if (!insert_key)
6870 mdb_node_del(mc, 0);
6871 goto new_sub;
6872 }
6873current:
6874 /* LMDB passes F_SUBDATA in 'flags' to write a DB record */
6875 if ((leaf->mn_flags ^ flags) & F_SUBDATA)
6876 return MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
6877 /* overflow page overwrites need special handling */
6878 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_BIGDATA)) {
6879 MDB_page *omp;
6880 pgno_t pg;
6881 int level, ovpages, dpages = OVPAGES(data->mv_size, env->me_psize);
6882
6883 memcpy(&pg, olddata.mv_data, sizeof(pg));
6884 if ((rc2 = mdb_page_get(mc, pg, &omp, &level)) != 0)
6885 return rc2;
6886 ovpages = omp->mp_pages;
6887
6888 /* Is the ov page large enough? */
6889 if (ovpages >= dpages) {
6890 if (!(omp->mp_flags & P_DIRTY) &&
6891 (level || (env->me_flags & MDB_WRITEMAP)))
6892 {
6893 rc = mdb_page_unspill(mc->mc_txn, omp, &omp);
6894 if (rc)
6895 return rc;
6896 level = 0; /* dirty in this txn or clean */
6897 }
6898 /* Is it dirty? */
6899 if (omp->mp_flags & P_DIRTY) {
6900 /* yes, overwrite it. Note in this case we don't
6901 * bother to try shrinking the page if the new data
6902 * is smaller than the overflow threshold.
6903 */
6904 if (level > 1) {
6905 /* It is writable only in a parent txn */
6906 size_t sz = (size_t) env->me_psize * ovpages, off;
6907 MDB_page *np = mdb_page_malloc(mc->mc_txn, ovpages);
6908 MDB_ID2 id2;
6909 if (!np)
6910 return ENOMEM;
6911 id2.mid = pg;
6912 id2.mptr = np;
6913 /* Note - this page is already counted in parent's dirty_room */
6914 rc2 = mdb_mid2l_insert(mc->mc_txn->mt_u.dirty_list, &id2);
6915 mdb_cassert(mc, rc2 == 0);
6916 /* Currently we make the page look as with put() in the
6917 * parent txn, in case the user peeks at MDB_RESERVEd
6918 * or unused parts. Some users treat ovpages specially.
6919 */
6920 if (!(flags & MDB_RESERVE)) {
6921 /* Skip the part where LMDB will put *data.
6922 * Copy end of page, adjusting alignment so
6923 * compiler may copy words instead of bytes.
6924 */
6925 off = (PAGEHDRSZ + data->mv_size) & -sizeof(size_t);
6926 memcpy((size_t *)((char *)np + off),
6927 (size_t *)((char *)omp + off), sz - off);
6928 sz = PAGEHDRSZ;
6929 }
6930 memcpy(np, omp, sz); /* Copy beginning of page */
6931 omp = np;
6932 }
6933 SETDSZ(leaf, data->mv_size);
6934 if (F_ISSET(flags, MDB_RESERVE))
6935 data->mv_data = METADATA(omp);
6936 else
6937 memcpy(METADATA(omp), data->mv_data, data->mv_size);
6938 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6939 }
6940 }
6941 if ((rc2 = mdb_ovpage_free(mc, omp)) != MDB_SUCCESS)
6942 return rc2;
6943 } else if (data->mv_size == olddata.mv_size) {
6944 /* same size, just replace it. Note that we could
6945 * also reuse this node if the new data is smaller,
6946 * but instead we opt to shrink the node in that case.
6947 */
6948 if (F_ISSET(flags, MDB_RESERVE))
6949 data->mv_data = olddata.mv_data;
6950 else if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_SUB))
6951 memcpy(olddata.mv_data, data->mv_data, data->mv_size);
6952 else {
6953 memcpy(NODEKEY(leaf), key->mv_data, key->mv_size);
6954 goto fix_parent;
6955 }
6956 return MDB_SUCCESS;
6957 }
6958 mdb_node_del(mc, 0);
6959 }
6960
6961 rdata = data;
6962
6963new_sub:
6964 nflags = flags & NODE_ADD_FLAGS;
6965 nsize = IS_LEAF2(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) ? key->mv_size : mdb_leaf_size(env, key, rdata);
6966 if (SIZELEFT(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) < nsize) {
6967 if (( flags & (F_DUPDATA|F_SUBDATA)) == F_DUPDATA )
6968 nflags &= ~MDB_APPEND; /* sub-page may need room to grow */
6969 if (!insert_key)
6970 nflags |= MDB_SPLIT_REPLACE;
6971 rc = mdb_page_split(mc, key, rdata, P_INVALID, nflags);
6972 } else {
6973 /* There is room already in this leaf page. */
6974 rc = mdb_node_add(mc, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], key, rdata, 0, nflags);
6975 if (rc == 0) {
6976 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
6977 MDB_cursor *m2, *m3;
6978 MDB_dbi dbi = mc->mc_dbi;
6979 unsigned i = mc->mc_top;
6980 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[i];
6981
6982 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
6983 if (mc->mc_flags & C_SUB)
6984 m3 = &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
6985 else
6986 m3 = m2;
6987 if (m3 == mc || m3->mc_snum < mc->mc_snum || m3->mc_pg[i] != mp) continue;
6988 if (m3->mc_ki[i] >= mc->mc_ki[i] && insert_key) {
6989 m3->mc_ki[i]++;
6990 }
6991 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m3, i, mp);
6992 }
6993 }
6994 }
6995
6996 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
6997 /* Now store the actual data in the child DB. Note that we're
6998 * storing the user data in the keys field, so there are strict
6999 * size limits on dupdata. The actual data fields of the child
7000 * DB are all zero size.
7001 */
7002 if (do_sub) {
7003 int xflags, new_dupdata;
7004 size_t ecount;
7005put_sub:
7006 xdata.mv_size = 0;
7007 xdata.mv_data = "";
7008 leaf = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
7009 if ((flags & (MDB_CURRENT|MDB_APPENDDUP)) == MDB_CURRENT) {
7010 xflags = MDB_CURRENT|MDB_NOSPILL;
7011 } else {
7012 mdb_xcursor_init1(mc, leaf);
7013 xflags = (flags & MDB_NODUPDATA) ?
7014 MDB_NOOVERWRITE|MDB_NOSPILL : MDB_NOSPILL;
7015 }
7016 if (sub_root)
7017 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = sub_root;
7018 new_dupdata = (int)dkey.mv_size;
7019 /* converted, write the original data first */
7020 if (dkey.mv_size) {
7021 rc = mdb_cursor_put(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, &dkey, &xdata, xflags);
7022 if (rc)
7023 goto bad_sub;
7024 /* we've done our job */
7025 dkey.mv_size = 0;
7026 }
7027 if (!(leaf->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA) || sub_root) {
7028 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
7029 MDB_cursor *m2;
7030 MDB_xcursor *mx = mc->mc_xcursor;
7031 unsigned i = mc->mc_top;
7032 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[i];
7033
7034 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[mc->mc_dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
7035 if (m2 == mc || m2->mc_snum < mc->mc_snum) continue;
7036 if (!(m2->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) continue;
7037 if (m2->mc_pg[i] == mp) {
7038 if (m2->mc_ki[i] == mc->mc_ki[i]) {
7039 mdb_xcursor_init2(m2, mx, new_dupdata);
7040 } else if (!insert_key) {
7041 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m2, i, mp);
7042 }
7043 }
7044 }
7045 }
7046 ecount = mc->mc_xcursor->mx_db.md_entries;
7047 if (flags & MDB_APPENDDUP)
7048 xflags |= MDB_APPEND;
7049 rc = mdb_cursor_put(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, data, &xdata, xflags);
7050 if (flags & F_SUBDATA) {
7051 void *db = NODEDATA(leaf);
7052 memcpy(db, &mc->mc_xcursor->mx_db, sizeof(MDB_db));
7053 }
7054 insert_data = mc->mc_xcursor->mx_db.md_entries - ecount;
7055 }
7056 /* Increment count unless we just replaced an existing item. */
7057 if (insert_data)
7058 mc->mc_db->md_entries++;
7059 if (insert_key) {
7060 /* Invalidate txn if we created an empty sub-DB */
7061 if (rc)
7062 goto bad_sub;
7063 /* If we succeeded and the key didn't exist before,
7064 * make sure the cursor is marked valid.
7065 */
7066 mc->mc_flags |= C_INITIALIZED;
7067 }
7068 if (flags & MDB_MULTIPLE) {
7069 if (!rc) {
7070 mcount++;
7071 /* let caller know how many succeeded, if any */
7072 data[1].mv_size = mcount;
7073 if (mcount < dcount) {
7074 data[0].mv_data = (char *)data[0].mv_data + data[0].mv_size;
7075 insert_key = insert_data = 0;
7076 goto more;
7077 }
7078 }
7079 }
7080 return rc;
7081bad_sub:
7082 if (rc == MDB_KEYEXIST) /* should not happen, we deleted that item */
7083 rc = MDB_CORRUPTED;
7084 }
7085 mc->mc_txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
7086 return rc;
7087}
7088
7089int
7090mdb_cursor_del(MDB_cursor *mc, unsigned int flags)
7091{
7092 MDB_node *leaf;
7093 MDB_page *mp;
7094 int rc;
7095
7096 if (mc->mc_txn->mt_flags & (MDB_TXN_RDONLY|MDB_TXN_BLOCKED))
7097 return (mc->mc_txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_RDONLY) ? EACCES : MDB_BAD_TXN;
7098
7099 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
7100 return EINVAL;
7101
7102 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]))
7103 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
7104
7105 if (!(flags & MDB_NOSPILL) && (rc = mdb_page_spill(mc, NULL, NULL)))
7106 return rc;
7107
7108 rc = mdb_cursor_touch(mc);
7109 if (rc)
7110 return rc;
7111
7112 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
7113 if (!IS_LEAF(mp))
7114 return MDB_CORRUPTED;
7115 if (IS_LEAF2(mp))
7116 goto del_key;
7117 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
7118
7119 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
7120 if (flags & MDB_NODUPDATA) {
7121 /* mdb_cursor_del0() will subtract the final entry */
7122 mc->mc_db->md_entries -= mc->mc_xcursor->mx_db.md_entries - 1;
7123 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~C_INITIALIZED;
7124 } else {
7125 if (!F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_SUBDATA)) {
7126 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = NODEDATA(leaf);
7127 }
7128 rc = mdb_cursor_del(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, MDB_NOSPILL);
7129 if (rc)
7130 return rc;
7131 /* If sub-DB still has entries, we're done */
7132 if (mc->mc_xcursor->mx_db.md_entries) {
7133 if (leaf->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA) {
7134 /* update subDB info */
7135 void *db = NODEDATA(leaf);
7136 memcpy(db, &mc->mc_xcursor->mx_db, sizeof(MDB_db));
7137 } else {
7138 MDB_cursor *m2;
7139 /* shrink fake page */
7140 mdb_node_shrink(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
7141 leaf = NODEPTR(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
7142 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = NODEDATA(leaf);
7143 /* fix other sub-DB cursors pointed at fake pages on this page */
7144 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[mc->mc_dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
7145 if (m2 == mc || m2->mc_snum < mc->mc_snum) continue;
7146 if (!(m2->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) continue;
7147 if (m2->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] == mp) {
7148 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m2, mc->mc_top, mp);
7149 }
7150 }
7151 }
7152 mc->mc_db->md_entries--;
7153 return rc;
7154 } else {
7155 mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~C_INITIALIZED;
7156 }
7157 /* otherwise fall thru and delete the sub-DB */
7158 }
7159
7160 if (leaf->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA) {
7161 /* add all the child DB's pages to the free list */
7162 rc = mdb_drop0(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, 0);
7163 if (rc)
7164 goto fail;
7165 }
7166 }
7167 /* LMDB passes F_SUBDATA in 'flags' to delete a DB record */
7168 else if ((leaf->mn_flags ^ flags) & F_SUBDATA) {
7169 rc = MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
7170 goto fail;
7171 }
7172
7173 /* add overflow pages to free list */
7174 if (F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_BIGDATA)) {
7175 MDB_page *omp;
7176 pgno_t pg;
7177
7178 memcpy(&pg, NODEDATA(leaf), sizeof(pg));
7179 if ((rc = mdb_page_get(mc, pg, &omp, NULL)) ||
7180 (rc = mdb_ovpage_free(mc, omp)))
7181 goto fail;
7182 }
7183
7184del_key:
7185 return mdb_cursor_del0(mc);
7186
7187fail:
7188 mc->mc_txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
7189 return rc;
7190}
7191
7201static int
7202mdb_page_new(MDB_cursor *mc, uint32_t flags, int num, MDB_page **mp)
7203{
7204 MDB_page *np;
7205 int rc;
7206
7207 if ((rc = mdb_page_alloc(mc, num, &np)))
7208 return rc;
7209 DPRINTF(("allocated new mpage %"Z"u, page size %u",
7210 np->mp_pgno, mc->mc_txn->mt_env->me_psize));
7211 np->mp_flags = flags | P_DIRTY;
7212 np->mp_lower = (PAGEHDRSZ-PAGEBASE);
7213 np->mp_upper = mc->mc_txn->mt_env->me_psize - PAGEBASE;
7214
7215 if (IS_BRANCH(np))
7216 mc->mc_db->md_branch_pages++;
7217 else if (IS_LEAF(np))
7218 mc->mc_db->md_leaf_pages++;
7219 else if (IS_OVERFLOW(np)) {
7220 mc->mc_db->md_overflow_pages += num;
7221 np->mp_pages = num;
7222 }
7223 *mp = np;
7224
7225 return 0;
7226}
7227
7239static size_t
7240mdb_leaf_size(MDB_env *env, MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data)
7241{
7242 size_t sz;
7243
7244 sz = LEAFSIZE(key, data);
7245 if (sz > env->me_nodemax) {
7246 /* put on overflow page */
7247 sz -= data->mv_size - sizeof(pgno_t);
7248 }
7249
7250 return EVEN(sz + sizeof(indx_t));
7251}
7252
7263static size_t
7264mdb_branch_size(MDB_env *env, MDB_val *key)
7265{
7266 size_t sz;
7267
7268 sz = INDXSIZE(key);
7269 if (sz > env->me_nodemax) {
7270 /* put on overflow page */
7271 /* not implemented */
7272 /* sz -= key->size - sizeof(pgno_t); */
7273 }
7274
7275 return sz + sizeof(indx_t);
7276}
7277
7294static int
7295mdb_node_add(MDB_cursor *mc, indx_t indx,
7296 MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data, pgno_t pgno, unsigned int flags)
7297{
7298 unsigned int i;
7299 size_t node_size = NODESIZE;
7300 ssize_t room;
7301 indx_t ofs;
7302 MDB_node *node;
7303 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
7304 MDB_page *ofp = NULL; /* overflow page */
7305 void *ndata;
7306 DKBUF;
7307
7308 mdb_cassert(mc, mp->mp_upper >= mp->mp_lower);
7309
7310 DPRINTF(("add to %s %spage %"Z"u index %i, data size %"Z"u key size %"Z"u [%s]",
7311 IS_LEAF(mp) ? "leaf" : "branch",
7312 IS_SUBP(mp) ? "sub-" : "",
7313 mdb_dbg_pgno(mp), indx, data ? data->mv_size : 0,
7314 key ? key->mv_size : 0, key ? DKEY(key) : "null"));
7315
7316 if (IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
7317 /* Move higher keys up one slot. */
7318 int ksize = mc->mc_db->md_pad, dif;
7319 char *ptr = LEAF2KEY(mp, indx, ksize);
7320 dif = NUMKEYS(mp) - indx;
7321 if (dif > 0)
7322 memmove(ptr+ksize, ptr, dif*ksize);
7323 /* insert new key */
7324 memcpy(ptr, key->mv_data, ksize);
7325
7326 /* Just using these for counting */
7327 mp->mp_lower += sizeof(indx_t);
7328 mp->mp_upper -= ksize - sizeof(indx_t);
7329 return MDB_SUCCESS;
7330 }
7331
7332 room = (ssize_t)SIZELEFT(mp) - (ssize_t)sizeof(indx_t);
7333 if (key != NULL)
7334 node_size += key->mv_size;
7335 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
7336 mdb_cassert(mc, key && data);
7337 if (F_ISSET(flags, F_BIGDATA)) {
7338 /* Data already on overflow page. */
7339 node_size += sizeof(pgno_t);
7340 } else if (node_size + data->mv_size > mc->mc_txn->mt_env->me_nodemax) {
7341 int ovpages = OVPAGES(data->mv_size, mc->mc_txn->mt_env->me_psize);
7342 int rc;
7343 /* Put data on overflow page. */
7344 DPRINTF(("data size is %"Z"u, node would be %"Z"u, put data on overflow page",
7345 data->mv_size, node_size+data->mv_size));
7346 node_size = EVEN(node_size + sizeof(pgno_t));
7347 if ((ssize_t)node_size > room)
7348 goto full;
7349 if ((rc = mdb_page_new(mc, P_OVERFLOW, ovpages, &ofp)))
7350 return rc;
7351 DPRINTF(("allocated overflow page %"Z"u", ofp->mp_pgno));
7352 flags |= F_BIGDATA;
7353 goto update;
7354 } else {
7355 node_size += data->mv_size;
7356 }
7357 }
7358 node_size = EVEN(node_size);
7359 if ((ssize_t)node_size > room)
7360 goto full;
7361
7362update:
7363 /* Move higher pointers up one slot. */
7364 for (i = NUMKEYS(mp); i > indx; i--)
7365 mp->mp_ptrs[i] = mp->mp_ptrs[i - 1];
7366
7367 /* Adjust free space offsets. */
7368 ofs = mp->mp_upper - node_size;
7369 mdb_cassert(mc, ofs >= mp->mp_lower + sizeof(indx_t));
7370 mp->mp_ptrs[indx] = ofs;
7371 mp->mp_upper = ofs;
7372 mp->mp_lower += sizeof(indx_t);
7373
7374 /* Write the node data. */
7375 node = NODEPTR(mp, indx);
7376 node->mn_ksize = (key == NULL) ? 0 : key->mv_size;
7377 node->mn_flags = flags;
7378 if (IS_LEAF(mp))
7379 SETDSZ(node,data->mv_size);
7380 else
7381 SETPGNO(node,pgno);
7382
7383 if (key)
7384 memcpy(NODEKEY(node), key->mv_data, key->mv_size);
7385
7386 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
7387 ndata = NODEDATA(node);
7388 if (ofp == NULL) {
7389 if (F_ISSET(flags, F_BIGDATA))
7390 memcpy(ndata, data->mv_data, sizeof(pgno_t));
7391 else if (F_ISSET(flags, MDB_RESERVE))
7392 data->mv_data = ndata;
7393 else
7394 memcpy(ndata, data->mv_data, data->mv_size);
7395 } else {
7396 memcpy(ndata, &ofp->mp_pgno, sizeof(pgno_t));
7397 ndata = METADATA(ofp);
7398 if (F_ISSET(flags, MDB_RESERVE))
7399 data->mv_data = ndata;
7400 else
7401 memcpy(ndata, data->mv_data, data->mv_size);
7402 }
7403 }
7404
7405 return MDB_SUCCESS;
7406
7407full:
7408 DPRINTF(("not enough room in page %"Z"u, got %u ptrs",
7409 mdb_dbg_pgno(mp), NUMKEYS(mp)));
7410 DPRINTF(("upper-lower = %u - %u = %"Z"d", mp->mp_upper,mp->mp_lower,room));
7411 DPRINTF(("node size = %"Z"u", node_size));
7412 mc->mc_txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
7413 return MDB_PAGE_FULL;
7414}
7415
7421static void
7422mdb_node_del(MDB_cursor *mc, int ksize)
7423{
7424 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
7425 indx_t indx = mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top];
7426 unsigned int sz;
7427 indx_t i, j, numkeys, ptr;
7428 MDB_node *node;
7429 char *base;
7430
7431 DPRINTF(("delete node %u on %s page %"Z"u", indx,
7432 IS_LEAF(mp) ? "leaf" : "branch", mdb_dbg_pgno(mp)));
7433 numkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
7434 mdb_cassert(mc, indx < numkeys);
7435
7436 if (IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
7437 int x = numkeys - 1 - indx;
7438 base = LEAF2KEY(mp, indx, ksize);
7439 if (x)
7440 memmove(base, base + ksize, x * ksize);
7441 mp->mp_lower -= sizeof(indx_t);
7442 mp->mp_upper += ksize - sizeof(indx_t);
7443 return;
7444 }
7445
7446 node = NODEPTR(mp, indx);
7447 sz = NODESIZE + node->mn_ksize;
7448 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
7449 if (F_ISSET(node->mn_flags, F_BIGDATA))
7450 sz += sizeof(pgno_t);
7451 else
7452 sz += NODEDSZ(node);
7453 }
7454 sz = EVEN(sz);
7455
7456 ptr = mp->mp_ptrs[indx];
7457 for (i = j = 0; i < numkeys; i++) {
7458 if (i != indx) {
7459 mp->mp_ptrs[j] = mp->mp_ptrs[i];
7460 if (mp->mp_ptrs[i] < ptr)
7461 mp->mp_ptrs[j] += sz;
7462 j++;
7463 }
7464 }
7465
7466 base = (char *)mp + mp->mp_upper + PAGEBASE;
7467 memmove(base + sz, base, ptr - mp->mp_upper);
7468
7469 mp->mp_lower -= sizeof(indx_t);
7470 mp->mp_upper += sz;
7471}
7472
7477static void
7478mdb_node_shrink(MDB_page *mp, indx_t indx)
7479{
7480 MDB_node *node;
7481 MDB_page *sp, *xp;
7482 char *base;
7483 indx_t delta, nsize, len, ptr;
7484 int i;
7485
7486 node = NODEPTR(mp, indx);
7487 sp = (MDB_page *)NODEDATA(node);
7488 delta = SIZELEFT(sp);
7489 nsize = NODEDSZ(node) - delta;
7490
7491 /* Prepare to shift upward, set len = length(subpage part to shift) */
7492 if (IS_LEAF2(sp)) {
7493 len = nsize;
7494 if (nsize & 1)
7495 return; /* do not make the node uneven-sized */
7496 } else {
7497 xp = (MDB_page *)((char *)sp + delta); /* destination subpage */
7498 for (i = NUMKEYS(sp); --i >= 0; )
7499 xp->mp_ptrs[i] = sp->mp_ptrs[i] - delta;
7500 len = PAGEHDRSZ;
7501 }
7502 sp->mp_upper = sp->mp_lower;
7503 COPY_PGNO(sp->mp_pgno, mp->mp_pgno);
7504 SETDSZ(node, nsize);
7505
7506 /* Shift <lower nodes...initial part of subpage> upward */
7507 base = (char *)mp + mp->mp_upper + PAGEBASE;
7508 memmove(base + delta, base, (char *)sp + len - base);
7509
7510 ptr = mp->mp_ptrs[indx];
7511 for (i = NUMKEYS(mp); --i >= 0; ) {
7512 if (mp->mp_ptrs[i] <= ptr)
7513 mp->mp_ptrs[i] += delta;
7514 }
7515 mp->mp_upper += delta;
7516}
7517
7527static void
7528mdb_xcursor_init0(MDB_cursor *mc)
7529{
7530 MDB_xcursor *mx = mc->mc_xcursor;
7531
7532 mx->mx_cursor.mc_xcursor = NULL;
7533 mx->mx_cursor.mc_txn = mc->mc_txn;
7534 mx->mx_cursor.mc_db = &mx->mx_db;
7535 mx->mx_cursor.mc_dbx = &mx->mx_dbx;
7536 mx->mx_cursor.mc_dbi = mc->mc_dbi;
7537 mx->mx_cursor.mc_dbflag = &mx->mx_dbflag;
7538 mx->mx_cursor.mc_snum = 0;
7539 mx->mx_cursor.mc_top = 0;
7540 mx->mx_cursor.mc_flags = C_SUB;
7541 mx->mx_dbx.md_name.mv_size = 0;
7542 mx->mx_dbx.md_name.mv_data = NULL;
7543 mx->mx_dbx.md_cmp = mc->mc_dbx->md_dcmp;
7544 mx->mx_dbx.md_dcmp = NULL;
7545 mx->mx_dbx.md_rel = mc->mc_dbx->md_rel;
7546}
7547
7554static void
7555mdb_xcursor_init1(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_node *node)
7556{
7557 MDB_xcursor *mx = mc->mc_xcursor;
7558
7559 if (node->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA) {
7560 memcpy(&mx->mx_db, NODEDATA(node), sizeof(MDB_db));
7561 mx->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = 0;
7562 mx->mx_cursor.mc_snum = 0;
7563 mx->mx_cursor.mc_top = 0;
7564 mx->mx_cursor.mc_flags = C_SUB;
7565 } else {
7566 MDB_page *fp = NODEDATA(node);
7567 mx->mx_db.md_pad = 0;
7568 mx->mx_db.md_flags = 0;
7569 mx->mx_db.md_depth = 1;
7570 mx->mx_db.md_branch_pages = 0;
7571 mx->mx_db.md_leaf_pages = 1;
7572 mx->mx_db.md_overflow_pages = 0;
7573 mx->mx_db.md_entries = NUMKEYS(fp);
7574 COPY_PGNO(mx->mx_db.md_root, fp->mp_pgno);
7575 mx->mx_cursor.mc_snum = 1;
7576 mx->mx_cursor.mc_top = 0;
7577 mx->mx_cursor.mc_flags = C_INITIALIZED|C_SUB;
7578 mx->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = fp;
7579 mx->mx_cursor.mc_ki[0] = 0;
7580 if (mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPFIXED) {
7581 mx->mx_db.md_flags = MDB_DUPFIXED;
7582 mx->mx_db.md_pad = fp->mp_pad;
7583 if (mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_INTEGERDUP)
7584 mx->mx_db.md_flags |= MDB_INTEGERKEY;
7585 }
7586 }
7587 DPRINTF(("Sub-db -%u root page %"Z"u", mx->mx_cursor.mc_dbi,
7588 mx->mx_db.md_root));
7589 mx->mx_dbflag = DB_VALID|DB_USRVALID|DB_DUPDATA;
7590#if UINT_MAX < SIZE_MAX
7591 if (mx->mx_dbx.md_cmp == mdb_cmp_int && mx->mx_db.md_pad == sizeof(size_t))
7592 mx->mx_dbx.md_cmp = mdb_cmp_clong;
7593#endif
7594}
7595
7596
7605static void
7606mdb_xcursor_init2(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_xcursor *src_mx, int new_dupdata)
7607{
7608 MDB_xcursor *mx = mc->mc_xcursor;
7609
7610 if (new_dupdata) {
7611 mx->mx_cursor.mc_snum = 1;
7612 mx->mx_cursor.mc_top = 0;
7613 mx->mx_cursor.mc_flags |= C_INITIALIZED;
7614 mx->mx_cursor.mc_ki[0] = 0;
7615 mx->mx_dbflag = DB_VALID|DB_USRVALID|DB_DUPDATA;
7616#if UINT_MAX < SIZE_MAX
7617 mx->mx_dbx.md_cmp = src_mx->mx_dbx.md_cmp;
7618#endif
7619 } else if (!(mx->mx_cursor.mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED)) {
7620 return;
7621 }
7622 mx->mx_db = src_mx->mx_db;
7623 mx->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = src_mx->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0];
7624 DPRINTF(("Sub-db -%u root page %"Z"u", mx->mx_cursor.mc_dbi,
7625 mx->mx_db.md_root));
7626}
7627
7629static void
7630mdb_cursor_init(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, MDB_xcursor *mx)
7631{
7632 mc->mc_next = NULL;
7633 mc->mc_backup = NULL;
7634 mc->mc_dbi = dbi;
7635 mc->mc_txn = txn;
7636 mc->mc_db = &txn->mt_dbs[dbi];
7637 mc->mc_dbx = &txn->mt_dbxs[dbi];
7638 mc->mc_dbflag = &txn->mt_dbflags[dbi];
7639 mc->mc_snum = 0;
7640 mc->mc_top = 0;
7641 mc->mc_pg[0] = 0;
7642 mc->mc_ki[0] = 0;
7643 mc->mc_flags = 0;
7644 if (txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT) {
7645 mdb_tassert(txn, mx != NULL);
7646 mc->mc_xcursor = mx;
7647 mdb_xcursor_init0(mc);
7648 } else {
7649 mc->mc_xcursor = NULL;
7650 }
7651 if (*mc->mc_dbflag & DB_STALE) {
7652 mdb_page_search(mc, NULL, MDB_PS_ROOTONLY);
7653 }
7654}
7655
7656int
7657mdb_cursor_open(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, MDB_cursor **ret)
7658{
7659 MDB_cursor *mc;
7660 size_t size = sizeof(MDB_cursor);
7661
7662 if (!ret || !TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_VALID))
7663 return EINVAL;
7664
7665 if (txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED)
7666 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
7667
7668 if (dbi == FREE_DBI && !F_ISSET(txn->mt_flags, MDB_TXN_RDONLY))
7669 return EINVAL;
7670
7671 if (txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT)
7672 size += sizeof(MDB_xcursor);
7673
7674 if ((mc = malloc(size)) != NULL) {
7675 mdb_cursor_init(mc, txn, dbi, (MDB_xcursor *)(mc + 1));
7676 if (txn->mt_cursors) {
7677 mc->mc_next = txn->mt_cursors[dbi];
7678 txn->mt_cursors[dbi] = mc;
7679 mc->mc_flags |= C_UNTRACK;
7680 }
7681 } else {
7682 return ENOMEM;
7683 }
7684
7685 *ret = mc;
7686
7687 return MDB_SUCCESS;
7688}
7689
7690int
7691mdb_cursor_renew(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_cursor *mc)
7692{
7693 if (!mc || !TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, mc->mc_dbi, DB_VALID))
7694 return EINVAL;
7695
7696 if ((mc->mc_flags & C_UNTRACK) || txn->mt_cursors)
7697 return EINVAL;
7698
7699 if (txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED)
7700 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
7701
7702 mdb_cursor_init(mc, txn, mc->mc_dbi, mc->mc_xcursor);
7703 return MDB_SUCCESS;
7704}
7705
7706/* Return the count of duplicate data items for the current key */
7707int
7708mdb_cursor_count(MDB_cursor *mc, size_t *countp)
7709{
7710 MDB_node *leaf;
7711
7712 if (mc == NULL || countp == NULL)
7713 return EINVAL;
7714
7715 if (mc->mc_xcursor == NULL)
7716 return MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
7717
7718 if (mc->mc_txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED)
7719 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
7720
7721 if (!(mc->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
7722 return EINVAL;
7723
7724 if (!mc->mc_snum)
7725 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
7726
7727 if (mc->mc_flags & C_EOF) {
7728 if (mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]))
7729 return MDB_NOTFOUND;
7730 mc->mc_flags ^= C_EOF;
7731 }
7732
7733 leaf = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
7734 if (!F_ISSET(leaf->mn_flags, F_DUPDATA)) {
7735 *countp = 1;
7736 } else {
7737 if (!(mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
7738 return EINVAL;
7739
7740 *countp = mc->mc_xcursor->mx_db.md_entries;
7741 }
7742 return MDB_SUCCESS;
7743}
7744
7745void
7746mdb_cursor_close(MDB_cursor *mc)
7747{
7748 if (mc && !mc->mc_backup) {
7749 /* remove from txn, if tracked */
7750 if ((mc->mc_flags & C_UNTRACK) && mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors) {
7751 MDB_cursor **prev = &mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[mc->mc_dbi];
7752 while (*prev && *prev != mc) prev = &(*prev)->mc_next;
7753 if (*prev == mc)
7754 *prev = mc->mc_next;
7755 }
7756 free(mc);
7757 }
7758}
7759
7760MDB_txn *
7761mdb_cursor_txn(MDB_cursor *mc)
7762{
7763 if (!mc) return NULL;
7764 return mc->mc_txn;
7765}
7766
7767MDB_dbi
7768mdb_cursor_dbi(MDB_cursor *mc)
7769{
7770 return mc->mc_dbi;
7771}
7772
7779static int
7780mdb_update_key(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *key)
7781{
7782 MDB_page *mp;
7783 MDB_node *node;
7784 char *base;
7785 size_t len;
7786 int delta, ksize, oksize;
7787 indx_t ptr, i, numkeys, indx;
7788 DKBUF;
7789
7790 indx = mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top];
7791 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
7792 node = NODEPTR(mp, indx);
7793 ptr = mp->mp_ptrs[indx];
7794#if MDB_DEBUG
7795 {
7796 MDB_val k2;
7797 char kbuf2[DKBUF_MAXKEYSIZE*2+1];
7798 k2.mv_data = NODEKEY(node);
7799 k2.mv_size = node->mn_ksize;
7800 DPRINTF(("update key %u (ofs %u) [%s] to [%s] on page %"Z"u",
7801 indx, ptr,
7802 mdb_dkey(&k2, kbuf2),
7803 DKEY(key),
7804 mp->mp_pgno));
7805 }
7806#endif
7807
7808 /* Sizes must be 2-byte aligned. */
7809 ksize = EVEN(key->mv_size);
7810 oksize = EVEN(node->mn_ksize);
7811 delta = ksize - oksize;
7812
7813 /* Shift node contents if EVEN(key length) changed. */
7814 if (delta) {
7815 if (delta > 0 && SIZELEFT(mp) < delta) {
7816 pgno_t pgno;
7817 /* not enough space left, do a delete and split */
7818 DPRINTF(("Not enough room, delta = %d, splitting...", delta));
7819 pgno = NODEPGNO(node);
7820 mdb_node_del(mc, 0);
7821 return mdb_page_split(mc, key, NULL, pgno, MDB_SPLIT_REPLACE);
7822 }
7823
7824 numkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
7825 for (i = 0; i < numkeys; i++) {
7826 if (mp->mp_ptrs[i] <= ptr)
7827 mp->mp_ptrs[i] -= delta;
7828 }
7829
7830 base = (char *)mp + mp->mp_upper + PAGEBASE;
7831 len = ptr - mp->mp_upper + NODESIZE;
7832 memmove(base - delta, base, len);
7833 mp->mp_upper -= delta;
7834
7835 node = NODEPTR(mp, indx);
7836 }
7837
7838 /* But even if no shift was needed, update ksize */
7839 if (node->mn_ksize != key->mv_size)
7840 node->mn_ksize = key->mv_size;
7841
7842 if (key->mv_size)
7843 memcpy(NODEKEY(node), key->mv_data, key->mv_size);
7844
7845 return MDB_SUCCESS;
7846}
7847
7848static void
7849mdb_cursor_copy(const MDB_cursor *csrc, MDB_cursor *cdst);
7850
7852#define WITH_CURSOR_TRACKING(mn, act) do { \
7853 MDB_cursor dummy, *tracked, **tp = &(mn).mc_txn->mt_cursors[mn.mc_dbi]; \
7854 if ((mn).mc_flags & C_SUB) { \
7855 dummy.mc_flags = C_INITIALIZED; \
7856 dummy.mc_xcursor = (MDB_xcursor *)&(mn); \
7857 tracked = &dummy; \
7858 } else { \
7859 tracked = &(mn); \
7860 } \
7861 tracked->mc_next = *tp; \
7862 *tp = tracked; \
7863 { act; } \
7864 *tp = tracked->mc_next; \
7865} while (0)
7866
7869static int
7870mdb_node_move(MDB_cursor *csrc, MDB_cursor *cdst, int fromleft)
7871{
7872 MDB_node *srcnode;
7873 MDB_val key, data;
7874 pgno_t srcpg;
7875 MDB_cursor mn;
7876 int rc;
7877 unsigned short flags;
7878
7879 DKBUF;
7880
7881 /* Mark src and dst as dirty. */
7882 if ((rc = mdb_page_touch(csrc)) ||
7883 (rc = mdb_page_touch(cdst)))
7884 return rc;
7885
7886 if (IS_LEAF2(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top])) {
7887 key.mv_size = csrc->mc_db->md_pad;
7888 key.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top], csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top], key.mv_size);
7889 data.mv_size = 0;
7890 data.mv_data = NULL;
7891 srcpg = 0;
7892 flags = 0;
7893 } else {
7894 srcnode = NODEPTR(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top], csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top]);
7895 mdb_cassert(csrc, !((size_t)srcnode & 1));
7896 srcpg = NODEPGNO(srcnode);
7897 flags = srcnode->mn_flags;
7898 if (csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] == 0 && IS_BRANCH(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top])) {
7899 unsigned int snum = csrc->mc_snum;
7900 MDB_node *s2;
7901 /* must find the lowest key below src */
7902 rc = mdb_page_search_lowest(csrc);
7903 if (rc)
7904 return rc;
7905 if (IS_LEAF2(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top])) {
7906 key.mv_size = csrc->mc_db->md_pad;
7907 key.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top], 0, key.mv_size);
7908 } else {
7909 s2 = NODEPTR(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top], 0);
7910 key.mv_size = NODEKSZ(s2);
7911 key.mv_data = NODEKEY(s2);
7912 }
7913 csrc->mc_snum = snum--;
7914 csrc->mc_top = snum;
7915 } else {
7916 key.mv_size = NODEKSZ(srcnode);
7917 key.mv_data = NODEKEY(srcnode);
7918 }
7919 data.mv_size = NODEDSZ(srcnode);
7920 data.mv_data = NODEDATA(srcnode);
7921 }
7922 mn.mc_xcursor = NULL;
7923 if (IS_BRANCH(cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top]) && cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top] == 0) {
7924 unsigned int snum = cdst->mc_snum;
7925 MDB_node *s2;
7926 MDB_val bkey;
7927 /* must find the lowest key below dst */
7928 mdb_cursor_copy(cdst, &mn);
7929 rc = mdb_page_search_lowest(&mn);
7930 if (rc)
7931 return rc;
7932 if (IS_LEAF2(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top])) {
7933 bkey.mv_size = mn.mc_db->md_pad;
7934 bkey.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top], 0, bkey.mv_size);
7935 } else {
7936 s2 = NODEPTR(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top], 0);
7937 bkey.mv_size = NODEKSZ(s2);
7938 bkey.mv_data = NODEKEY(s2);
7939 }
7940 mn.mc_snum = snum--;
7941 mn.mc_top = snum;
7942 mn.mc_ki[snum] = 0;
7943 rc = mdb_update_key(&mn, &bkey);
7944 if (rc)
7945 return rc;
7946 }
7947
7948 DPRINTF(("moving %s node %u [%s] on page %"Z"u to node %u on page %"Z"u",
7949 IS_LEAF(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top]) ? "leaf" : "branch",
7950 csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top],
7951 DKEY(&key),
7952 csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top]->mp_pgno,
7953 cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top], cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top]->mp_pgno));
7954
7955 /* Add the node to the destination page.
7956 */
7957 rc = mdb_node_add(cdst, cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top], &key, &data, srcpg, flags);
7958 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
7959 return rc;
7960
7961 /* Delete the node from the source page.
7962 */
7963 mdb_node_del(csrc, key.mv_size);
7964
7965 {
7966 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
7967 MDB_cursor *m2, *m3;
7968 MDB_dbi dbi = csrc->mc_dbi;
7969 MDB_page *mpd, *mps;
7970
7971 mps = csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top];
7972 /* If we're adding on the left, bump others up */
7973 if (fromleft) {
7974 mpd = cdst->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top];
7975 for (m2 = csrc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
7976 if (csrc->mc_flags & C_SUB)
7977 m3 = &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
7978 else
7979 m3 = m2;
7980 if (!(m3->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) || m3->mc_top < csrc->mc_top)
7981 continue;
7982 if (m3 != cdst &&
7983 m3->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top] == mpd &&
7984 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] >= cdst->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top]) {
7985 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top]++;
7986 }
7987 if (m3 !=csrc &&
7988 m3->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top] == mps &&
7989 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] == csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top]) {
7990 m3->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top] = cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top];
7991 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] = cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top];
7992 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top-1]++;
7993 }
7994 if (IS_LEAF(mps))
7995 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m3, csrc->mc_top, m3->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top]);
7996 }
7997 } else
7998 /* Adding on the right, bump others down */
7999 {
8000 for (m2 = csrc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
8001 if (csrc->mc_flags & C_SUB)
8002 m3 = &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
8003 else
8004 m3 = m2;
8005 if (m3 == csrc) continue;
8006 if (!(m3->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) || m3->mc_top < csrc->mc_top)
8007 continue;
8008 if (m3->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top] == mps) {
8009 if (!m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top]) {
8010 m3->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top] = cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top];
8011 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] = cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top];
8012 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top-1]--;
8013 } else {
8014 m3->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top]--;
8015 }
8016 if (IS_LEAF(mps))
8017 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m3, csrc->mc_top, m3->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top]);
8018 }
8019 }
8020 }
8021 }
8022
8023 /* Update the parent separators.
8024 */
8025 if (csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] == 0) {
8026 if (csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top-1] != 0) {
8027 if (IS_LEAF2(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top])) {
8028 key.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top], 0, key.mv_size);
8029 } else {
8030 srcnode = NODEPTR(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top], 0);
8031 key.mv_size = NODEKSZ(srcnode);
8032 key.mv_data = NODEKEY(srcnode);
8033 }
8034 DPRINTF(("update separator for source page %"Z"u to [%s]",
8035 csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top]->mp_pgno, DKEY(&key)));
8036 mdb_cursor_copy(csrc, &mn);
8037 mn.mc_snum--;
8038 mn.mc_top--;
8039 /* We want mdb_rebalance to find mn when doing fixups */
8040 WITH_CURSOR_TRACKING(mn,
8041 rc = mdb_update_key(&mn, &key));
8042 if (rc)
8043 return rc;
8044 }
8045 if (IS_BRANCH(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top])) {
8046 MDB_val nullkey;
8047 indx_t ix = csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top];
8048 nullkey.mv_size = 0;
8049 csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] = 0;
8050 rc = mdb_update_key(csrc, &nullkey);
8051 csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] = ix;
8052 mdb_cassert(csrc, rc == MDB_SUCCESS);
8053 }
8054 }
8055
8056 if (cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top] == 0) {
8057 if (cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top-1] != 0) {
8058 if (IS_LEAF2(csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top])) {
8059 key.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top], 0, key.mv_size);
8060 } else {
8061 srcnode = NODEPTR(cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top], 0);
8062 key.mv_size = NODEKSZ(srcnode);
8063 key.mv_data = NODEKEY(srcnode);
8064 }
8065 DPRINTF(("update separator for destination page %"Z"u to [%s]",
8066 cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top]->mp_pgno, DKEY(&key)));
8067 mdb_cursor_copy(cdst, &mn);
8068 mn.mc_snum--;
8069 mn.mc_top--;
8070 /* We want mdb_rebalance to find mn when doing fixups */
8071 WITH_CURSOR_TRACKING(mn,
8072 rc = mdb_update_key(&mn, &key));
8073 if (rc)
8074 return rc;
8075 }
8076 if (IS_BRANCH(cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top])) {
8077 MDB_val nullkey;
8078 indx_t ix = cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top];
8079 nullkey.mv_size = 0;
8080 cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top] = 0;
8081 rc = mdb_update_key(cdst, &nullkey);
8082 cdst->mc_ki[cdst->mc_top] = ix;
8083 mdb_cassert(cdst, rc == MDB_SUCCESS);
8084 }
8085 }
8086
8087 return MDB_SUCCESS;
8088}
8089
8098static int
8099mdb_page_merge(MDB_cursor *csrc, MDB_cursor *cdst)
8100{
8101 MDB_page *psrc, *pdst;
8102 MDB_node *srcnode;
8103 MDB_val key, data;
8104 unsigned nkeys;
8105 int rc;
8106 indx_t i, j;
8107
8108 psrc = csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top];
8109 pdst = cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top];
8110
8111 DPRINTF(("merging page %"Z"u into %"Z"u", psrc->mp_pgno, pdst->mp_pgno));
8112
8113 mdb_cassert(csrc, csrc->mc_snum > 1); /* can't merge root page */
8114 mdb_cassert(csrc, cdst->mc_snum > 1);
8115
8116 /* Mark dst as dirty. */
8117 if ((rc = mdb_page_touch(cdst)))
8118 return rc;
8119
8120 /* get dst page again now that we've touched it. */
8121 pdst = cdst->mc_pg[cdst->mc_top];
8122
8123 /* Move all nodes from src to dst.
8124 */
8125 j = nkeys = NUMKEYS(pdst);
8126 if (IS_LEAF2(psrc)) {
8127 key.mv_size = csrc->mc_db->md_pad;
8128 key.mv_data = METADATA(psrc);
8129 for (i = 0; i < NUMKEYS(psrc); i++, j++) {
8130 rc = mdb_node_add(cdst, j, &key, NULL, 0, 0);
8131 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
8132 return rc;
8133 key.mv_data = (char *)key.mv_data + key.mv_size;
8134 }
8135 } else {
8136 for (i = 0; i < NUMKEYS(psrc); i++, j++) {
8137 srcnode = NODEPTR(psrc, i);
8138 if (i == 0 && IS_BRANCH(psrc)) {
8139 MDB_cursor mn;
8140 MDB_node *s2;
8141 mdb_cursor_copy(csrc, &mn);
8142 mn.mc_xcursor = NULL;
8143 /* must find the lowest key below src */
8144 rc = mdb_page_search_lowest(&mn);
8145 if (rc)
8146 return rc;
8147 if (IS_LEAF2(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top])) {
8148 key.mv_size = mn.mc_db->md_pad;
8149 key.mv_data = LEAF2KEY(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top], 0, key.mv_size);
8150 } else {
8151 s2 = NODEPTR(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top], 0);
8152 key.mv_size = NODEKSZ(s2);
8153 key.mv_data = NODEKEY(s2);
8154 }
8155 } else {
8156 key.mv_size = srcnode->mn_ksize;
8157 key.mv_data = NODEKEY(srcnode);
8158 }
8159
8160 data.mv_size = NODEDSZ(srcnode);
8161 data.mv_data = NODEDATA(srcnode);
8162 rc = mdb_node_add(cdst, j, &key, &data, NODEPGNO(srcnode), srcnode->mn_flags);
8163 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS)
8164 return rc;
8165 }
8166 }
8167
8168 DPRINTF(("dst page %"Z"u now has %u keys (%.1f%% filled)",
8169 pdst->mp_pgno, NUMKEYS(pdst),
8170 (float)PAGEFILL(cdst->mc_txn->mt_env, pdst) / 10));
8171
8172 /* Unlink the src page from parent and add to free list.
8173 */
8174 csrc->mc_top--;
8175 mdb_node_del(csrc, 0);
8176 if (csrc->mc_ki[csrc->mc_top] == 0) {
8177 key.mv_size = 0;
8178 rc = mdb_update_key(csrc, &key);
8179 if (rc) {
8180 csrc->mc_top++;
8181 return rc;
8182 }
8183 }
8184 csrc->mc_top++;
8185
8186 psrc = csrc->mc_pg[csrc->mc_top];
8187 /* If not operating on FreeDB, allow this page to be reused
8188 * in this txn. Otherwise just add to free list.
8189 */
8190 rc = mdb_page_loose(csrc, psrc);
8191 if (rc)
8192 return rc;
8193 if (IS_LEAF(psrc))
8194 csrc->mc_db->md_leaf_pages--;
8195 else
8196 csrc->mc_db->md_branch_pages--;
8197 {
8198 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
8199 MDB_cursor *m2, *m3;
8200 MDB_dbi dbi = csrc->mc_dbi;
8201 unsigned int top = csrc->mc_top;
8202
8203 for (m2 = csrc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
8204 if (csrc->mc_flags & C_SUB)
8205 m3 = &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
8206 else
8207 m3 = m2;
8208 if (m3 == csrc) continue;
8209 if (m3->mc_snum < csrc->mc_snum) continue;
8210 if (m3->mc_pg[top] == psrc) {
8211 m3->mc_pg[top] = pdst;
8212 m3->mc_ki[top] += nkeys;
8213 m3->mc_ki[top-1] = cdst->mc_ki[top-1];
8214 } else if (m3->mc_pg[top-1] == csrc->mc_pg[top-1] &&
8215 m3->mc_ki[top-1] > csrc->mc_ki[top-1]) {
8216 m3->mc_ki[top-1]--;
8217 }
8218 if (IS_LEAF(psrc))
8219 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m3, top, m3->mc_pg[top]);
8220 }
8221 }
8222 {
8223 unsigned int snum = cdst->mc_snum;
8224 uint16_t depth = cdst->mc_db->md_depth;
8225 mdb_cursor_pop(cdst);
8226 rc = mdb_rebalance(cdst);
8227 /* Did the tree height change? */
8228 if (depth != cdst->mc_db->md_depth)
8229 snum += cdst->mc_db->md_depth - depth;
8230 cdst->mc_snum = snum;
8231 cdst->mc_top = snum-1;
8232 }
8233 return rc;
8234}
8235
8240static void
8241mdb_cursor_copy(const MDB_cursor *csrc, MDB_cursor *cdst)
8242{
8243 unsigned int i;
8244
8245 cdst->mc_txn = csrc->mc_txn;
8246 cdst->mc_dbi = csrc->mc_dbi;
8247 cdst->mc_db = csrc->mc_db;
8248 cdst->mc_dbx = csrc->mc_dbx;
8249 cdst->mc_snum = csrc->mc_snum;
8250 cdst->mc_top = csrc->mc_top;
8251 cdst->mc_flags = csrc->mc_flags;
8252
8253 for (i=0; i<csrc->mc_snum; i++) {
8254 cdst->mc_pg[i] = csrc->mc_pg[i];
8255 cdst->mc_ki[i] = csrc->mc_ki[i];
8256 }
8257}
8258
8264static int
8265mdb_rebalance(MDB_cursor *mc)
8266{
8267 MDB_node *node;
8268 int rc, fromleft;
8269 unsigned int ptop, minkeys, thresh;
8270 MDB_cursor mn;
8271 indx_t oldki;
8272
8273 if (IS_BRANCH(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top])) {
8274 minkeys = 2;
8275 thresh = 1;
8276 } else {
8277 minkeys = 1;
8278 thresh = FILL_THRESHOLD;
8279 }
8280 DPRINTF(("rebalancing %s page %"Z"u (has %u keys, %.1f%% full)",
8281 IS_LEAF(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) ? "leaf" : "branch",
8282 mdb_dbg_pgno(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]), NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]),
8283 (float)PAGEFILL(mc->mc_txn->mt_env, mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) / 10));
8284
8285 if (PAGEFILL(mc->mc_txn->mt_env, mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) >= thresh &&
8286 NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]) >= minkeys) {
8287 DPRINTF(("no need to rebalance page %"Z"u, above fill threshold",
8288 mdb_dbg_pgno(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top])));
8289 return MDB_SUCCESS;
8290 }
8291
8292 if (mc->mc_snum < 2) {
8293 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[0];
8294 if (IS_SUBP(mp)) {
8295 DPUTS("Can't rebalance a subpage, ignoring");
8296 return MDB_SUCCESS;
8297 }
8298 if (NUMKEYS(mp) == 0) {
8299 DPUTS("tree is completely empty");
8300 mc->mc_db->md_root = P_INVALID;
8301 mc->mc_db->md_depth = 0;
8302 mc->mc_db->md_leaf_pages = 0;
8303 rc = mdb_midl_append(&mc->mc_txn->mt_free_pgs, mp->mp_pgno);
8304 if (rc)
8305 return rc;
8306 /* Adjust cursors pointing to mp */
8307 mc->mc_snum = 0;
8308 mc->mc_top = 0;
8309 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_INITIALIZED;
8310 {
8311 MDB_cursor *m2, *m3;
8312 MDB_dbi dbi = mc->mc_dbi;
8313
8314 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
8315 if (mc->mc_flags & C_SUB)
8316 m3 = &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
8317 else
8318 m3 = m2;
8319 if (!(m3->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) || (m3->mc_snum < mc->mc_snum))
8320 continue;
8321 if (m3->mc_pg[0] == mp) {
8322 m3->mc_snum = 0;
8323 m3->mc_top = 0;
8324 m3->mc_flags &= ~C_INITIALIZED;
8325 }
8326 }
8327 }
8328 } else if (IS_BRANCH(mp) && NUMKEYS(mp) == 1) {
8329 int i;
8330 DPUTS("collapsing root page!");
8331 rc = mdb_midl_append(&mc->mc_txn->mt_free_pgs, mp->mp_pgno);
8332 if (rc)
8333 return rc;
8334 mc->mc_db->md_root = NODEPGNO(NODEPTR(mp, 0));
8335 rc = mdb_page_get(mc, mc->mc_db->md_root, &mc->mc_pg[0], NULL);
8336 if (rc)
8337 return rc;
8338 mc->mc_db->md_depth--;
8339 mc->mc_db->md_branch_pages--;
8340 mc->mc_ki[0] = mc->mc_ki[1];
8341 for (i = 1; i<mc->mc_db->md_depth; i++) {
8342 mc->mc_pg[i] = mc->mc_pg[i+1];
8343 mc->mc_ki[i] = mc->mc_ki[i+1];
8344 }
8345 {
8346 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
8347 MDB_cursor *m2, *m3;
8348 MDB_dbi dbi = mc->mc_dbi;
8349
8350 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
8351 if (mc->mc_flags & C_SUB)
8352 m3 = &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
8353 else
8354 m3 = m2;
8355 if (m3 == mc) continue;
8356 if (!(m3->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
8357 continue;
8358 if (m3->mc_pg[0] == mp) {
8359 for (i=0; i<mc->mc_db->md_depth; i++) {
8360 m3->mc_pg[i] = m3->mc_pg[i+1];
8361 m3->mc_ki[i] = m3->mc_ki[i+1];
8362 }
8363 m3->mc_snum--;
8364 m3->mc_top--;
8365 }
8366 }
8367 }
8368 } else
8369 DPUTS("root page doesn't need rebalancing");
8370 return MDB_SUCCESS;
8371 }
8372
8373 /* The parent (branch page) must have at least 2 pointers,
8374 * otherwise the tree is invalid.
8375 */
8376 ptop = mc->mc_top-1;
8377 mdb_cassert(mc, NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[ptop]) > 1);
8378
8379 /* Leaf page fill factor is below the threshold.
8380 * Try to move keys from left or right neighbor, or
8381 * merge with a neighbor page.
8382 */
8383
8384 /* Find neighbors.
8385 */
8386 mdb_cursor_copy(mc, &mn);
8387 mn.mc_xcursor = NULL;
8388
8389 oldki = mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top];
8390 if (mc->mc_ki[ptop] == 0) {
8391 /* We're the leftmost leaf in our parent.
8392 */
8393 DPUTS("reading right neighbor");
8394 mn.mc_ki[ptop]++;
8395 node = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[ptop], mn.mc_ki[ptop]);
8396 rc = mdb_page_get(mc, NODEPGNO(node), &mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top], NULL);
8397 if (rc)
8398 return rc;
8399 mn.mc_ki[mn.mc_top] = 0;
8400 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]);
8401 fromleft = 0;
8402 } else {
8403 /* There is at least one neighbor to the left.
8404 */
8405 DPUTS("reading left neighbor");
8406 mn.mc_ki[ptop]--;
8407 node = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[ptop], mn.mc_ki[ptop]);
8408 rc = mdb_page_get(mc, NODEPGNO(node), &mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top], NULL);
8409 if (rc)
8410 return rc;
8411 mn.mc_ki[mn.mc_top] = NUMKEYS(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top]) - 1;
8412 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
8413 fromleft = 1;
8414 }
8415
8416 DPRINTF(("found neighbor page %"Z"u (%u keys, %.1f%% full)",
8417 mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top]->mp_pgno, NUMKEYS(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top]),
8418 (float)PAGEFILL(mc->mc_txn->mt_env, mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top]) / 10));
8419
8420 /* If the neighbor page is above threshold and has enough keys,
8421 * move one key from it. Otherwise we should try to merge them.
8422 * (A branch page must never have less than 2 keys.)
8423 */
8424 if (PAGEFILL(mc->mc_txn->mt_env, mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top]) >= thresh && NUMKEYS(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top]) > minkeys) {
8425 rc = mdb_node_move(&mn, mc, fromleft);
8426 if (fromleft) {
8427 /* if we inserted on left, bump position up */
8428 oldki++;
8429 }
8430 } else {
8431 if (!fromleft) {
8432 rc = mdb_page_merge(&mn, mc);
8433 } else {
8434 oldki += NUMKEYS(mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top]);
8435 mn.mc_ki[mn.mc_top] += mc->mc_ki[mn.mc_top] + 1;
8436 /* We want mdb_rebalance to find mn when doing fixups */
8437 WITH_CURSOR_TRACKING(mn,
8438 rc = mdb_page_merge(mc, &mn));
8439 mdb_cursor_copy(&mn, mc);
8440 }
8441 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_EOF;
8442 }
8443 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = oldki;
8444 return rc;
8445}
8446
8448static int
8449mdb_cursor_del0(MDB_cursor *mc)
8450{
8451 int rc;
8452 MDB_page *mp;
8453 indx_t ki;
8454 unsigned int nkeys;
8455 MDB_cursor *m2, *m3;
8456 MDB_dbi dbi = mc->mc_dbi;
8457
8458 ki = mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top];
8459 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
8460 mdb_node_del(mc, mc->mc_db->md_pad);
8461 mc->mc_db->md_entries--;
8462 {
8463 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
8464 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
8465 m3 = (mc->mc_flags & C_SUB) ? &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor : m2;
8466 if (! (m2->mc_flags & m3->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
8467 continue;
8468 if (m3 == mc || m3->mc_snum < mc->mc_snum)
8469 continue;
8470 if (m3->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] == mp) {
8471 if (m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] == ki) {
8472 m3->mc_flags |= C_DEL;
8473 if (mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT) {
8474 /* Sub-cursor referred into dataset which is gone */
8475 m3->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
8476 }
8477 continue;
8478 } else if (m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] > ki) {
8479 m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]--;
8480 }
8481 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m3, mc->mc_top, mp);
8482 }
8483 }
8484 }
8485 rc = mdb_rebalance(mc);
8486 if (rc)
8487 goto fail;
8488
8489 /* DB is totally empty now, just bail out.
8490 * Other cursors adjustments were already done
8491 * by mdb_rebalance and aren't needed here.
8492 */
8493 if (!mc->mc_snum) {
8494 mc->mc_flags |= C_EOF;
8495 return rc;
8496 }
8497
8498 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
8499 nkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
8500
8501 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
8502 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; !rc && m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
8503 m3 = (mc->mc_flags & C_SUB) ? &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor : m2;
8504 if (!(m2->mc_flags & m3->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
8505 continue;
8506 if (m3->mc_snum < mc->mc_snum)
8507 continue;
8508 if (m3->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] == mp) {
8509 if (m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]) {
8510 /* if m3 points past last node in page, find next sibling */
8511 if (m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= nkeys) {
8512 rc = mdb_cursor_sibling(m3, 1);
8513 if (rc == MDB_NOTFOUND) {
8514 m3->mc_flags |= C_EOF;
8515 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
8516 continue;
8517 }
8518 if (rc)
8519 goto fail;
8520 }
8521 if (m3->mc_xcursor && !(m3->mc_flags & C_EOF)) {
8522 MDB_node *node = NODEPTR(m3->mc_pg[m3->mc_top], m3->mc_ki[m3->mc_top]);
8523 /* If this node has dupdata, it may need to be reinited
8524 * because its data has moved.
8525 * If the xcursor was not initd it must be reinited.
8526 * Else if node points to a subDB, nothing is needed.
8527 * Else (xcursor was initd, not a subDB) needs mc_pg[0] reset.
8528 */
8529 if (node->mn_flags & F_DUPDATA) {
8530 if (m3->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED) {
8531 if (!(node->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA))
8532 m3->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_pg[0] = NODEDATA(node);
8533 } else {
8534 mdb_xcursor_init1(m3, node);
8535 rc = mdb_cursor_first(&m3->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, NULL, NULL);
8536 if (rc)
8537 goto fail;
8538 }
8539 }
8540 m3->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor.mc_flags |= C_DEL;
8541 }
8542 }
8543 }
8544 }
8545 mc->mc_flags |= C_DEL;
8546
8547fail:
8548 if (rc)
8549 mc->mc_txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
8550 return rc;
8551}
8552
8553int
8554mdb_del(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi,
8555 MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data)
8556{
8557 if (!key || !TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
8558 return EINVAL;
8559
8560 if (txn->mt_flags & (MDB_TXN_RDONLY|MDB_TXN_BLOCKED))
8561 return (txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_RDONLY) ? EACCES : MDB_BAD_TXN;
8562
8563 if (!F_ISSET(txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_flags, MDB_DUPSORT)) {
8564 /* must ignore any data */
8565 data = NULL;
8566 }
8567
8568 return mdb_del0(txn, dbi, key, data, 0);
8569}
8570
8571static int
8572mdb_del0(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi,
8573 MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data, unsigned flags)
8574{
8575 MDB_cursor mc;
8576 MDB_xcursor mx;
8577 MDB_cursor_op op;
8578 MDB_val rdata, *xdata;
8579 int rc, exact = 0;
8580 DKBUF;
8581
8582 DPRINTF(("====> delete db %u key [%s]", dbi, DKEY(key)));
8583
8584 mdb_cursor_init(&mc, txn, dbi, &mx);
8585
8586 if (data) {
8587 op = MDB_GET_BOTH;
8588 rdata = *data;
8589 xdata = &rdata;
8590 } else {
8591 op = MDB_SET;
8592 xdata = NULL;
8593 flags |= MDB_NODUPDATA;
8594 }
8595 rc = mdb_cursor_set(&mc, key, xdata, op, &exact);
8596 if (rc == 0) {
8597 /* let mdb_page_split know about this cursor if needed:
8598 * delete will trigger a rebalance; if it needs to move
8599 * a node from one page to another, it will have to
8600 * update the parent's separator key(s). If the new sepkey
8601 * is larger than the current one, the parent page may
8602 * run out of space, triggering a split. We need this
8603 * cursor to be consistent until the end of the rebalance.
8604 */
8605 mc.mc_flags |= C_UNTRACK;
8606 mc.mc_next = txn->mt_cursors[dbi];
8607 txn->mt_cursors[dbi] = &mc;
8608 rc = mdb_cursor_del(&mc, flags);
8609 txn->mt_cursors[dbi] = mc.mc_next;
8610 }
8611 return rc;
8612}
8613
8625static int
8626mdb_page_split(MDB_cursor *mc, MDB_val *newkey, MDB_val *newdata, pgno_t newpgno,
8627 unsigned int nflags)
8628{
8629 unsigned int flags;
8630 int rc = MDB_SUCCESS, new_root = 0, did_split = 0;
8631 indx_t newindx;
8632 pgno_t pgno = 0;
8633 int i, j, split_indx, nkeys, pmax;
8634 MDB_env *env = mc->mc_txn->mt_env;
8635 MDB_node *node;
8636 MDB_val sepkey, rkey, xdata, *rdata = &xdata;
8637 MDB_page *copy = NULL;
8638 MDB_page *mp, *rp, *pp;
8639 int ptop;
8640 MDB_cursor mn;
8641 DKBUF;
8642
8643 mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
8644 newindx = mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top];
8645 nkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
8646
8647 DPRINTF(("-----> splitting %s page %"Z"u and adding [%s] at index %i/%i",
8648 IS_LEAF(mp) ? "leaf" : "branch", mp->mp_pgno,
8649 DKEY(newkey), mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], nkeys));
8650
8651 /* Create a right sibling. */
8652 if ((rc = mdb_page_new(mc, mp->mp_flags, 1, &rp)))
8653 return rc;
8654 rp->mp_pad = mp->mp_pad;
8655 DPRINTF(("new right sibling: page %"Z"u", rp->mp_pgno));
8656
8657 /* Usually when splitting the root page, the cursor
8658 * height is 1. But when called from mdb_update_key,
8659 * the cursor height may be greater because it walks
8660 * up the stack while finding the branch slot to update.
8661 */
8662 if (mc->mc_top < 1) {
8663 if ((rc = mdb_page_new(mc, P_BRANCH, 1, &pp)))
8664 goto done;
8665 /* shift current top to make room for new parent */
8666 for (i=mc->mc_snum; i>0; i--) {
8667 mc->mc_pg[i] = mc->mc_pg[i-1];
8668 mc->mc_ki[i] = mc->mc_ki[i-1];
8669 }
8670 mc->mc_pg[0] = pp;
8671 mc->mc_ki[0] = 0;
8672 mc->mc_db->md_root = pp->mp_pgno;
8673 DPRINTF(("root split! new root = %"Z"u", pp->mp_pgno));
8674 new_root = mc->mc_db->md_depth++;
8675
8676 /* Add left (implicit) pointer. */
8677 if ((rc = mdb_node_add(mc, 0, NULL, NULL, mp->mp_pgno, 0)) != MDB_SUCCESS) {
8678 /* undo the pre-push */
8679 mc->mc_pg[0] = mc->mc_pg[1];
8680 mc->mc_ki[0] = mc->mc_ki[1];
8681 mc->mc_db->md_root = mp->mp_pgno;
8682 mc->mc_db->md_depth--;
8683 goto done;
8684 }
8685 mc->mc_snum++;
8686 mc->mc_top++;
8687 ptop = 0;
8688 } else {
8689 ptop = mc->mc_top-1;
8690 DPRINTF(("parent branch page is %"Z"u", mc->mc_pg[ptop]->mp_pgno));
8691 }
8692
8693 mdb_cursor_copy(mc, &mn);
8694 mn.mc_xcursor = NULL;
8695 mn.mc_pg[mn.mc_top] = rp;
8696 mn.mc_ki[ptop] = mc->mc_ki[ptop]+1;
8697
8698 if (nflags & MDB_APPEND) {
8699 mn.mc_ki[mn.mc_top] = 0;
8700 sepkey = *newkey;
8701 split_indx = newindx;
8702 nkeys = 0;
8703 } else {
8704
8705 split_indx = (nkeys+1) / 2;
8706
8707 if (IS_LEAF2(rp)) {
8708 char *split, *ins;
8709 int x;
8710 unsigned int lsize, rsize, ksize;
8711 /* Move half of the keys to the right sibling */
8712 x = mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] - split_indx;
8713 ksize = mc->mc_db->md_pad;
8714 split = LEAF2KEY(mp, split_indx, ksize);
8715 rsize = (nkeys - split_indx) * ksize;
8716 lsize = (nkeys - split_indx) * sizeof(indx_t);
8717 mp->mp_lower -= lsize;
8718 rp->mp_lower += lsize;
8719 mp->mp_upper += rsize - lsize;
8720 rp->mp_upper -= rsize - lsize;
8721 sepkey.mv_size = ksize;
8722 if (newindx == split_indx) {
8723 sepkey.mv_data = newkey->mv_data;
8724 } else {
8725 sepkey.mv_data = split;
8726 }
8727 if (x<0) {
8728 ins = LEAF2KEY(mp, mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top], ksize);
8729 memcpy(rp->mp_ptrs, split, rsize);
8730 sepkey.mv_data = rp->mp_ptrs;
8731 memmove(ins+ksize, ins, (split_indx - mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]) * ksize);
8732 memcpy(ins, newkey->mv_data, ksize);
8733 mp->mp_lower += sizeof(indx_t);
8734 mp->mp_upper -= ksize - sizeof(indx_t);
8735 } else {
8736 if (x)
8737 memcpy(rp->mp_ptrs, split, x * ksize);
8738 ins = LEAF2KEY(rp, x, ksize);
8739 memcpy(ins, newkey->mv_data, ksize);
8740 memcpy(ins+ksize, split + x * ksize, rsize - x * ksize);
8741 rp->mp_lower += sizeof(indx_t);
8742 rp->mp_upper -= ksize - sizeof(indx_t);
8743 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = x;
8744 }
8745 } else {
8746 int psize, nsize, k;
8747 /* Maximum free space in an empty page */
8748 pmax = env->me_psize - PAGEHDRSZ;
8749 if (IS_LEAF(mp))
8750 nsize = mdb_leaf_size(env, newkey, newdata);
8751 else
8752 nsize = mdb_branch_size(env, newkey);
8753 nsize = EVEN(nsize);
8754
8755 /* grab a page to hold a temporary copy */
8756 copy = mdb_page_malloc(mc->mc_txn, 1);
8757 if (copy == NULL) {
8758 rc = ENOMEM;
8759 goto done;
8760 }
8761 copy->mp_pgno = mp->mp_pgno;
8762 copy->mp_flags = mp->mp_flags;
8763 copy->mp_lower = (PAGEHDRSZ-PAGEBASE);
8764 copy->mp_upper = env->me_psize - PAGEBASE;
8765
8766 /* prepare to insert */
8767 for (i=0, j=0; i<nkeys; i++) {
8768 if (i == newindx) {
8769 copy->mp_ptrs[j++] = 0;
8770 }
8771 copy->mp_ptrs[j++] = mp->mp_ptrs[i];
8772 }
8773
8774 /* When items are relatively large the split point needs
8775 * to be checked, because being off-by-one will make the
8776 * difference between success or failure in mdb_node_add.
8777 *
8778 * It's also relevant if a page happens to be laid out
8779 * such that one half of its nodes are all "small" and
8780 * the other half of its nodes are "large." If the new
8781 * item is also "large" and falls on the half with
8782 * "large" nodes, it also may not fit.
8783 *
8784 * As a final tweak, if the new item goes on the last
8785 * spot on the page (and thus, onto the new page), bias
8786 * the split so the new page is emptier than the old page.
8787 * This yields better packing during sequential inserts.
8788 */
8789 if (nkeys < 32 || nsize > pmax/16 || newindx >= nkeys) {
8790 /* Find split point */
8791 psize = 0;
8792 if (newindx <= split_indx || newindx >= nkeys) {
8793 i = 0; j = 1;
8794 k = newindx >= nkeys ? nkeys : split_indx+1+IS_LEAF(mp);
8795 } else {
8796 i = nkeys; j = -1;
8797 k = split_indx-1;
8798 }
8799 for (; i!=k; i+=j) {
8800 if (i == newindx) {
8801 psize += nsize;
8802 node = NULL;
8803 } else {
8804 node = (MDB_node *)((char *)mp + copy->mp_ptrs[i] + PAGEBASE);
8805 psize += NODESIZE + NODEKSZ(node) + sizeof(indx_t);
8806 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
8807 if (F_ISSET(node->mn_flags, F_BIGDATA))
8808 psize += sizeof(pgno_t);
8809 else
8810 psize += NODEDSZ(node);
8811 }
8812 psize = EVEN(psize);
8813 }
8814 if (psize > pmax || i == k-j) {
8815 split_indx = i + (j<0);
8816 break;
8817 }
8818 }
8819 }
8820 if (split_indx == newindx) {
8821 sepkey.mv_size = newkey->mv_size;
8822 sepkey.mv_data = newkey->mv_data;
8823 } else {
8824 node = (MDB_node *)((char *)mp + copy->mp_ptrs[split_indx] + PAGEBASE);
8825 sepkey.mv_size = node->mn_ksize;
8826 sepkey.mv_data = NODEKEY(node);
8827 }
8828 }
8829 }
8830
8831 DPRINTF(("separator is %d [%s]", split_indx, DKEY(&sepkey)));
8832
8833 /* Copy separator key to the parent.
8834 */
8835 if (SIZELEFT(mn.mc_pg[ptop]) < mdb_branch_size(env, &sepkey)) {
8836 int snum = mc->mc_snum;
8837 mn.mc_snum--;
8838 mn.mc_top--;
8839 did_split = 1;
8840 /* We want other splits to find mn when doing fixups */
8841 WITH_CURSOR_TRACKING(mn,
8842 rc = mdb_page_split(&mn, &sepkey, NULL, rp->mp_pgno, 0));
8843 if (rc)
8844 goto done;
8845
8846 /* root split? */
8847 if (mc->mc_snum > snum) {
8848 ptop++;
8849 }
8850 /* Right page might now have changed parent.
8851 * Check if left page also changed parent.
8852 */
8853 if (mn.mc_pg[ptop] != mc->mc_pg[ptop] &&
8854 mc->mc_ki[ptop] >= NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[ptop])) {
8855 for (i=0; i<ptop; i++) {
8856 mc->mc_pg[i] = mn.mc_pg[i];
8857 mc->mc_ki[i] = mn.mc_ki[i];
8858 }
8859 mc->mc_pg[ptop] = mn.mc_pg[ptop];
8860 if (mn.mc_ki[ptop]) {
8861 mc->mc_ki[ptop] = mn.mc_ki[ptop] - 1;
8862 } else {
8863 /* find right page's left sibling */
8864 mc->mc_ki[ptop] = mn.mc_ki[ptop];
8865 mdb_cursor_sibling(mc, 0);
8866 }
8867 }
8868 } else {
8869 mn.mc_top--;
8870 rc = mdb_node_add(&mn, mn.mc_ki[ptop], &sepkey, NULL, rp->mp_pgno, 0);
8871 mn.mc_top++;
8872 }
8873 if (rc != MDB_SUCCESS) {
8874 goto done;
8875 }
8876 if (nflags & MDB_APPEND) {
8877 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = rp;
8878 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = 0;
8879 rc = mdb_node_add(mc, 0, newkey, newdata, newpgno, nflags);
8880 if (rc)
8881 goto done;
8882 for (i=0; i<mc->mc_top; i++)
8883 mc->mc_ki[i] = mn.mc_ki[i];
8884 } else if (!IS_LEAF2(mp)) {
8885 /* Move nodes */
8886 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = rp;
8887 i = split_indx;
8888 j = 0;
8889 do {
8890 if (i == newindx) {
8891 rkey.mv_data = newkey->mv_data;
8892 rkey.mv_size = newkey->mv_size;
8893 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
8894 rdata = newdata;
8895 } else
8896 pgno = newpgno;
8897 flags = nflags;
8898 /* Update index for the new key. */
8899 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = j;
8900 } else {
8901 node = (MDB_node *)((char *)mp + copy->mp_ptrs[i] + PAGEBASE);
8902 rkey.mv_data = NODEKEY(node);
8903 rkey.mv_size = node->mn_ksize;
8904 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
8905 xdata.mv_data = NODEDATA(node);
8906 xdata.mv_size = NODEDSZ(node);
8907 rdata = &xdata;
8908 } else
8909 pgno = NODEPGNO(node);
8910 flags = node->mn_flags;
8911 }
8912
8913 if (!IS_LEAF(mp) && j == 0) {
8914 /* First branch index doesn't need key data. */
8915 rkey.mv_size = 0;
8916 }
8917
8918 rc = mdb_node_add(mc, j, &rkey, rdata, pgno, flags);
8919 if (rc)
8920 goto done;
8921 if (i == nkeys) {
8922 i = 0;
8923 j = 0;
8924 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = copy;
8925 } else {
8926 i++;
8927 j++;
8928 }
8929 } while (i != split_indx);
8930
8931 nkeys = NUMKEYS(copy);
8932 for (i=0; i<nkeys; i++)
8933 mp->mp_ptrs[i] = copy->mp_ptrs[i];
8934 mp->mp_lower = copy->mp_lower;
8935 mp->mp_upper = copy->mp_upper;
8936 memcpy(NODEPTR(mp, nkeys-1), NODEPTR(copy, nkeys-1),
8937 env->me_psize - copy->mp_upper - PAGEBASE);
8938
8939 /* reset back to original page */
8940 if (newindx < split_indx) {
8941 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = mp;
8942 } else {
8943 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = rp;
8944 mc->mc_ki[ptop]++;
8945 /* Make sure mc_ki is still valid.
8946 */
8947 if (mn.mc_pg[ptop] != mc->mc_pg[ptop] &&
8948 mc->mc_ki[ptop] >= NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[ptop])) {
8949 for (i=0; i<=ptop; i++) {
8950 mc->mc_pg[i] = mn.mc_pg[i];
8951 mc->mc_ki[i] = mn.mc_ki[i];
8952 }
8953 }
8954 }
8955 if (nflags & MDB_RESERVE) {
8956 node = NODEPTR(mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top], mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]);
8957 if (!(node->mn_flags & F_BIGDATA))
8958 newdata->mv_data = NODEDATA(node);
8959 }
8960 } else {
8961 if (newindx >= split_indx) {
8962 mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = rp;
8963 mc->mc_ki[ptop]++;
8964 /* Make sure mc_ki is still valid.
8965 */
8966 if (mn.mc_pg[ptop] != mc->mc_pg[ptop] &&
8967 mc->mc_ki[ptop] >= NUMKEYS(mc->mc_pg[ptop])) {
8968 for (i=0; i<=ptop; i++) {
8969 mc->mc_pg[i] = mn.mc_pg[i];
8970 mc->mc_ki[i] = mn.mc_ki[i];
8971 }
8972 }
8973 }
8974 }
8975
8976 {
8977 /* Adjust other cursors pointing to mp */
8978 MDB_cursor *m2, *m3;
8979 MDB_dbi dbi = mc->mc_dbi;
8980 nkeys = NUMKEYS(mp);
8981
8982 for (m2 = mc->mc_txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2=m2->mc_next) {
8983 if (mc->mc_flags & C_SUB)
8984 m3 = &m2->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor;
8985 else
8986 m3 = m2;
8987 if (m3 == mc)
8988 continue;
8989 if (!(m2->mc_flags & m3->mc_flags & C_INITIALIZED))
8990 continue;
8991 if (new_root) {
8992 int k;
8993 /* sub cursors may be on different DB */
8994 if (m3->mc_pg[0] != mp)
8995 continue;
8996 /* root split */
8997 for (k=new_root; k>=0; k--) {
8998 m3->mc_ki[k+1] = m3->mc_ki[k];
8999 m3->mc_pg[k+1] = m3->mc_pg[k];
9000 }
9001 if (m3->mc_ki[0] >= nkeys) {
9002 m3->mc_ki[0] = 1;
9003 } else {
9004 m3->mc_ki[0] = 0;
9005 }
9006 m3->mc_pg[0] = mc->mc_pg[0];
9007 m3->mc_snum++;
9008 m3->mc_top++;
9009 }
9010 if (m3->mc_top >= mc->mc_top && m3->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] == mp) {
9011 if (m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= newindx && !(nflags & MDB_SPLIT_REPLACE))
9012 m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top]++;
9013 if (m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] >= nkeys) {
9014 m3->mc_pg[mc->mc_top] = rp;
9015 m3->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] -= nkeys;
9016 for (i=0; i<mc->mc_top; i++) {
9017 m3->mc_ki[i] = mn.mc_ki[i];
9018 m3->mc_pg[i] = mn.mc_pg[i];
9019 }
9020 }
9021 } else if (!did_split && m3->mc_top >= ptop && m3->mc_pg[ptop] == mc->mc_pg[ptop] &&
9022 m3->mc_ki[ptop] >= mc->mc_ki[ptop]) {
9023 m3->mc_ki[ptop]++;
9024 }
9025 if (IS_LEAF(mp))
9026 XCURSOR_REFRESH(m3, mc->mc_top, m3->mc_pg[mc->mc_top]);
9027 }
9028 }
9029 DPRINTF(("mp left: %d, rp left: %d", SIZELEFT(mp), SIZELEFT(rp)));
9030
9031done:
9032 if (copy) /* tmp page */
9033 mdb_page_free(env, copy);
9034 if (rc)
9035 mc->mc_txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
9036 return rc;
9037}
9038
9039int
9040mdb_put(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi,
9041 MDB_val *key, MDB_val *data, unsigned int flags)
9042{
9043 MDB_cursor mc;
9044 MDB_xcursor mx;
9045 int rc;
9046
9047 if (!key || !data || !TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
9048 return EINVAL;
9049
9050 if (flags & ~(MDB_NOOVERWRITE|MDB_NODUPDATA|MDB_RESERVE|MDB_APPEND|MDB_APPENDDUP))
9051 return EINVAL;
9052
9053 if (txn->mt_flags & (MDB_TXN_RDONLY|MDB_TXN_BLOCKED))
9054 return (txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_RDONLY) ? EACCES : MDB_BAD_TXN;
9055
9056 mdb_cursor_init(&mc, txn, dbi, &mx);
9057 mc.mc_next = txn->mt_cursors[dbi];
9058 txn->mt_cursors[dbi] = &mc;
9059 rc = mdb_cursor_put(&mc, key, data, flags);
9060 txn->mt_cursors[dbi] = mc.mc_next;
9061 return rc;
9062}
9063
9064#ifndef MDB_WBUF
9065#define MDB_WBUF (1024*1024)
9066#endif
9067#define MDB_EOF 0x10
9070typedef struct mdb_copy {
9071 MDB_env *mc_env;
9072 MDB_txn *mc_txn;
9073 pthread_mutex_t mc_mutex;
9074 pthread_cond_t mc_cond;
9075 char *mc_wbuf[2];
9076 char *mc_over[2];
9077 int mc_wlen[2];
9078 int mc_olen[2];
9079 pgno_t mc_next_pgno;
9080 HANDLE mc_fd;
9081 int mc_toggle;
9082 int mc_new;
9086 volatile int mc_error;
9087} mdb_copy;
9088
9090static THREAD_RET ESECT CALL_CONV
9091mdb_env_copythr(void *arg)
9092{
9093 mdb_copy *my = arg;
9094 char *ptr;
9095 int toggle = 0, wsize, rc;
9096#ifdef _WIN32
9097 DWORD len;
9098#define DO_WRITE(rc, fd, ptr, w2, len) rc = WriteFile(fd, ptr, w2, &len, NULL)
9099#else
9100 int len;
9101#define DO_WRITE(rc, fd, ptr, w2, len) len = write(fd, ptr, w2); rc = (len >= 0)
9102#ifdef SIGPIPE
9103 sigset_t set;
9104 sigemptyset(&set);
9105 sigaddset(&set, SIGPIPE);
9106 if ((rc = pthread_sigmask(SIG_BLOCK, &set, NULL)) != 0)
9107 my->mc_error = rc;
9108#endif
9109#endif
9110
9111 pthread_mutex_lock(&my->mc_mutex);
9112 for(;;) {
9113 while (!my->mc_new)
9114 pthread_cond_wait(&my->mc_cond, &my->mc_mutex);
9115 if (my->mc_new == 0 + MDB_EOF) /* 0 buffers, just EOF */
9116 break;
9117 wsize = my->mc_wlen[toggle];
9118 ptr = my->mc_wbuf[toggle];
9119again:
9120 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
9121 while (wsize > 0 && !my->mc_error) {
9122 DO_WRITE(rc, my->mc_fd, ptr, wsize, len);
9123 if (!rc) {
9124 rc = ErrCode();
9125#if defined(SIGPIPE) && !defined(_WIN32)
9126 if (rc == EPIPE) {
9127 /* Collect the pending SIGPIPE, otherwise at least OS X
9128 * gives it to the process on thread-exit (ITS#8504).
9129 */
9130 int tmp;
9131 sigwait(&set, &tmp);
9132 }
9133#endif
9134 break;
9135 } else if (len > 0) {
9136 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
9137 ptr += len;
9138 wsize -= len;
9139 continue;
9140 } else {
9141 rc = EIO;
9142 break;
9143 }
9144 }
9145 if (rc) {
9146 my->mc_error = rc;
9147 }
9148 /* If there's an overflow page tail, write it too */
9149 if (my->mc_olen[toggle]) {
9150 wsize = my->mc_olen[toggle];
9151 ptr = my->mc_over[toggle];
9152 my->mc_olen[toggle] = 0;
9153 goto again;
9154 }
9155 my->mc_wlen[toggle] = 0;
9156 toggle ^= 1;
9157 /* Return the empty buffer to provider */
9158 my->mc_new--;
9159 pthread_cond_signal(&my->mc_cond);
9160 }
9161 pthread_mutex_unlock(&my->mc_mutex);
9162 return (THREAD_RET)0;
9163#undef DO_WRITE
9164}
9165
9171static int ESECT
9172mdb_env_cthr_toggle(mdb_copy *my, int adjust)
9173{
9174 pthread_mutex_lock(&my->mc_mutex);
9175 my->mc_new += adjust;
9176 pthread_cond_signal(&my->mc_cond);
9177 while (my->mc_new & 2) /* both buffers in use */
9178 pthread_cond_wait(&my->mc_cond, &my->mc_mutex);
9179 pthread_mutex_unlock(&my->mc_mutex);
9180
9181 my->mc_toggle ^= (adjust & 1);
9182 /* Both threads reset mc_wlen, to be safe from threading errors */
9183 my->mc_wlen[my->mc_toggle] = 0;
9184 return my->mc_error;
9185}
9186
9192static int ESECT
9193mdb_env_cwalk(mdb_copy *my, pgno_t *pg, int flags)
9194{
9195 MDB_cursor mc = {0};
9196 MDB_node *ni;
9197 MDB_page *mo, *mp, *leaf;
9198 char *buf, *ptr;
9199 int rc, toggle;
9200 unsigned int i;
9201
9202 /* Empty DB, nothing to do */
9203 if (*pg == P_INVALID)
9204 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9205
9206 mc.mc_snum = 1;
9207 mc.mc_txn = my->mc_txn;
9208
9209 rc = mdb_page_get(&mc, *pg, &mc.mc_pg[0], NULL);
9210 if (rc)
9211 return rc;
9212 rc = mdb_page_search_root(&mc, NULL, MDB_PS_FIRST);
9213 if (rc)
9214 return rc;
9215
9216 /* Make cursor pages writable */
9217 buf = ptr = malloc(my->mc_env->me_psize * mc.mc_snum);
9218 if (buf == NULL)
9219 return ENOMEM;
9220
9221 for (i=0; i<mc.mc_top; i++) {
9222 mdb_page_copy((MDB_page *)ptr, mc.mc_pg[i], my->mc_env->me_psize);
9223 mc.mc_pg[i] = (MDB_page *)ptr;
9224 ptr += my->mc_env->me_psize;
9225 }
9226
9227 /* This is writable space for a leaf page. Usually not needed. */
9228 leaf = (MDB_page *)ptr;
9229
9230 toggle = my->mc_toggle;
9231 while (mc.mc_snum > 0) {
9232 unsigned n;
9233 mp = mc.mc_pg[mc.mc_top];
9234 n = NUMKEYS(mp);
9235
9236 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
9237 if (!IS_LEAF2(mp) && !(flags & F_DUPDATA)) {
9238 for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
9239 ni = NODEPTR(mp, i);
9240 if (ni->mn_flags & F_BIGDATA) {
9241 MDB_page *omp;
9242 pgno_t pg;
9243
9244 /* Need writable leaf */
9245 if (mp != leaf) {
9246 mc.mc_pg[mc.mc_top] = leaf;
9247 mdb_page_copy(leaf, mp, my->mc_env->me_psize);
9248 mp = leaf;
9249 ni = NODEPTR(mp, i);
9250 }
9251
9252 memcpy(&pg, NODEDATA(ni), sizeof(pg));
9253 memcpy(NODEDATA(ni), &my->mc_next_pgno, sizeof(pgno_t));
9254 rc = mdb_page_get(&mc, pg, &omp, NULL);
9255 if (rc)
9256 goto done;
9257 if (my->mc_wlen[toggle] >= MDB_WBUF) {
9258 rc = mdb_env_cthr_toggle(my, 1);
9259 if (rc)
9260 goto done;
9261 toggle = my->mc_toggle;
9262 }
9263 mo = (MDB_page *)(my->mc_wbuf[toggle] + my->mc_wlen[toggle]);
9264 memcpy(mo, omp, my->mc_env->me_psize);
9265 mo->mp_pgno = my->mc_next_pgno;
9266 my->mc_next_pgno += omp->mp_pages;
9267 my->mc_wlen[toggle] += my->mc_env->me_psize;
9268 if (omp->mp_pages > 1) {
9269 my->mc_olen[toggle] = my->mc_env->me_psize * (omp->mp_pages - 1);
9270 my->mc_over[toggle] = (char *)omp + my->mc_env->me_psize;
9271 rc = mdb_env_cthr_toggle(my, 1);
9272 if (rc)
9273 goto done;
9274 toggle = my->mc_toggle;
9275 }
9276 } else if (ni->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA) {
9277 MDB_db db;
9278
9279 /* Need writable leaf */
9280 if (mp != leaf) {
9281 mc.mc_pg[mc.mc_top] = leaf;
9282 mdb_page_copy(leaf, mp, my->mc_env->me_psize);
9283 mp = leaf;
9284 ni = NODEPTR(mp, i);
9285 }
9286
9287 memcpy(&db, NODEDATA(ni), sizeof(db));
9288 my->mc_toggle = toggle;
9289 rc = mdb_env_cwalk(my, &db.md_root, ni->mn_flags & F_DUPDATA);
9290 if (rc)
9291 goto done;
9292 toggle = my->mc_toggle;
9293 memcpy(NODEDATA(ni), &db, sizeof(db));
9294 }
9295 }
9296 }
9297 } else {
9298 mc.mc_ki[mc.mc_top]++;
9299 if (mc.mc_ki[mc.mc_top] < n) {
9300 pgno_t pg;
9301again:
9302 ni = NODEPTR(mp, mc.mc_ki[mc.mc_top]);
9303 pg = NODEPGNO(ni);
9304 rc = mdb_page_get(&mc, pg, &mp, NULL);
9305 if (rc)
9306 goto done;
9307 mc.mc_top++;
9308 mc.mc_snum++;
9309 mc.mc_ki[mc.mc_top] = 0;
9310 if (IS_BRANCH(mp)) {
9311 /* Whenever we advance to a sibling branch page,
9312 * we must proceed all the way down to its first leaf.
9313 */
9314 mdb_page_copy(mc.mc_pg[mc.mc_top], mp, my->mc_env->me_psize);
9315 goto again;
9316 } else
9317 mc.mc_pg[mc.mc_top] = mp;
9318 continue;
9319 }
9320 }
9321 if (my->mc_wlen[toggle] >= MDB_WBUF) {
9322 rc = mdb_env_cthr_toggle(my, 1);
9323 if (rc)
9324 goto done;
9325 toggle = my->mc_toggle;
9326 }
9327 mo = (MDB_page *)(my->mc_wbuf[toggle] + my->mc_wlen[toggle]);
9328 mdb_page_copy(mo, mp, my->mc_env->me_psize);
9329 mo->mp_pgno = my->mc_next_pgno++;
9330 my->mc_wlen[toggle] += my->mc_env->me_psize;
9331 if (mc.mc_top) {
9332 /* Update parent if there is one */
9333 ni = NODEPTR(mc.mc_pg[mc.mc_top-1], mc.mc_ki[mc.mc_top-1]);
9334 SETPGNO(ni, mo->mp_pgno);
9335 mdb_cursor_pop(&mc);
9336 } else {
9337 /* Otherwise we're done */
9338 *pg = mo->mp_pgno;
9339 break;
9340 }
9341 }
9342done:
9343 free(buf);
9344 return rc;
9345}
9346
9348static int ESECT
9349mdb_env_copyfd1(MDB_env *env, HANDLE fd)
9350{
9351 MDB_meta *mm;
9352 MDB_page *mp;
9353 mdb_copy my = {0};
9354 MDB_txn *txn = NULL;
9355 pthread_t thr;
9356 pgno_t root, new_root;
9357 int rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
9358
9359#ifdef _WIN32
9360 if (!(my.mc_mutex = CreateMutex(NULL, FALSE, NULL)) ||
9361 !(my.mc_cond = CreateEvent(NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL))) {
9362 rc = ErrCode();
9363 goto done;
9364 }
9365 my.mc_wbuf[0] = _aligned_malloc(MDB_WBUF*2, env->me_os_psize);
9366 if (my.mc_wbuf[0] == NULL) {
9367 /* _aligned_malloc() sets errno, but we use Windows error codes */
9368 rc = ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY;
9369 goto done;
9370 }
9371#else
9372 if ((rc = pthread_mutex_init(&my.mc_mutex, NULL)) != 0)
9373 return rc;
9374 if ((rc = pthread_cond_init(&my.mc_cond, NULL)) != 0)
9375 goto done2;
9376#ifdef HAVE_MEMALIGN
9377 my.mc_wbuf[0] = memalign(env->me_os_psize, MDB_WBUF*2);
9378 if (my.mc_wbuf[0] == NULL) {
9379 rc = errno;
9380 goto done;
9381 }
9382#else
9383 {
9384 void *p;
9385 if ((rc = posix_memalign(&p, env->me_os_psize, MDB_WBUF*2)) != 0)
9386 goto done;
9387 my.mc_wbuf[0] = p;
9388 }
9389#endif
9390#endif
9391 memset(my.mc_wbuf[0], 0, MDB_WBUF*2);
9392 my.mc_wbuf[1] = my.mc_wbuf[0] + MDB_WBUF;
9393 my.mc_next_pgno = NUM_METAS;
9394 my.mc_env = env;
9395 my.mc_fd = fd;
9396 rc = THREAD_CREATE(thr, mdb_env_copythr, &my);
9397 if (rc)
9398 goto done;
9399
9400 rc = mdb_txn_begin(env, NULL, MDB_RDONLY, &txn);
9401 if (rc)
9402 goto finish;
9403
9404 mp = (MDB_page *)my.mc_wbuf[0];
9405 memset(mp, 0, NUM_METAS * env->me_psize);
9406 mp->mp_pgno = 0;
9407 mp->mp_flags = P_META;
9408 mm = (MDB_meta *)METADATA(mp);
9409 mdb_env_init_meta0(env, mm);
9410 mm->mm_address = env->me_metas[0]->mm_address;
9411
9412 mp = (MDB_page *)(my.mc_wbuf[0] + env->me_psize);
9413 mp->mp_pgno = 1;
9414 mp->mp_flags = P_META;
9415 *(MDB_meta *)METADATA(mp) = *mm;
9416 mm = (MDB_meta *)METADATA(mp);
9417
9418 /* Set metapage 1 with current main DB */
9419 root = new_root = txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_root;
9420 if (root != P_INVALID) {
9421 /* Count free pages + freeDB pages. Subtract from last_pg
9422 * to find the new last_pg, which also becomes the new root.
9423 */
9424 MDB_ID freecount = 0;
9425 MDB_cursor mc;
9426 MDB_val key, data;
9427 mdb_cursor_init(&mc, txn, FREE_DBI, NULL);
