9428 while ((rc = mdb_cursor_get(&mc, &key, &data, MDB_NEXT)) == 0)
9429 freecount += *(MDB_ID *)data.mv_data;
9430 if (rc != MDB_NOTFOUND)
9431 goto finish;
9432 freecount += txn->mt_dbs[FREE_DBI].md_branch_pages +
9433 txn->mt_dbs[FREE_DBI].md_leaf_pages +
9434 txn->mt_dbs[FREE_DBI].md_overflow_pages;
9435
9436 new_root = txn->mt_next_pgno - 1 - freecount;
9437 mm->mm_last_pg = new_root;
9438 mm->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI] = txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI];
9439 mm->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_root = new_root;
9440 } else {
9441 /* When the DB is empty, handle it specially to
9442 * fix any breakage like page leaks from ITS#8174.
9443 */
9444 mm->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_flags = txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_flags;
9445 }
9446 if (root != P_INVALID || mm->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_flags) {
9447 mm->mm_txnid = 1; /* use metapage 1 */
9448 }
9449
9450 my.mc_wlen[0] = env->me_psize * NUM_METAS;
9451 my.mc_txn = txn;
9452 rc = mdb_env_cwalk(&my, &root, 0);
9453 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS && root != new_root) {
9454 rc = MDB_INCOMPATIBLE; /* page leak or corrupt DB */
9455 }
9456
9457finish:
9458 if (rc)
9459 my.mc_error = rc;
9460 mdb_env_cthr_toggle(&my, 1 | MDB_EOF);
9461 rc = THREAD_FINISH(thr);
9462 mdb_txn_abort(txn);
9463
9464done:
9465#ifdef _WIN32
9466 if (my.mc_wbuf[0]) _aligned_free(my.mc_wbuf[0]);
9467 if (my.mc_cond) CloseHandle(my.mc_cond);
9468 if (my.mc_mutex) CloseHandle(my.mc_mutex);
9469#else
9470 free(my.mc_wbuf[0]);
9471 pthread_cond_destroy(&my.mc_cond);
9472done2:
9473 pthread_mutex_destroy(&my.mc_mutex);
9474#endif
9475 return rc ? rc : my.mc_error;
9476}
9477
9479static int ESECT
9480mdb_env_copyfd0(MDB_env *env, HANDLE fd)
9481{
9482 MDB_txn *txn = NULL;
9483 mdb_mutexref_t wmutex = NULL;
9484 int rc;
9485 size_t wsize, w3;
9486 char *ptr;
9487#ifdef _WIN32
9488 DWORD len, w2;
9489#define DO_WRITE(rc, fd, ptr, w2, len) rc = WriteFile(fd, ptr, w2, &len, NULL)
9490#else
9491 ssize_t len;
9492 size_t w2;
9493#define DO_WRITE(rc, fd, ptr, w2, len) len = write(fd, ptr, w2); rc = (len >= 0)
9494#endif
9495
9496 /* Do the lock/unlock of the reader mutex before starting the
9497 * write txn. Otherwise other read txns could block writers.
9498 */
9499 rc = mdb_txn_begin(env, NULL, MDB_RDONLY, &txn);
9500 if (rc)
9501 return rc;
9502
9503 if (env->me_txns) {
9504 /* We must start the actual read txn after blocking writers */
9505 mdb_txn_end(txn, MDB_END_RESET_TMP);
9506
9507 /* Temporarily block writers until we snapshot the meta pages */
9508 wmutex = env->me_wmutex;
9509 if (LOCK_MUTEX(rc, env, wmutex))
9510 goto leave;
9511
9512 rc = mdb_txn_renew0(txn);
9513 if (rc) {
9514 UNLOCK_MUTEX(wmutex);
9515 goto leave;
9516 }
9517 }
9518
9519 wsize = env->me_psize * NUM_METAS;
9520 ptr = env->me_map;
9521 w2 = wsize;
9522 while (w2 > 0) {
9523 DO_WRITE(rc, fd, ptr, w2, len);
9524 if (!rc) {
9525 rc = ErrCode();
9526 break;
9527 } else if (len > 0) {
9528 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
9529 ptr += len;
9530 w2 -= len;
9531 continue;
9532 } else {
9533 /* Non-blocking or async handles are not supported */
9534 rc = EIO;
9535 break;
9536 }
9537 }
9538 if (wmutex)
9539 UNLOCK_MUTEX(wmutex);
9540
9541 if (rc)
9542 goto leave;
9543
9544 w3 = txn->mt_next_pgno * env->me_psize;
9545 {
9546 size_t fsize = 0;
9547 if ((rc = mdb_fsize(env->me_fd, &fsize)))
9548 goto leave;
9549 if (w3 > fsize)
9550 w3 = fsize;
9551 }
9552 wsize = w3 - wsize;
9553 while (wsize > 0) {
9554 if (wsize > MAX_WRITE)
9555 w2 = MAX_WRITE;
9556 else
9557 w2 = wsize;
9558 DO_WRITE(rc, fd, ptr, w2, len);
9559 if (!rc) {
9560 rc = ErrCode();
9561 break;
9562 } else if (len > 0) {
9563 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
9564 ptr += len;
9565 wsize -= len;
9566 continue;
9567 } else {
9568 rc = EIO;
9569 break;
9570 }
9571 }
9572
9573leave:
9574 mdb_txn_abort(txn);
9575 return rc;
9576}
9577
9578int ESECT
9579mdb_env_copyfd2(MDB_env *env, HANDLE fd, unsigned int flags)
9580{
9581 if (flags & MDB_CP_COMPACT)
9582 return mdb_env_copyfd1(env, fd);
9583 else
9584 return mdb_env_copyfd0(env, fd);
9585}
9586
9587int ESECT
9588mdb_env_copyfd(MDB_env *env, HANDLE fd)
9589{
9590 return mdb_env_copyfd2(env, fd, 0);
9591}
9592
9593int ESECT
9594mdb_env_copy2(MDB_env *env, const char *path, unsigned int flags)
9595{
9596 int rc;
9597 MDB_name fname;
9598 HANDLE newfd = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
9599
9600 rc = mdb_fname_init(path, env->me_flags | MDB_NOLOCK, &fname);
9601 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
9602 rc = mdb_fopen(env, &fname, MDB_O_COPY, 0666, &newfd);
9603 mdb_fname_destroy(fname);
9604 }
9605 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
9606 rc = mdb_env_copyfd2(env, newfd, flags);
9607 if (close(newfd) < 0 && rc == MDB_SUCCESS)
9608 rc = ErrCode();
9609 }
9610 return rc;
9611}
9612
9613int ESECT
9614mdb_env_copy(MDB_env *env, const char *path)
9615{
9616 return mdb_env_copy2(env, path, 0);
9617}
9618
9619int ESECT
9620mdb_env_set_flags(MDB_env *env, unsigned int flag, int onoff)
9621{
9622 if (flag & ~CHANGEABLE)
9623 return EINVAL;
9624 if (onoff)
9625 env->me_flags |= flag;
9626 else
9627 env->me_flags &= ~flag;
9628 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9629}
9630
9631int ESECT
9632mdb_env_get_flags(MDB_env *env, unsigned int *arg)
9633{
9634 if (!env || !arg)
9635 return EINVAL;
9636
9637 *arg = env->me_flags & (CHANGEABLE|CHANGELESS);
9638 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9639}
9640
9641int ESECT
9642mdb_env_set_userctx(MDB_env *env, void *ctx)
9643{
9644 if (!env)
9645 return EINVAL;
9646 env->me_userctx = ctx;
9647 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9648}
9649
9650void * ESECT
9651mdb_env_get_userctx(MDB_env *env)
9652{
9653 return env ? env->me_userctx : NULL;
9654}
9655
9656int ESECT
9657mdb_env_set_assert(MDB_env *env, MDB_assert_func *func)
9658{
9659 if (!env)
9660 return EINVAL;
9661#ifndef NDEBUG
9662 env->me_assert_func = func;
9663#endif
9664 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9665}
9666
9667int ESECT
9668mdb_env_get_path(MDB_env *env, const char **arg)
9669{
9670 if (!env || !arg)
9671 return EINVAL;
9672
9673 *arg = env->me_path;
9674 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9675}
9676
9677int ESECT
9678mdb_env_get_fd(MDB_env *env, mdb_filehandle_t *arg)
9679{
9680 if (!env || !arg)
9681 return EINVAL;
9682
9683 *arg = env->me_fd;
9684 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9685}
9686
9693static int ESECT
9694mdb_stat0(MDB_env *env, MDB_db *db, MDB_stat *arg)
9695{
9696 arg->ms_psize = env->me_psize;
9697 arg->ms_depth = db->md_depth;
9698 arg->ms_branch_pages = db->md_branch_pages;
9699 arg->ms_leaf_pages = db->md_leaf_pages;
9700 arg->ms_overflow_pages = db->md_overflow_pages;
9701 arg->ms_entries = db->md_entries;
9702
9703 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9704}
9705
9706int ESECT
9707mdb_env_stat(MDB_env *env, MDB_stat *arg)
9708{
9709 MDB_meta *meta;
9710
9711 if (env == NULL || arg == NULL)
9712 return EINVAL;
9713
9714 meta = mdb_env_pick_meta(env);
9715
9716 return mdb_stat0(env, &meta->mm_dbs[MAIN_DBI], arg);
9717}
9718
9719int ESECT
9720mdb_env_info(MDB_env *env, MDB_envinfo *arg)
9721{
9722 MDB_meta *meta;
9723
9724 if (env == NULL || arg == NULL)
9725 return EINVAL;
9726
9727 meta = mdb_env_pick_meta(env);
9728 arg->me_mapaddr = meta->mm_address;
9729 arg->me_last_pgno = meta->mm_last_pg;
9730 arg->me_last_txnid = meta->mm_txnid;
9731
9732 arg->me_mapsize = env->me_mapsize;
9733 arg->me_maxreaders = env->me_maxreaders;
9734 arg->me_numreaders = env->me_txns ? env->me_txns->mti_numreaders : 0;
9735 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9736}
9737
9745static void
9746mdb_default_cmp(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi)
9747{
9748 uint16_t f = txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_flags;
9749
9750 txn->mt_dbxs[dbi].md_cmp =
9751 (f & MDB_REVERSEKEY) ? mdb_cmp_memnr :
9752 (f & MDB_INTEGERKEY) ? mdb_cmp_cint : mdb_cmp_memn;
9753
9754 txn->mt_dbxs[dbi].md_dcmp =
9755 !(f & MDB_DUPSORT) ? 0 :
9756 ((f & MDB_INTEGERDUP)
9757 ? ((f & MDB_DUPFIXED) ? mdb_cmp_int : mdb_cmp_cint)
9758 : ((f & MDB_REVERSEDUP) ? mdb_cmp_memnr : mdb_cmp_memn));
9759}
9760
9761int mdb_dbi_open(MDB_txn *txn, const char *name, unsigned int flags, MDB_dbi *dbi)
9762{
9763 MDB_val key, data;
9764 MDB_dbi i;
9765 MDB_cursor mc;
9766 MDB_db dummy;
9767 int rc, dbflag, exact;
9768 unsigned int unused = 0, seq;
9769 char *namedup;
9770 size_t len;
9771
9772 if (flags & ~VALID_FLAGS)
9773 return EINVAL;
9774 if (txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED)
9775 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
9776
9777 /* main DB? */
9778 if (!name) {
9779 *dbi = MAIN_DBI;
9780 if (flags & PERSISTENT_FLAGS) {
9781 uint16_t f2 = flags & PERSISTENT_FLAGS;
9782 /* make sure flag changes get committed */
9783 if ((txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_flags | f2) != txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_flags) {
9784 txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_flags |= f2;
9785 txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_DIRTY;
9786 }
9787 }
9788 mdb_default_cmp(txn, MAIN_DBI);
9789 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9790 }
9791
9792 if (txn->mt_dbxs[MAIN_DBI].md_cmp == NULL) {
9793 mdb_default_cmp(txn, MAIN_DBI);
9794 }
9795
9796 /* Is the DB already open? */
9797 len = strlen(name);
9798 for (i=CORE_DBS; i<txn->mt_numdbs; i++) {
9799 if (!txn->mt_dbxs[i].md_name.mv_size) {
9800 /* Remember this free slot */
9801 if (!unused) unused = i;
9802 continue;
9803 }
9804 if (len == txn->mt_dbxs[i].md_name.mv_size &&
9805 !strncmp(name, txn->mt_dbxs[i].md_name.mv_data, len)) {
9806 *dbi = i;
9807 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9808 }
9809 }
9810
9811 /* If no free slot and max hit, fail */
9812 if (!unused && txn->mt_numdbs >= txn->mt_env->me_maxdbs)
9813 return MDB_DBS_FULL;
9814
9815 /* Cannot mix named databases with some mainDB flags */
9816 if (txn->mt_dbs[MAIN_DBI].md_flags & (MDB_DUPSORT|MDB_INTEGERKEY))
9817 return (flags & MDB_CREATE) ? MDB_INCOMPATIBLE : MDB_NOTFOUND;
9818
9819 /* Find the DB info */
9820 dbflag = DB_NEW|DB_VALID|DB_USRVALID;
9821 exact = 0;
9822 key.mv_size = len;
9823 key.mv_data = (void *)name;
9824 mdb_cursor_init(&mc, txn, MAIN_DBI, NULL);
9825 rc = mdb_cursor_set(&mc, &key, &data, MDB_SET, &exact);
9826 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
9827 /* make sure this is actually a DB */
9828 MDB_node *node = NODEPTR(mc.mc_pg[mc.mc_top], mc.mc_ki[mc.mc_top]);
9829 if ((node->mn_flags & (F_DUPDATA|F_SUBDATA)) != F_SUBDATA)
9830 return MDB_INCOMPATIBLE;
9831 } else {
9832 if (rc != MDB_NOTFOUND || !(flags & MDB_CREATE))
9833 return rc;
9834 if (F_ISSET(txn->mt_flags, MDB_TXN_RDONLY))
9835 return EACCES;
9836 }
9837
9838 /* Done here so we cannot fail after creating a new DB */
9839#ifdef _MSC_VER
9840 if ((namedup = _strdup(name)) == NULL)
9841#else //GNU
9842 if ((namedup = strdup(name)) == NULL)
9843#endif
9844 return ENOMEM;
9845
9846 if (rc) {
9847 /* MDB_NOTFOUND and MDB_CREATE: Create new DB */
9848 data.mv_size = sizeof(MDB_db);
9849 data.mv_data = &dummy;
9850 memset(&dummy, 0, sizeof(dummy));
9851 dummy.md_root = P_INVALID;
9852 dummy.md_flags = flags & PERSISTENT_FLAGS;
9853 WITH_CURSOR_TRACKING(mc,
9854 rc = mdb_cursor_put(&mc, &key, &data, F_SUBDATA));
9855 dbflag |= DB_DIRTY;
9856 }
9857
9858 if (rc) {
9859 free(namedup);
9860 } else {
9861 /* Got info, register DBI in this txn */
9862 unsigned int slot = unused ? unused : txn->mt_numdbs;
9863 txn->mt_dbxs[slot].md_name.mv_data = namedup;
9864 txn->mt_dbxs[slot].md_name.mv_size = len;
9865 txn->mt_dbxs[slot].md_rel = NULL;
9866 txn->mt_dbflags[slot] = dbflag;
9867 /* txn-> and env-> are the same in read txns, use
9868 * tmp variable to avoid undefined assignment
9869 */
9870 seq = ++txn->mt_env->me_dbiseqs[slot];
9871 txn->mt_dbiseqs[slot] = seq;
9872
9873 memcpy(&txn->mt_dbs[slot], data.mv_data, sizeof(MDB_db));
9874 *dbi = slot;
9875 mdb_default_cmp(txn, slot);
9876 if (!unused) {
9877 txn->mt_numdbs++;
9878 }
9879 }
9880
9881 return rc;
9882}
9883
9884int ESECT
9885mdb_stat(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, MDB_stat *arg)
9886{
9887 if (!arg || !TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_VALID))
9888 return EINVAL;
9889
9890 if (txn->mt_flags & MDB_TXN_BLOCKED)
9891 return MDB_BAD_TXN;
9892
9893 if (txn->mt_dbflags[dbi] & DB_STALE) {
9894 MDB_cursor mc;
9895 MDB_xcursor mx;
9896 /* Stale, must read the DB's root. cursor_init does it for us. */
9897 mdb_cursor_init(&mc, txn, dbi, &mx);
9898 }
9899 return mdb_stat0(txn->mt_env, &txn->mt_dbs[dbi], arg);
9900}
9901
9902void mdb_dbi_close(MDB_env *env, MDB_dbi dbi)
9903{
9904 char *ptr;
9905 if (dbi < CORE_DBS || dbi >= env->me_maxdbs)
9906 return;
9907 ptr = env->me_dbxs[dbi].md_name.mv_data;
9908 /* If there was no name, this was already closed */
9909 if (ptr) {
9910 env->me_dbxs[dbi].md_name.mv_data = NULL;
9911 env->me_dbxs[dbi].md_name.mv_size = 0;
9912 env->me_dbflags[dbi] = 0;
9913 env->me_dbiseqs[dbi]++;
9914 free(ptr);
9915 }
9916}
9917
9918int mdb_dbi_flags(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, unsigned int *flags)
9919{
9920 /* We could return the flags for the FREE_DBI too but what's the point? */
9921 if (!TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
9922 return EINVAL;
9923 *flags = txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_flags & PERSISTENT_FLAGS;
9924 return MDB_SUCCESS;
9925}
9926
9932static int
9933mdb_drop0(MDB_cursor *mc, int subs)
9934{
9935 int rc;
9936
9937 rc = mdb_page_search(mc, NULL, MDB_PS_FIRST);
9938 if (rc == MDB_SUCCESS) {
9939 MDB_txn *txn = mc->mc_txn;
9940 MDB_node *ni;
9941 MDB_cursor mx;
9942 unsigned int i;
9943
9944 /* DUPSORT sub-DBs have no ovpages/DBs. Omit scanning leaves.
9945 * This also avoids any P_LEAF2 pages, which have no nodes.
9946 * Also if the DB doesn't have sub-DBs and has no overflow
9947 * pages, omit scanning leaves.
9948 */
9949 if ((mc->mc_flags & C_SUB) ||
9950 (!subs && !mc->mc_db->md_overflow_pages))
9951 mdb_cursor_pop(mc);
9952
9953 mdb_cursor_copy(mc, &mx);
9954 while (mc->mc_snum > 0) {
9955 MDB_page *mp = mc->mc_pg[mc->mc_top];
9956 unsigned n = NUMKEYS(mp);
9957 if (IS_LEAF(mp)) {
9958 for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
9959 ni = NODEPTR(mp, i);
9960 if (ni->mn_flags & F_BIGDATA) {
9961 MDB_page *omp;
9962 pgno_t pg;
9963 memcpy(&pg, NODEDATA(ni), sizeof(pg));
9964 rc = mdb_page_get(mc, pg, &omp, NULL);
9965 if (rc != 0)
9966 goto done;
9967 mdb_cassert(mc, IS_OVERFLOW(omp));
9968 rc = mdb_midl_append_range(&txn->mt_free_pgs,
9969 pg, omp->mp_pages);
9970 if (rc)
9971 goto done;
9972 mc->mc_db->md_overflow_pages -= omp->mp_pages;
9973 if (!mc->mc_db->md_overflow_pages && !subs)
9974 break;
9975 } else if (subs && (ni->mn_flags & F_SUBDATA)) {
9976 mdb_xcursor_init1(mc, ni);
9977 rc = mdb_drop0(&mc->mc_xcursor->mx_cursor, 0);
9978 if (rc)
9979 goto done;
9980 }
9981 }
9982 if (!subs && !mc->mc_db->md_overflow_pages)
9983 goto pop;
9984 } else {
9985 if ((rc = mdb_midl_need(&txn->mt_free_pgs, n)) != 0)
9986 goto done;
9987 for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
9988 pgno_t pg;
9989 ni = NODEPTR(mp, i);
9990 pg = NODEPGNO(ni);
9991 /* free it */
9992 mdb_midl_xappend(txn->mt_free_pgs, pg);
9993 }
9994 }
9995 if (!mc->mc_top)
9996 break;
9997 mc->mc_ki[mc->mc_top] = i;
9998 rc = mdb_cursor_sibling(mc, 1);
9999 if (rc) {
10000 if (rc != MDB_NOTFOUND)
10001 goto done;
10002 /* no more siblings, go back to beginning
10003 * of previous level.
10004 */
10005pop:
10006 mdb_cursor_pop(mc);
10007 mc->mc_ki[0] = 0;
10008 for (i=1; i<mc->mc_snum; i++) {
10009 mc->mc_ki[i] = 0;
10010 mc->mc_pg[i] = mx.mc_pg[i];
10011 }
10012 }
10013 }
10014 /* free it */
10015 rc = mdb_midl_append(&txn->mt_free_pgs, mc->mc_db->md_root);
10016done:
10017 if (rc)
10018 txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
10019 } else if (rc == MDB_NOTFOUND) {
10020 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
10021 }
10022 mc->mc_flags &= ~C_INITIALIZED;
10023 return rc;
10024}
10025
10026int mdb_drop(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, int del)
10027{
10028 MDB_cursor *mc, *m2;
10029 int rc;
10030
10031 if ((unsigned)del > 1 || !TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
10032 return EINVAL;
10033
10034 if (F_ISSET(txn->mt_flags, MDB_TXN_RDONLY))
10035 return EACCES;
10036
10037 if (TXN_DBI_CHANGED(txn, dbi))
10038 return MDB_BAD_DBI;
10039
10040 rc = mdb_cursor_open(txn, dbi, &mc);
10041 if (rc)
10042 return rc;
10043
10044 rc = mdb_drop0(mc, mc->mc_db->md_flags & MDB_DUPSORT);
10045 /* Invalidate the dropped DB's cursors */
10046 for (m2 = txn->mt_cursors[dbi]; m2; m2 = m2->mc_next)
10047 m2->mc_flags &= ~(C_INITIALIZED|C_EOF);
10048 if (rc)
10049 goto leave;
10050
10051 /* Can't delete the main DB */
10052 if (del && dbi >= CORE_DBS) {
10053 rc = mdb_del0(txn, MAIN_DBI, &mc->mc_dbx->md_name, NULL, F_SUBDATA);
10054 if (!rc) {
10055 txn->mt_dbflags[dbi] = DB_STALE;
10056 mdb_dbi_close(txn->mt_env, dbi);
10057 } else {
10058 txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_ERROR;
10059 }
10060 } else {
10061 /* reset the DB record, mark it dirty */
10062 txn->mt_dbflags[dbi] |= DB_DIRTY;
10063 txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_depth = 0;
10064 txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_branch_pages = 0;
10065 txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_leaf_pages = 0;
10066 txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_overflow_pages = 0;
10067 txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_entries = 0;
10068 txn->mt_dbs[dbi].md_root = P_INVALID;
10069
10070 txn->mt_flags |= MDB_TXN_DIRTY;
10071 }
10072leave:
10073 mdb_cursor_close(mc);
10074 return rc;
10075}
10076
10077int mdb_set_compare(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, MDB_cmp_func *cmp)
10078{
10079 if (!TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
10080 return EINVAL;
10081
10082 txn->mt_dbxs[dbi].md_cmp = cmp;
10083 return MDB_SUCCESS;
10084}
10085
10086int mdb_set_dupsort(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, MDB_cmp_func *cmp)
10087{
10088 if (!TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
10089 return EINVAL;
10090
10091 txn->mt_dbxs[dbi].md_dcmp = cmp;
10092 return MDB_SUCCESS;
10093}
10094
10095int mdb_set_relfunc(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, MDB_rel_func *rel)
10096{
10097 if (!TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
10098 return EINVAL;
10099
10100 txn->mt_dbxs[dbi].md_rel = rel;
10101 return MDB_SUCCESS;
10102}
10103
10104int mdb_set_relctx(MDB_txn *txn, MDB_dbi dbi, void *ctx)
10105{
10106 if (!TXN_DBI_EXIST(txn, dbi, DB_USRVALID))
10107 return EINVAL;
10108
10109 txn->mt_dbxs[dbi].md_relctx = ctx;
10110 return MDB_SUCCESS;
10111}
10112
10113int ESECT
10114mdb_env_get_maxkeysize(MDB_env *env)
10115{
10116 return ENV_MAXKEY(env);
10117}
10118
10119int ESECT
10120mdb_reader_list(MDB_env *env, MDB_msg_func *func, void *ctx)
10121{
10122 unsigned int i, rdrs;
10123 MDB_reader *mr;
10124 char buf[64];
10125 int rc = 0, first = 1;
10126
10127 if (!env || !func)
10128 return -1;
10129 if (!env->me_txns) {
10130 return func("(no reader locks)\n", ctx);
10131 }
10132 rdrs = env->me_txns->mti_numreaders;
10133 mr = env->me_txns->mti_readers;
10134 for (i=0; i<rdrs; i++) {
10135 if (mr[i].mr_pid) {
10136 txnid_t txnid = mr[i].mr_txnid;
10137 sprintf(buf, txnid == (txnid_t)-1 ?
10138 "%10d %"Z"x -\n" : "%10d %"Z"x %"Z"u\n",
10139 (int)mr[i].mr_pid, (size_t)mr[i].mr_tid, txnid);
10140 if (first) {
10141 first = 0;
10142 rc = func(" pid thread txnid\n", ctx);
10143 if (rc < 0)
10144 break;
10145 }
10146 rc = func(buf, ctx);
10147 if (rc < 0)
10148 break;
10149 }
10150 }
10151 if (first) {
10152 rc = func("(no active readers)\n", ctx);
10153 }
10154 return rc;
10155}
10156
10160static int ESECT
10161mdb_pid_insert(MDB_PID_T *ids, MDB_PID_T pid)
10162{
10163 /* binary search of pid in list */
10164 unsigned base = 0;
10165 unsigned cursor = 1;
10166 int val = 0;
10167 unsigned n = ids[0];
10168
10169 while( 0 < n ) {
10170 unsigned pivot = n >> 1;
10171 cursor = base + pivot + 1;
10172 val = pid - ids[cursor];
10173
10174 if( val < 0 ) {
10175 n = pivot;
10176
10177 } else if ( val > 0 ) {
10178 base = cursor;
10179 n -= pivot + 1;
10180
10181 } else {
10182 /* found, so it's a duplicate */
10183 return -1;
10184 }
10185 }
10186
10187 if( val > 0 ) {
10188 ++cursor;
10189 }
10190 ids[0]++;
10191 for (n = ids[0]; n > cursor; n--)
10192 ids[n] = ids[n-1];
10193 ids[n] = pid;
10194 return 0;
10195}
10196
10197int ESECT
10198mdb_reader_check(MDB_env *env, int *dead)
10199{
10200 if (!env)
10201 return EINVAL;
10202 if (dead)
10203 *dead = 0;
10204 return env->me_txns ? mdb_reader_check0(env, 0, dead) : MDB_SUCCESS;
10205}
10206
10208static int ESECT
10209mdb_reader_check0(MDB_env *env, int rlocked, int *dead)
10210{
10211 mdb_mutexref_t rmutex = rlocked ? NULL : env->me_rmutex;
10212 unsigned int i, j, rdrs;
10213 MDB_reader *mr;
10214 MDB_PID_T *pids, pid;
10215 int rc = MDB_SUCCESS, count = 0;
10216
10217 rdrs = env->me_txns->mti_numreaders;
10218 pids = malloc((rdrs+1) * sizeof(MDB_PID_T));
10219 if (!pids)
10220 return ENOMEM;
10221 pids[0] = 0;
10222 mr = env->me_txns->mti_readers;
10223 for (i=0; i<rdrs; i++) {
10224 pid = mr[i].mr_pid;
10225 if (pid && pid != env->me_pid) {
10226 if (mdb_pid_insert(pids, pid) == 0) {
10227 if (!mdb_reader_pid(env, Pidcheck, pid)) {
10228 /* Stale reader found */
10229 j = i;
10230 if (rmutex) {
10231 if ((rc = LOCK_MUTEX0(rmutex)) != 0) {
10232 if ((rc = mdb_mutex_failed(env, rmutex, rc)))
10233 break;
10234 rdrs = 0; /* the above checked all readers */
10235 } else {
10236 /* Recheck, a new process may have reused pid */
10237 if (mdb_reader_pid(env, Pidcheck, pid))
10238 j = rdrs;
10239 }
10240 }
10241 for (; j<rdrs; j++)
10242 if (mr[j].mr_pid == pid) {
10243 DPRINTF(("clear stale reader pid %u txn %"Z"d",
10244 (unsigned) pid, mr[j].mr_txnid));
10245 mr[j].mr_pid = 0;
10246 count++;
10247 }
10248 if (rmutex)
10249 UNLOCK_MUTEX(rmutex);
10250 }
10251 }
10252 }
10253 }
10254 free(pids);
10255 if (dead)
10256 *dead = count;
10257 return rc;
10258}
10259
10260#ifdef MDB_ROBUST_SUPPORTED
10268static int ESECT
10269mdb_mutex_failed(MDB_env *env, mdb_mutexref_t mutex, int rc)
10270{
10271 int rlocked, rc2;
10272 MDB_meta *meta;
10273
10274 if (rc == MDB_OWNERDEAD) {
10275 /* We own the mutex. Clean up after dead previous owner. */
10276 rc = MDB_SUCCESS;
10277 rlocked = (mutex == env->me_rmutex);
10278 if (!rlocked) {
10279 /* Keep mti_txnid updated, otherwise next writer can
10280 * overwrite data which latest meta page refers to.
10281 */
10282 meta = mdb_env_pick_meta(env);
10283 env->me_txns->mti_txnid = meta->mm_txnid;
10284 /* env is hosed if the dead thread was ours */
10285 if (env->me_txn) {
10286 env->me_flags |= MDB_FATAL_ERROR;
10287 env->me_txn = NULL;
10288 rc = MDB_PANIC;
10289 }
10290 }
10291 DPRINTF(("%cmutex owner died, %s", (rlocked ? 'r' : 'w'),
10292 (rc ? "this process' env is hosed" : "recovering")));
10293 rc2 = mdb_reader_check0(env, rlocked, NULL);
10294 if (rc2 == 0)
10295 rc2 = mdb_mutex_consistent(mutex);
10296 if (rc || (rc = rc2)) {
10297 DPRINTF(("LOCK_MUTEX recovery failed, %s", mdb_strerror(rc)));
10298 UNLOCK_MUTEX(mutex);
10299 }
10300 } else {
10301#ifdef _WIN32
10302 rc = ErrCode();
10303#endif
10304 DPRINTF(("LOCK_MUTEX failed, %s", mdb_strerror(rc)));
10305 }
10306
10307 return rc;
10308}
10309#endif /* MDB_ROBUST_SUPPORTED */
10310
10311#if defined(_WIN32)
10313static int ESECT
10314utf8_to_utf16(const char *src, MDB_name *dst, int xtra)
10315{
10316 int rc, need = 0;
10317 wchar_t *result = NULL;
10318 for (;;) { /* malloc result, then fill it in */
10319 need = MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, src, -1, result, need);
10320 if (!need) {
10321 rc = ErrCode();
10322 free(result);
10323 return rc;
10324 }
10325 if (!result) {
10326 result = malloc(sizeof(wchar_t) * (need + xtra));
10327 if (!result)
10328 return ENOMEM;
10329 continue;
10330 }
10331 dst->mn_alloced = 1;
10332 dst->mn_len = need - 1;
10333 dst->mn_val = result;
10334 return MDB_SUCCESS;
10335 }
10336}
10337#endif /* defined(_WIN32) */

#define DPRINTF(args)

Definition mdb.c:507
MDB_PAGE_FULL
#define MDB_PAGE_FULL
